description: We at HelloFresh provide meal-kits to a multitude of different customers. We pride ourselves on using the highest quality ingredients that are available to us and embrace the green lifestyle. jobs.title: Marketing Analyst
jobs.description:
About HelloFresh

We are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market. This is a unique opportunity to gain valuable and challenging experience at a rapidly growing start-up. Responsibility is given from day one to use your initiative and creativity to help us grow our business. We are fast-paced and love the food world.

If you would like to join an energetic and highly motivated team and work in a dynamic, hands-on, high-growth field where you can really have an impact and make a difference every single day then join us and become part of developing a global fresh food champion!

About the job:

As Marketing Analyst at HelloFresh you will be supporting business decisions with marketing data. Reporting directly into our Marketing Director you and your 2 direct reports will be responsible for informing the Marketing team and wider business about marketing performance and opportunities of growth. 

● You will be responsible for implementing A/B tests and developing tools to make performance analysis as quick and insightful as possible:

● You will be providing insights from an ROI perspective to the Marketing team & wider business

● You will be developing tools in different platforms to increase efficiency across the business (daily use of Tableau, SQL, Python)

● You will be involved in budgeting and forecasting for all Marketing channels

● You will also be the direct line manager for 2 Marketing Analytics Interns and will be responsible for coaching, development and managing their deliveries and priorities, too

Who you are:

● You are a motivated self-starter and a born problem-solver who’s loves cross functional work
● You have extensive hands-on experience working with Excel, SQL and Tableau at an advanced level
● You also have advanced Python & Google Analytics skills
● You ideally have a BI background or similar
● You are great at transforming data and numbers into real life opportunities
● You are highly motivated by a fast-paced culture of continuous feedback, growth and healthy debate
● You have excellent interpersonal and communication skills with both technical and non-technical
individuals
● You have great organizational skills and can easily manage a team, defining priorities and proposing
new and more efficient ways
● You have an analytical Degree (2:1 and above) in Engineering, Mathematics, Sciences or Economics
● You have people management skills


What you will get in return:

● 70% discount on HelloFresh boxes
● Free local gym access or private health care
● Breakfast everyday
● Weekly after work drinks and socials
● Pension scheme contribution
● Fantastic social activities (we once transformed our office into a multilevel, mini golf course!)

jobs.title: HR Supervisor - Manila, Philippines (m/f/x)
jobs.description: At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week. ## About the job You will be based out of Manila and partner closely with our Head of People & Culture to manage and direct the HR function for our team in Manila. The purpose of this role is to achieve business unit/corporate objectives and to attract and retain an ambitious and motivated workforce in Manila. You will manage a team of Human Resources employees that take care of HR administration, payroll, and recruitment. - Manage the following aspects of HR Management: Recruitment, Learning & Development, Performance Management, Corporate Culture, and HR Administration. - Partner with functional business leaders to become a trusted advisor and coach to help the teams grow and be as effective as possible. - Work with our Managers to organise and manage all employee data, files and information in ways that are relevant, easy to manage, and compliant. - Communicate and reinforce the vision of the organisation and gain commitment to strategic imparities and organisation goals. - Conduct organisational analyses to evaluate advancement opportunities and replacement / incremental planning needs. - Counsel employees and managers regarding conflict resolution, performance improvement and talent management. - Manage and support programs that reinforce employee engagement and enhance employee morale and productivity. - Work with our Managers to ensure compliance with regulations relating to employment practices and wage and salary administration. - Manage and support employee communications at all levels in the organisation. - Participate in and support corporate wide HR and strategic initiatives.  ## Who we are looking for - Bachelor’s degree or comparable education in Human Resources or a related field is a plus - Minimum of 3+ years of experience, preferably in a fast-moving start-up environment - Experience and knowledge of Philippine employment regulations ideally in a BPO setting - Proven knowledge of all aspects of Human Resources (Recruitment, Learning & Development, Performance Management, Corporate Culture, and HR Administration etc.) - Experience in managing team members - Independent: able to work with autonomy with other functions and across geographies - Problem-solving abilities ## What we offer - The chance to have a serious impact on a newly-built business in an exciting growth phase - A vibrant, international environment - A guaranteed steep learning curve & boost for your career - Competitive compensation - Range of employee benefits (Health Insurance - also for dependents, referral bonus, Long Service Leave, Deminimis, Long Service Bonus) ## Are you up for a challenge? Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date.

jobs.title: Marketing Manager, Partnerships and Offline Media
jobs.description:
Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh!

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals  
from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  
We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-  
kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an  
incredibly wide population of people.  
The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space  
where you can thrive as a result.

Job Description:  
We’re hiring a Marketing Manager to join our Growth Marketing team with a focus on overseeing B2B sales and  
developing strategic brand partnerships. You will be responsible for scaling our Print / Insert Media program across  
our portfolio (HelloFresh, Green Chef and Every Plate) and expanding brand reach by driving our partnership  
strategy. You will have a tremendous amount of responsibility from day 1 and be a crucial part of the team during  
this exciting period of growth. To succeed in this role, you will need to have proven experience managing  
partnerships with leading national brands with the goal of increasing our customer base.  
You will…  
● Lead/oversee the planning, outreach, and executing partnerships for each of our print media programs.  
● Create and manage a well-structured media plan to grow our emerging brand partnerships channel,  
identifying and developing opportunities to expand reach and achieve aggressive growth KPIs by working  
with new and existing partners.  
● Drive innovation across the print media and partnership channels through testing and leveraging data and  
internal resources.  
● Track and optimize campaign performance analytics to develop growth strategies.  
● Manage channel budgets, marketing expenses, and invoices.  
● Work closely with internal teams (Marketing, Brand, Finance, Legal, etc.) to prioritize and execute programs  
and manage relationships with our external media/print vendors.  
● Manage a team of two marketing associates.  
You are…  
● A customer acquisition pro with a proven track record in building and scaling paid marketing channels.  
● A go-getter with excellent communication skills and an entrepreneurial mindset.  
● A strategic thinker, data-driven, extremely organized, and detail-oriented.  
● Highly adaptable and comfortable working in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment.  
● Excellent at managing multiple projects at once and executing quickly.

At a minimum, you have...  
● 4-6 years of experience in sales, acquisition partnerships and/or direct response marketing.  
● Bachelor’s Degree in a relevant field is required  
● Proven experience negotiating deals and managing strategic partnerships.  
● Knowledge on traditional print media (package inserts, direct mail, shared mail, catalog & blow-in inserts,  
and gift cards).  
● Proficiency in Microsoft Excel (data analysis, pivot tables) and Tableau.  
● Fluency in KPI’s such as CAC, CPA, CPM, CVR, and LTV.  
● Experience managing direct reports.  
You’ll get…  
● Competitive Salary & 401K company match that vests immediately upon participation  
● Generous parental leave of 16 weeks & PTO policy  
● $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans effective first day of employment  
● 75% discount on your subscription to HelloFresh (as well as other product initiatives)  
● Snacks, coffee & catered meals  
● Company-sponsored outings & Employee Resource Groups  
● Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company  
It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of  
race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because he or she is a protected veteran.

jobs.title: Automation & Engineering Intern
jobs.description:
***Get cooking with HelloFresh!***

At HelloFresh, our mission is to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch, at home. With offices all over the world, we deliver delicious meals to millions of customers, worldwide.  

HelloFresh is one of the top three largest companies to come out of Europe over the past four years! Our growth trajectory and expansion has been phenomenal – only three and half years after inception, we are active in nine markets, and on three continents.

We are recognized industry leaders—receiving over $300M in investor funding, as well as numerous awards for our outstanding products & service.

**Job Description: **

***You will…***

- PWork with the Engineering and Operations teams to determine the most effective ways to use the basic factors of production – people, machines, materials, and information
- Provide financial analysis data for improvements and return on investment justifications for new production equipment investments
- Re-engineer & design process flows, layouts, workstations, etc.
- Evaluation work performance and time studies to assist with process creation and labor standards
- Analysis General methods and process improvement with emphasis on Lean Production continuous improvement initiatives and 5S principles
- Implement projects with production teams to understand root causes around errors and how to mitigate them

***You are…***

- Able to think analytically, focus on root cause analysis
- Strong attention to detai

***You have…***

- Be enrolled in an accredited BS or MS Industrial Engineering program
- Rising Junior/Senior with a strong interest in the food tech industry
- Proficient in Microsoft office products with a strong emphasis on Access, Excel and Visual Basic programming
- AutoCAD skills preferred

Our team is diverse, high-performing and international, helping us to create a truly inspiring work environment in which you will thrive! Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh!

*It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because they are a protected veteran.*

jobs.title: Brand Ambassador - Outside Sales (Pleasanton)
jobs.description:
**About Us**

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people. The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

**The Role**

We are hiring  enthusiastic Brand Ambassadors to be the face and voice of our brand. As a successful candidate, you will be involved in increasing brand awareness  by selling and promoting our products at various local events.

**You Will…**

- Engage with potential customers through face-to-face interactions at local events, festivals, malls, gyms, and more within Greater Bay Area
- Promote and sell HelloFresh to new demographics while meeting weekly sales goals
- Work as a positive team player to meet individual and team sales goals
- Learn about the benefits and services of our product to effectively market to customers
- Attend training’s several times a week on-site at our local sales office

**You Have...**

- BA/BS preferred; high school diploma or GED required
- Customer service, sales or marketing skills
- Reliable source of transportation

**You’ll get...**

- The opportunity to get insight into one of the fastest growing technology startups in the world.
- Hourly base + uncapped commission & bonuses
- $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans effective first day of employment
- 401k Program
- 75% discount on your subscription to HelloFresh (as well as other product initiatives)   
- Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company 

**Other Details…**

- It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because he or she is a protected veteran.
- All selected candidates are subject to passing a background check prior to employment.
- Candidates must have a reliable source of personal transportation.
- Candidates must be able to stand for 3-4 hours at a time and lift up to 20 pounds at a time.
- Candidates must have the ability to work rotating shifts Monday through Sunday including nights, weekends, and holidays. 
- Candidates must be authorized to work in the U.S. without sponsorship.

jobs.title: Accounts Payable Administrator
jobs.description:
***Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh!***

 

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  

We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people.

The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

 

**Job Description:**

The Accounts Payable Administrator joining the team will be responsible for performing a range of account coding and clerical tasks related to the accounts payable function. This generally includes receiving, processing, and verifying invoices, tracking and recording purchase orders and maintaining accurate payment records.

The Accounts Payable Administrator will work with the accounts payable team to obtain proper approval and enter  all invoices for the company, roughly 1,000+ per week.

**You will ...**

- Ensure timely and accurate entry of invoices
- Ensure all supporting documents are complete for invoice entry
- Ensure invoice supporting documentation is organized and saved in correct email/shared folders
- Provide support for shared accounts payable emails 
- Have the ability to effectively communicate with team members across different office locations
- Partner with team members from various business units
- Assist in the month end close process by helping with accruals related to invoices
- Verify vendor accounts by reconciling monthly statements and related transactions

**You are...**

 

- Someone with excellent communication, interpersonal, organizational and time management skills
- Strong sense of teamwork is highly desired
- Ability to manage a high-volume workload efficiently and effectively
- High Energy individual with strong work ethic
- Must be a self-motivator
- Ability to maintain confidentiality
- Ability to multi-task
- Prior Accounts Payable experience preferred

#### **At a minimum, you have...**

- Associate’s degree in accounting, finance, or related field
- Experience with Oracle a plus
- Must be proficient in Excel/Google Sheets
- Strong time management and organizational skills

 

It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because he or she is a protected veteran.

jobs.title: Affiliate Marketing Manager (CA)
jobs.description:
**About HelloFresh:**

At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 8 years we've seen this mission spread around the world and beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market. So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of encouraged, energized home cooks that expands across the globe. We are one of the fastest growing meal kit businesses and are active and growing in 10+ different countries across 3 continents. Our growth trajectory and expansion has been phenomenal and we have launched facilities across Canada and have recently added Chefs Plate to our team!

**About the Role: **

As an Affiliate Manager, you will be part of exciting new growth of affiliate channel within HelloFresh. We are building up a new affiliate team to support this growth, giving you the opportunity to manage the Canadian program. You will project manage affiliate campaigns that will drive our performance and expand our portfolio. 

To succeed in this role, you’ll need experience in the affiliate industry, a passion for forming professional relationships, and an innovative approach to optimizing business opportunities.

**You will: **

- Identify key partners to recruit onto our established affiliate program 
- Have full responsibility over the Canadian market’s affiliate program, managing recruitment, retention, and performance 
- Work on multiple initiatives for delivering business goals, and ensuring maximum ROI from your affiliate budget. Example of initiatives include among others adjustment of discount and payout structure, creative strategy or landing page optimization
- Be the primary contact and support for our strategic affiliate partners in Canada
- Harness your data-driven mindset to troubleshoot campaigns, optimise partner performance, and identify opportunities for improvement and growth 
- Represent HelloFresh and strengthen relationships in the market through calls and meetings, and the attendance of conferences, and industry events
- Expand and develop your professional knowledge of the affiliate industry by maintaining personal networks, with the opportunity to apply learning budget to harness your technical expertise

**You have or are:**

- An experienced Affiliate Manager with at 2-3 years of experience in the Canadian affiliate industry, with established industry and publisher relationships
- Equipped with a good knowledge of the Canadian affiliate landscape, common tracking technologies and platforms, and well as reporting dashboards such as Tableau
- Bachelor or Masters degree in Marketing, Business Management, Finance or other
- Experienced in media buying and large scale budget handling
- Data driven mindset and a critical thinker, able to work independently with significant amount of determination and ambition 
- Bringing an excellent understanding of all types of affiliate reward models
- Platform proficient, with strong IT skills, including Excel, Powerpoint, Google platforms
- A team-player, and happy to bounce ideas with other team members to learn and encourage creativity 
- Creative, and enjoy thinking outside of the box 
- Able to use your excellent communication skills to communicate with key internal and external stakeholders at all levels, as well as form relationships with members of remote teams. 

**Why you'll love this job:**

- You’ll have the chance to push your ideas from inception to execution without being held back by bureaucracy.
- We’re a start-up within a start-up. We’re nimble but we have the institutional knowledge and the global resources
- Competitive salary and company benefits
- 75% discount on HelloFresh boxes
- Working with a fun, energetic and supportive team
- Awesome environment at our downtown Toronto office! We take our work seriously, but we don't take ourselves too seriously

jobs.title: Analyst - Intern (m/w/x)
jobs.description:
#### At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week.

#### We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 12 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London and Amsterdam. Our more than 4,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged.

We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us.

## **The Job**

This role is a fantastic opportunity for a recent graduate or someone part way through their studies with a procurement and an analytical background. You would be part of a true start up and part of the journey in launching and growing HelloFresh based in Copenhagen

## **You will be...**

- Working within the procurement team and collaborating closely with our production, culinary and marketing teams
- Scoping, analysing and implementing projects, along with the procurement team, to ensure operations and costs are controlled and objectives are met on time
- Supporting in sourcing, negotiation and onboarding new suppliers and SKUs
- Conducting data analysis on available procurement data and existing dashboards to build comprehensive view on procurement team performance and areas of improvements
- Build, maintain and use dashboards and operational tracking tools in Excel/Google Sheets, etc.
- Measuring and analyse key performance metrics
- Helping out during the tendering process
- Supporting in generating category insights

## **Who we are looking for**

- A degree in Procurement, Supply Chain Management, Business Management or similar with top performance
- Extensive hands-on experience working with Excel/Google Sheets at an advanced level (Pivot tables, Index-matches, advanced formulas)
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills with both technical and non-technical individuals
- Ability to work on tasks autonomously that have a high level of responsibility and communicate progress effectively to key stakeholders
- Energy, enthusiasm, commitment and a can-do flexible attitude
- Fluency in Swedish and/or Danish is a plus

## **We offer you a chance to make a difference in a fast growing technology company**

- The chance to have a serious, direct impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase
- A vibrant, international environment
- A steep learning curve
- Significant reduction on your HelloFresh boxes

## Time commitment

We are looking for someone who can commit full-time for a duration of at least 3 months.

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date.

jobs.title: Assistant General Manager
jobs.description:
Green Chef is the leading and first certified organic company in the meal kit space in the US. We are passionate about making it easier to eat healthfully at home. Founded in September 2014, Green Chef is already a national force with hundreds of employees and tens of thousands of customers relying on us to help them eat well. 

In 2018 Green Chef and Hello Fresh partnered to become the world’s largest meal kit company.  Together, we tirelessly work to disrupt the food industry.

Green Chef remains focused on delivering healthy, organic ingredients, designed for busy people. We believe in creating thoughtful food experiences from planting to the plating. We strive to create greater interaction and meaningful connections with the food that nourishes us, the people who provide it, and the ones we share it with. Green Chef offers a variety of specialty lifestyle plans.

 

The Assistant General Manager will oversee and execute the daily production of our food preparation and packaging for our distribution center.  

**Essential Functions:**  

- Manage and oversee day-to-day operations for warehouse fulfillment labor staff
- Work directly with Warehouse Managers and Human Resources to meet staffing needs
- Work directly with General Manager, Warehouse Managers and Human Resources Manager to properly execute all company policies, procedures, discipline, and performance management
- Ensure all production related processes are followed
- Ensure all warehouse production deadlines are followed
- Coordinate weekly department meetings and maintain constant communication between departments
- Promptly communicate all safety related issues and concerns
- Any and all other functions as determined by management

 

**Supervisory Responsibilities:**

- Manage Warehouse Managers, Supervisors and oversee warehouse team of 200+
- Manage weekly schedule for hourly and salaried fulfillment labor employees

 

**Required Experience/Education:**

- 5-7 years of Warehouse Management experience in an Organic Food, Distribution or Production facility
- Proven track record of improved results in quality, safety, service and cost
- Knowledge of operating as a USDA or FDA regulated food facility
- HACCP training 
- Ability to manage time and prioritize work as needed
- Demonstrated ability to motivate people and develop employees

 

**Physical Demands:**

- Ability to lift 25 pounds regularly  
- Ability to lift 50 pounds occasionally
- Ability to stand for prolonged periods of time
- Regular stooping, squatting, bending, twisting, and walking

 

**Working Conditions:**

- Combination of warehouse and office environment 
- Must be able to withstand temperatures ranging from 45 degrees Fahrenheit to -20 degrees Fahrenheit 

 

Our team is diverse, high-performing and international, helping us to create a truly inspiring work environment in which you will thrive! 

*It is the policy of Green Chef and HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because he or she is a protected veteran.*

jobs.title: Associate Director, Growth Marketing - Green Chef (Talent Pool)
jobs.description:
***Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh!***

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  

We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and continue to grow!  In 2018 Green Chef and Hello Fresh partnered to become the world’s largest meal kit company.  Together, we tirelessly work to disrupt the food industry.  We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people. Green Chef remains focused on delivering healthy, organic ingredients, designed for busy people. We believe in creating thoughtful food experiences from planting to plating. We strive to create greater interaction and meaningful connections with the food that nourishes us, the people who provide it, and the ones we share it with. Green Chef offers a variety of specialty lifestyle plans including Keto, Paleo, Vegan, Vegetarian, Gluten-Free, Omnivore, and Carnivore. 

The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

**Job Description:**

In order to support our incredible growth trajectory we’re hiring an experienced Associate Director of Growth Marketing to drive significant revenue growth through the management and collaboration of our Acquisition, Analytics, Product Marketing and Business Development teams. As Associate Director of Growth, you will be responsible for identifying and scaling cost-effective customer acquisition campaigns across a range of digital and offline channels. You will develop the strategic plan, use analytics to inform decisions and drive execution to optimize a significant marketing budget against company goals.

The ideal candidate will know how to build and scale complex marketing campaigns across the purchase funnel, has worked with Product Teams and Analytics Teams to drive growth, has demonstrated experience in collaborating multiple teams to achieve results and is able to define and clearly communicate the strategic direction. ** **

**You will...**

- Be responsible for defining our acquisition strategy. You will develop, recommend, and execute marketing campaigns across a variety of paid and organic channels
- Collaborate with teams spanning from Customer Acquisition, Analytics, Product Marketing and Business development functions
- Have ownership of a substantial marketing budget and optimize the mix accordingly to achieve company targets in collaboration with the Growth Lead of Green Chef
- Collaborate with Product Marketing and Analytics team for improving and optimizing our Customer Acquisition and Retention Strategies.
- Work with the creative team to make sure all performance marketing creative assets are built effectively as well as gather learnings to improve them
- Define the role of partnership and business development in achieving our growth goals
- Work with other senior members of the marketing team to define the role media plays in building a first-class e-food brand

**You are...**

- Obsessed with growth and building things while not being afraid to get your hands dirty
- Persistent and have bias-to-action with a track record of performance
- A natural leader who is comfortable working in an agile, fast-paced environment  
- A great communicator and team player who has a contagious “can-do” attitude
- Detail oriented – you spot numerical or grammatical errors that others don’t
- Able to think both strategically as well as be able to change direction quickly
- Proactive and enjoy coming up with new ideas and can explain your rationale
- A marketing strategist and can derive insights, recommendations and action plans from qualitative market trends, consumer feedback, and large data sets

- Someone with outstanding organizational skills, project management skills, and a keen ability to multitask and prioritize
- A collaborative partner with a can-do, positive attitude that is solution-focused  
  

**At a minimum, you have...**

- Bachelor’s degree  in marketing,engineering or related field with a strong academic record  
- Minimum 6 years of professional experience with real and consistent results in a performance marketing or highly commercial role
- Proven background in ecommerce and/or subscription business models who has experience building and presenting marketing business cases
- At least 4 years of team management experience
- Substantial experience working with performance marketing metrics (CPM, CPI, CPA, CPC & LTV).
- Tactical experience working with specific digital and offline channels preferred (Display, Social, Search, Mobile and Affiliate, Inserts, Direct Mail)
- Experience in Analytics in Product Marketing, ability to collaborate with stakeholders in these teams and across the business both locally and in remote offices
- A strategic mind and can derive insights, recommendations and action plans from qualitative market trends, consumer feedback and large data sets
- Outstanding organizational skills, project management skills, and ability to multitask 

**You’ll get…**

- Competitive Salary & 401k company match that vests immediately upon participation 
- Generous parental leave of 16 weeks & PTO policy 
- $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans 
- 75% discount on your subscription to HelloFresh (as well as other product initiatives)   
- Snacks, cold brew on tap & monthly catered lunches 
- Company-sponsored outings & Employee Resource Groups 
- Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company  

*It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because they are a protected veteran.*

jobs.title: Associate Quality Manager
jobs.description:
***Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh!***

 At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  

We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people.

 The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

 

**Job Description:**

The Associate Quality Manager position is responsible for assisting the QA Manager in all quality assurance related internal audits in adherence with regulatory standards. Additionally, the position analyzes process reports and troubleshoots problems to correct quality issues. Supervisory responsibilities for direct reports consistent with established standards, customer specifications and production goals. The position supervises a team of Quality Associates and Supervisors.  

**You Will** :

-  Ensure a high level of internal and external customer service. Investigate (and correct) customer issues and complaints relating to quality.
- 

Manages the department engaged in inspection and testing activities to ensure high productivity and high technical integrity.

- 

Develop and analyze statistical data and product specifications to determine standards and to establish quality and reliability expectancy of finished product.

- 

Coordinate objectives with production procedures in cooperation with other plant managers to maximize compliance, product reliability and minimize costs.

- 

Create, document and implement inspection criteria and procedures.

- 

Interpret quality control philosophy to key personnel within the company.

- 

Maintain an active role on internal continuous improvement teams.

- 

Implement existing quality control training programs and scheduling as needed.

- 

Provide, and oversee inspection activity for products throughout the production cycle.

- 

Address non-conformities from previous internal and external audits.

- 

Follow-up on and closing pending preventive and corrective action requests.

- 

Ensure that organizational systems and training is in place.

- 

Ensuring that documentation and design controls are appropriate for organization.

- 

Administering document control and configuration management system.

- 

Oversee established calibration and testing program.

- 

Assist the management team and provide QA support when QA Manager is out.

- 

Provide all employees with necessary tools, proper training and corrective direction.

- 

Interact with vendors and procurement to ensure adequate quantities of good quality ingredients.

- 

Maintain discipline, morale and harmonious relations among subordinates.

- 

Investigate and adjust personnel problems within the area of responsibility.

- 

Effectively recommend hiring, promotions, wage adjustments and terminations.

- 

Support the maintenance and continuous improvement of SQF systems.

** **** You Are:**
- 

 Leadership: train and develop a large group of employees      

- 

Performance Management: for assigned production lines

- 

Problem Solving/Analysis    

- 

Results Driven

- 

 Communication Proficiency: speak to employees with tact and diplomacy     

- 

Time Management: tracking/monitoring production and maintaining productivity

- 

Technical Capacity: computer literacy to input information into the computer

- 

Learning Orientation: able to take direction and relay information to employees

** **** At a Minimum You Have**:
- 

Bachelor's degree or related management work experience.

- 

At least 2-4 years of work experience in quality/food safety assurance, should be combined with a demonstrated track-record of accomplishments as a quality assurance professional, and with satisfying customers in technology-driven, developing companies.

**You’ll get…**

- Competitive Salary & 401K company match that vests immediately upon participation
- Generous parental leave of 16 weeks & PTO policy
- $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans effective first day of employment
- 75% discount on your subscription to HelloFresh (as well as other product initiatives)
- Snacks, coffee & catered meals   
- Company sponsored outings & Employee Resource Groups
- Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company

jobs.title: Automation Technician
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Job Description

Hello Fresh is looking for an Automation Technician to join our rapidly-growing fulfillment centre. In this role you will work with our Production and Maintenance Team to perform the automation and preventative maintenance programs at our facilities, and work to ensure operation downtime is kept to a minimum along with routine production activities.

You will:

  • Work with our Food Safety and Sanitation teams to ensure all automated equipment is meeting regulatory standards;
  • Perform preventive/predictive maintenance of Packaging equipment using the appropriate job plans, procedures, and manuals;
  • Ensure proper, safe operation of the equipment, accurate set up and responsible for documentation and administration reports.
  • Conduct machine calibration and assist in preventive maintenance activities;
  • Troubleshoot and repair equipment failures to ensure Production downtime is kept to a minimum;
  • Continuously monitor and adjust the process based on upstream and downstream production needs.
  • Maintain and store department inventory, including consumables and keep records documented.
  • Responsible for Mixer responsibilities and following the Mixer processes when providing coverage.
  • Responsible for practicing and adhering to Food Safety, GMP’s (Good Manufacturing Practices) and Health and Safety.
  • Responsible for practicing and adhering to Hello Fresh policies and best practices.
  • Forklift license an asset.

Requirements:

  • Post-secondary Education in Mechanical or Electro-Mechanical Engineering Diploma or equivalent;
  • Minimum one-year experience in a food processing or service environment/manufacturing industry;
  • Maintain a high level of attention to detail and accuracy looking consistently for potential food safety or quality deviations
  • This is a physically demanding job which requires lifting of up to 50lbs, standing for extended periods in a refrigerated cold work environment
  • Will be required to move heavy equipment and materials for line set up, changes and operation.

jobs.title: Brand & PR Internship (Nederlandstalig)
jobs.description:
**Join our HelloFresh family**

At HelloFresh we love food and our mission is to change the way people eat forever. That change comes conveniently packaged in a box - a HelloFresh Box, filled with the best fresh ingredients. With our meal boxes with easy to cook recipes and fresh ingredients, we are driving change in the quickly evolving food industry. From developing our recipes to delivering the boxes - the customer is at the center of everything we do. Our aim is to make every meal a moment to look forward to, for everyone at the table. No surprise then that data is our friend and for us, learning never stops. We make quick but informed decisions and as a fast-growing company, we value flexibility and speed.

**HelloFresh needs you**

For our young and passionate team, we are looking for a Dutch or Belgian Brand & PR intern. Working in the marketing team you will support the Brand & PR specialists with everything related to our Brand and PR strategy and projects. As a part of our Internship program you will have the opportunity to learn more about the fundamentals of Corporate Communications and PR and work on several topics and projects. This is a unique opportunity to gain experience in a rapidly growing scale-up and apply your initiative and creativit.

You’ll be working on:

- Support in different Brand campaigns and consumer and corporate PR projects
- Work on corporate communications messaging and draft press releases, fact sheets, etc.
- Support in executing launch, media and influencer events
- Support customer care teams with addressing incoming (customer) questions on sensitive topics.
- Reporting of local brand & pr activities to our global office

**Are you the perfect Brand & PR intern?**

We are looking for someone to start in **August/September 2020**. You are in the last phases of marketing, media or communication bachelor or master degree, or have already completed it. You have strong organizational skills and can manage multiple tasks in a short period of time without stressing out. Never a dull moment at HelloFresh! You think before you act, have a can-do mentality, pay attention to details and are keen to achieve great results. You will be working with many teams internally and with our PR agencies in Belgium and the Netherlands so we are looking for someone who is collaborative and has strong communication skills. Your writing skills will be essential to craft or review press releases and media alerts. We are looking for someone who has **Dutch or Flemish as mother tongue** and is fluent in English.

**What do we offer you?**

- Make a serious impact on our PR initiatives in the Benelux & France market;
- A lot of learning- and development opportunities within a young and dynamic e-commerce company;
- Freedom of idea and initiative, execution and implementation of your own ideas and initiatives;
- You can make use of the company benefits, like food and fruit in the office, sports classes, such as yoga, boot camp, and boxing class.
- An amazing team and office in Amsterdam, check it out [here](http://media.licdn.com/embeds/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2F1ZKrhiVypkw%3Ffeature%3Doembed&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3D1ZKrhiVypkw&type=text%2Fhtml&schema=youtube)!
- Next, to that, you also get a discount on the HelloFresh Box.
- And of course, you’ll earn a compensation of 500 EUR gross per month, based on a 40-hour work week.

**Which steps do I need to take to get this job?**

We take a look at your resume and cover letter. If we see a match, we will invite you within 5 working days for a video call to get to know each other. Are we still positive? If both sides would like to proceed We will schedule a face-to-face interview at our headquarters in Amsterdam. We will schedule the interviews one after the other quickly, in order to let you know as fast as possible if you can start at HelloFresh! We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.

**Are you interested or do you have questions?**

Feel free to send a message to [Hedwig](mailto:hedwigschaap@hellofresh.nl). Do you want to send us your application? Nice! Please click on the 'apply' button below and fill out the mandatory fields. Upload your resume and cover letter and that's it. Applications sent by email will not be processed.

*Before applying please make sure you are eligible to work in the Netherlands, unfortunately, we do not sponsor any work visa or permits for this position.*

**Proactive talent acquisition from third parties is not appreciated.**

jobs.title: Brand Ambassador - Outside Sales (Atlanta)
jobs.description:
**About Us**

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people. The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

**The Role**

We are hiring  enthusiastic Brand Ambassadors to be the face and voice of our brand. As a successful candidate, you will be involved in increasing brand awareness  by selling and promoting our products at various local events.

**You Will…**

- Engage with potential customers through face-to-face interactions at local events, festivals, malls, gyms, and more within Greater Atlanta
- Promote and sell HelloFresh to new demographics while meeting weekly sales goals
- Work as a positive team player to meet individual and team sales goals
- Learn about the benefits and services of our product to effectively market to customers
- Attend training’s several times a week on-site at our local sales office

**You Have...**

- BA/BS preferred; high school diploma or GED required
- Customer service, sales or marketing skills
- Reliable source of transportation

**You’ll get...**

- The opportunity to get insight into one of the fastest growing technology startups in the world.
- Hourly base + uncapped commission & bonuses
- $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans effective first day of employment
- 401k Program
- 75% discount on your subscription to HelloFresh (as well as other product initiatives)   
- Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company 

**Other Details…**

- It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because he or she is a protected veteran.
- All selected candidates are subject to passing a background check prior to employment.
- Candidates must have a reliable source of personal transportation.
- Candidates must be able to stand for 3-4 hours at a time and lift up to 20 pounds at a time.
- Candidates must have the ability to work rotating shifts Monday through Sunday including nights, weekends, and holidays. 
- Candidates must be authorized to work in the U.S. without sponsorship.

jobs.title: Brand Ambassador - Outside Sales (Tampa)
jobs.description:
***Get cookin' with HelloFresh…***

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.

We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people.

**The Role...**

Tired of door-to-door, commission only sales? Want to escape retail? We are actively seeking full-time Sales and Marketing Representatives to join our growing team in order to continue the expansion of our brand. If you are working in the retail or customer service industry and are looking to advance your career, look no further!

This role offers a competitive base salary plus commission and bonus, on average top Reps are making an additional $700 a week! Comprehensive benefits start your first day! 

Sales and Marketing Representatives receive outstanding training, professional growth, development opportunities and limitless success. 

In this role, you will promote HelloFresh through direct marketing and face-to-face interactions at various events. In order to succeed in this position you will need to be confident in your customer service skills, eager to learn, and willing to hit personal and team sales goals.

** **

**Are You Someone That…**

- Can communicate verbally with a wide range of people?
- Is customer focused?
- Enjoys working as a positive team player to meet individual and team sales goals?
- Is agile and able to respond effectively to the changing needs of a fast-paced growing organization?
- Wants to grow your direct marketing/sales skills?

**You Will…**

- Engage with potential customers through face-to-face interactions at local events, festivals, malls, gyms, and more
- Promote and sell HelloFresh to new demographics while meeting weekly sales goals
- Learn about the benefits and services of our product to effectively market to customers
- Attend trainings several times a week on-site at our local sales office
- Act as a Brand Ambassador for HelloFresh

**You Have...**

- High school diploma or GED required; BA/BS preferred
- Minimum one year experience in sales, marketing, customer service, retail or similar field

**Other Details…**

- *It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because he or she is a protected veteran.*
- *All selected candidates are subject to passing a background check prior to employment.*
- *Candidates must have a reliable source of personal transportation.*
- *Candidates must be able to stand for 3-4 hours at a time and lift up to 30 pounds at a time.*
- *Candidates must be authorized to work in the U.S. without sponsorship.*

Our team is diverse, high-performing and international, helping us to create a truly inspiring work environment in which you will thrive! Come see what's cookin' at HelloFresh!

jobs.title: Business Analyst (Customer Care)
jobs.description:
## **About HelloFresh**

At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 7 years we've seen this mission spread beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market.

So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of inspired, energised home cooks that expands across the globe. We are one of the fastest growing meal kit businesses and are active and growing in 13 different countries across 3 continents.

If you would like to join an energetic and highly motivated team and work in a dynamic, high-energy, high-growth field where you can really have an impact and make a difference every single day then join us and become part of developing a global fresh food champion.

## **Job description**

As the Business Analyst for Customer Care you will work with the Director of Customer Care and the Customer Care Managers to extract and analyse data, drawing insights to enable decision making relating to our performance and our customers.

### ***You will…***

- Use internal analytics tools to identify customer pain points and provide clear actionable solutions. 
- Provide the management team with visibility of areas to improve our Contact Centre performance against our KPI’s (Service level/compensation adherence) 
- Conduct internal research, fuelling the business with insights to enable improvements and growth through a better understanding of both our customers and consumers. 
- Be a thought leader in the business for competitor, industry and consumer insight. 
- Communicate effectively across all parts of the business and to various levels of stakeholders.
- Run end to end including creating a business case, budgets and timelines.
- Roll out training to managers and agents on how to extract relevant data and improve on KPIs

## **Mandatory requirements**

### ***You have…***

- Proven working experience as an analyst (1 year minimum)
- Previous call centre industry experience or a keen interest in this area
- Exceptional communication skills and the ability to present findings
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organise, analyse, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
- Previous experience with Tableau and PowerBI is advantageous
- Hands-on experience working with excel/gsheets and SQL

### ***You are ...***

- An energetic, upbeat problem solver with a passion for reporting
- Proactive, ambitious, and assertive: you take ownership of your work and think beyond the scope of a given assignment
- Committed to working hard so your whole department benefits, you seek to support your colleagues
- Excited to work in a fast-paced environment with constant change and growth
- Passionate about our business: a foodie or a process and problem-solving zealot

**Start date:** June 2020

**Compensation*:*** Competitive salary with benefits

**Process*:*** There will be a task as part of the interview process

jobs.title: Business Analyst, Product/Menu
jobs.description:
***Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh!***

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  

We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people. 

The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

**Job Description:**

We’re hiring a Business Analyst to join our recently formed Operations Planning team. Alongside team members, peers on other teams, and Operations leadership, this role will own, execute, manage, support, and improve upon a variety of core processes, internal tools/systems/databases, and strategic initiatives that impact our entire Supply Chain. In addition, this role may contribute to the evaluation, selection, and implementation of new technology solutions, as well as own elements of cross-functional change management projects. To succeed in this role, you’ll need to have strong analytical and organizational abilities, a keen interest in how good data, processes, and tools can drive better decision-making and execution, and a natural ownership instinct. This is an opportunity to make a big impact on a fast-growing organization, the food supply chain, and how people eat.

**You will:**

- Expertly take ownership of several operationally critical tools and processes, managing and executing at the rhythm required by the business
- Be the primary subject-matter-expert in the business for all of your responsibilities, including maintaining a strong understanding of the relevant inputs, output, structures, and process flows
- Take the lead in responding to questions, issues, and analysis requests related to your areas of expertise, from both within the Operations Planning team and from other teams
- Interact within Operations Planning and cross-functional Supply Chain teams to ensure that business processes are executed as designed and are achieving desired outcomes
- Continuously seek out and evaluate opportunities (for example, integration of new data sources) to improve business outcomes, efficiency, strategy, and decision-making
- Adapt elements of your responsibilities to support new product launches and internal capability enhancements, while still ensuring the highest reliability, accuracy, and scalability
- Continuously improve and refine tools, analysis and presentation techniques while adapting to an expanding business, and an evolving landscape of Supply Chain technology, so we can work smarter, not harder

**You are:**

- A natural owner - You are super reliable and thoughtful in managing your responsibilities, you care about the outcome and quality of your work, and you earn the trust of your colleagues
- A data-driven critical thinker and problem solver - You use data and logic to identify opportunities, diagnose issues, evaluate alternatives, and synthesize and present critical information to solve complex problems
- Intellectually curious - You have an insatiable desire to understand why things are the way they are, how things work, and to challenge the status quo; you search for information and answers in an evolving landscape
- Agile and organized - You thrive in fast-paced and dynamic environments; you can multitask and prioritize your responsibilities; you demonstrate a methodical approach to all your work
- An excellent communicator - You can explain complex (often technical) information to a variety of audiences
- A self-starter - You are comfortable working autonomously and are obsessive about producing high quality work; you’re eager to take on new projects without knowing exactly what you will uncover
- A team player - You favor team victories over individual success

**At a minimum, you have:**

- 1-2 years of relevant work experience in an analytical capacity, including recurring responsibility for:

  - Executing or owning tools or processes required by the business to facilitate operational activities
  - Preparing and delivering reports, presentations, dashboards, and/or data visualizations for various audiences
- Undergraduate degree in Business Analytics, Engineering, Supply Chain Management, Economics, Finance, Mathematics, Data Science, Computer Science, Information Systems, Statistics, Accounting, or other relevant area of study
- Excellent quantitative and analytical skills - able to gather, organize, analyze, visualize, and present data to enable decision-making
- Excellent verbal and written communication abilities - able to convey the most important information to stakeholders, and to be effective in both technical and non-technical (business) situations
- Proficiency in spreadsheet applications, such as Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets, with preference for ability to automate within spreadsheets
- Basic experience with SQL or similar database languages
- Basic experience with data visualization software (Tableau, etc.) and/or programming/development languages (Python, Javascript, R, etc.) is a plus

**You’ll get:**

- Competitive Salary & 401k company match, which vests immediately upon participation
- Generous parental leave (16 weeks) & PTO policies
- $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans 
- 75% discount on your subscription to HelloFresh (as well as other product initiatives)   
- In the NYC office, snacks, cold brew on tap, & monthly catered lunches
- Opportunities to continue learning and growing your technical and business skills
- Company-sponsored outings & access to Employee Resource Groups 
- Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company

 

It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because they are a protected veteran.

jobs.title: Business Development Internship
jobs.description:
**Join our HelloFresh family**

At HelloFresh we love food and our mission is to change the way people eat forever. That change comes conveniently packaged in a box - a HelloFresh Box, filled with the best fresh ingredients. With our meal boxes with easy to cook recipes and fresh ingredients, we are driving change in the quickly evolving food industry. From developing our recipes to delivering the boxes - the customer is at the center of everything we do. Our aim is to make every meal a moment to look forward to, for everyone at the table. No surprise then that data is our friend and for us, learning never stops. We make quick but informed decisions and as a fast-growing company, we value flexibility and speed.

**HelloFresh needs you**

For our young and passionate team, we are looking for a business development intern. Working in the Business Development & Business Intelligence (BDBI) team, you are supporting the growth of HelloFresh – from analysis to implementation. You will analyze huge chunks of data and provide tangible opportunities that touch upon all teams from procurement to marketing. For larger projects, you will support the business analysts in doing analyses and coordinate on project management, giving you the change to really develop yourself.

- Analyze customer behavior and provide recommendations for improvement. Questions you will answer are “Why do customers decide to pause?” and “How is our current performance in France?”
- Manage projects from the beginning to end. Examples of projects are gathering more customer data via 1 on 1 interviews and benchmark our performance against competitors.
- Support business analysts during bigger projects, such as country roll-outs and new product introductions.

**Are you de perfect Business Development Intern?**

For this internship, you on the one hand have excellent analysis skills so that you can crunch the numbers while at the same time having the social skills to make projects happen. You have experience in data analysis with for example Excel or Python. In addition, you like to work together with colleagues to get the most out of projects and have proven to be a great collaborator during previous internships and/or extra curricular activities. Lastly, you enjoy leaving your mark on HelloFresh and take owernship to get things done.

**What do we offer you?**

- An internship starting from August/September
- Make a serious impact on the growth of HelloFresh
- A lot of learning- and development opportunities within a young and dynamic e-commerce company;
- Freedom of idea and initiative, execution and implementation of your own ideas and initiatives;
- You can make use of the company benefits, like food and fruit in the office, sports classes, such as yoga, boot camp, and boxing class.
- Next, to that, you also get a discount on the HelloFresh box.
- An internship fee of €500 euros per month

**What's next?**

We take a look at your resume and cover letter. If we see a match, we will invite you within 5 working days for a video call to get to know each other. Are we still positive? We will schedule a face-to-face interview at our headquarters in Amsterdam. We will schedule the interviews one after the other quickly, in order to let you know as fast as possible if you can start at HelloFresh! 

*We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.*

**Are you interested or do you have questions?**

Feel free to send a message to [Mara.](mailto:mara@hellofresh.nl)Do you want to send us your application? Nice! Please do as following; click on the 'apply' button below and fill out the mandatory fields. Upload your resume and cover letter and that's it. Applications send by email will not be processed.

jobs.description:
### **Come see what's cookin' at HelloFresh!**

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  
  
We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we're growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people.  
  
The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

**Job Description**

**Reports To:**  **Office Manager**

**Purpose of the Position:** To assist Chef(s) in Kitchen and Breakroom with tasks needed to serve meals timely to Team Members.

**Essential Functions:  **

- Monitor Food Service tables and determine need for refills of food items, communicate need to Chef(s), assist with food refills.
- Run food refills between Kitchen and Food Service tables, ensure proper placement of food and ensure serving utensils are clean and available at all times during Meal Service.  
- Ensure Food Service tables are clean before, during and after Meal Service.
- Assist Chef(s) with meal preparation as needed. 
- Keep the Breakroom neat, clean and stocked with necessary meal service utensils, and daily consumables such as coffee, tea, fruit, and condiments.

**Non-Essential Functions:**

- Assist Chef(s) with receiving, checking and placement of supply orders.

jobs.title: Corporate Communication & PR Internship (Nederlandstalig)
jobs.description:
**Join our HelloFresh family**

At HelloFresh we love food and our mission is to change the way people eat forever. That change comes conveniently packaged in a box - a HelloFresh Box, filled with the best fresh ingredients. With our meal boxes with easy to cook recipes and fresh ingredients, we are driving change in the quickly evolving food industry. From developing our recipes to delivering the boxes - the customer is at the center of everything we do. Our aim is to make every meal a moment to look forward to, for everyone at the table. No surprise then that data is our friend and for us, learning never stops. We make quick but informed decisions and as a fast-growing company, we value flexibility and speed.

**HelloFresh needs you**

For our young and passionate team, we are looking for a Dutch or Belgian Brand & PR intern. Working in the marketing team you will support the Brand & PR specialists with everything related to our Brand and PR strategy and projects. As a part of our Internship program you will have the opportunity to learn more about the fundamentals of Corporate Communications and PR and work on several topics and projects. This is a unique opportunity to gain experience in a rapidly growing scale-up and apply your initiative and creativit.

You’ll be working on:

- Support in different Brand campaigns and consumer and corporate PR projects
- Work on corporate communications messaging and draft press releases, fact sheets, etc.
- Support in executing launch, media and influencer events
- Support customer care teams with addressing incoming (customer) questions on sensitive topics.
- Reporting of local brand & pr activities to our global office

**Are you the perfect Brand & PR intern?**

We are looking for someone to start in **August/September 2020**. You are in the last phases of marketing, media or communication bachelor or master degree, or have already completed it. You have strong organizational skills and can manage multiple tasks in a short period of time without stressing out. Never a dull moment at HelloFresh! You think before you act, have a can-do mentality, pay attention to details and are keen to achieve great results. You will be working with many teams internally and with our PR agencies in Belgium and the Netherlands so we are looking for someone who is collaborative and has strong communication skills. Your writing skills will be essential to craft or review press releases and media alerts. We are looking for someone who has **Dutch or Flemish as mother tongue** and is fluent in English.

**What do we offer you?**

- Make a serious impact on our PR initiatives in the Benelux & France market;
- A lot of learning- and development opportunities within a young and dynamic e-commerce company;
- Freedom of idea and initiative, execution and implementation of your own ideas and initiatives;
- You can make use of the company benefits, like food and fruit in the office, sports classes, such as yoga, boot camp, and boxing class.
- An amazing team and office in Amsterdam, check it out [here](http://media.licdn.com/embeds/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2F1ZKrhiVypkw%3Ffeature%3Doembed&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3D1ZKrhiVypkw&type=text%2Fhtml&schema=youtube)!
- Next, to that, you also get a discount on the HelloFresh Box.
- And of course, you’ll earn a compensation of 500 EUR gross per month, based on a 40-hour work week.

**Which steps do I need to take to get this job?**

We take a look at your resume and cover letter. If we see a match, we will invite you within 5 working days for a video call to get to know each other. Are we still positive? If both sides would like to proceed We will schedule a face-to-face interview at our headquarters in Amsterdam. We will schedule the interviews one after the other quickly, in order to let you know as fast as possible if you can start at HelloFresh! We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.

**Are you interested or do you have questions?**

Feel free to send a message to [Hedwig](mailto:hedwigschaap@hellofresh.nl). Do you want to send us your application? Nice! Please click on the 'apply' button below and fill out the mandatory fields. Upload your resume and cover letter and that's it. Applications sent by email will not be processed.

*Before applying please make sure you are eligible to work in the Netherlands, unfortunately, we do not sponsor any work visa or permits for this position.*

**Proactive talent acquisition from third parties is not appreciated.**

jobs.title: Creative Project Manager Studio (m/f/x)
jobs.description:
At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week.

We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 12 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London, Amsterdam and Copenhagen and shipped out more than 250 Million meals in 2019. 

Our more than 5,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged. We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. 

We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us.

## **About the Job**

- Manage creative projects, especially complex photo- and videoshootings across Studio teams, internal and external stakeholders
- Ensure flawless execution in creative production and requirements of all relevant teams are met
- Plan, facilitate and track continuous improvement on operational needs of the Studio department, especially around creative production, processes and use of physical space.
- Prioritize activities across multiple projects at different stages of execution, from ideation to pre-production, production, post-production and delivery.
- Manage and track financial, time and resource aspects of the Studio operation against estimated budgets, business impact and timelines
- Ensure alignment of activities with brand values and CI guidelines

## **Who we are looking for**

- Relevant university degree in Media Production, Marketing, Communications Management or other related fields of study
- 3+ years experience in a creative project management role in cross-functional teams, e.g. in a commercial photo-/videostudio or an agency.
- Experience in working for high-growth tech and/or lifestyle brands. 
- Hands-on experience with project managing an initiative from start to finish. Achieves project goals while managing scope, time, quality and risk. Learns from failures as well as successes.
- Excellent organizational skills to juggle many tasks without losing sight of the highest priority items
- Ability to stay focused under pressure, prioritizing and managing multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced environment
- Strong interpersonal skills and ability to influence and motivate people at all levels across a broad variety of job functions
- Detail-oriented, organized, self-starter and a great communicator
- Excellent organizational skills and familiarity with working in agile environments and with agile methodologies
- Strong written and verbal communication skills to communicate with internal and external stakeholders, German language is a plus
- Affinity for process optimization and automatization, basic script programming skills and knowledge of JIRA systems are a plus.

## **What we offer**

- The chance to have a serious impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase
- A vibrant, international environment
- A guaranteed steep learning curve & boost for your career
- Competitive compensation
- Sabbatical policy
- Benefit from our selection of employee perks (significant reduction on your HelloFresh boxes, discount on the HelloFresh GO vending machines, free German classes, Geek Friday, discounts for our neighboring Fitness Studio & Urban Sports Club, annual budget for training and development initiatives, weekly Yoga Classes, Summer & Winter Party)

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date.
