jobs.title: Data & Automation Engineering Lead
jobs.description:
**Join our HelloFresh family**

At HelloFresh we love food and our mission is to change the way people eat forever. That change comes conveniently packaged in a box - a HelloFresh Box, filled with the best fresh ingredients.

With our meal boxes with easy to cook recipes and fresh ingredients, we are driving change in the quickly evolving food industry. From developing our recipes to delivering the boxes - the customer is at the center of everything we do. Our aim is to make every meal a moment to look forward to, for everyone at the table. No surprise then that data is our friend and for us, learning never stops. We make quick but informed decisions and as a fast-growing company, we value flexibility and speed.

**HelloFresh needs you**

For our young and passionate team, we are looking for a Data & Automation Lead. As the Data & Automation Lead you and your team will be working towards the goal of improving and/or developing workflow tools for all the teams. For example: in order to create our recipe card each week, a new python based tool is required to automate steps within this process to increase speed and decrease errors. You will take ownership of the architecture, design, development, deployment and operations of the tools you and your team build. You will be a part of the larger Process Excellence team and will play a crucial role in our push for automation locally and work together with our global tech teams on continuous improvements within HelloFresh.

You will:

- Contribute to the codebase yourself and manage 2fte engineers.
- Continuously optimise your team’s performance and manage business stakeholders to ensure on-time delivery of your team’s projects
- Develop and support  the creation of a centralized server-based workflow hub;
- Take ownership of existing workflow tools and ensure that you and your team maintain, adjust and improve these;
- Collaborate closely with our global Tech team, which is based in Berlin.

**Are you the perfect Data & Automation Lead?**

You have 3-5 years of work experience as data engineer or data team lead and have over 5000 hours of back-end experience using Python and SQL. Besides this you have experience or strong interest in working with job orchestration tools like Airflow, deploying automation tools such as Docker, Kubernetes and working with Amazon AWS. In former jobs you learnt to  translate business problems into sustainable data solutions for your team and you are experienced in end-to-end development processes, continuously delivering projects. Taking ownership for business problems and creating lasting solutions makes you happy. Finally, the team communicates in English so excellent verbal and written English skills are a must.

**What do we offer you?**

- Make a serious impact on creating more efficient processes within the HelloFresh BENELUX office;
- A lot of learning- and development opportunities within a young and dynamic e-commerce company;
- The opportunity to get to know the whole business and work with a lot of different teams locally and internationally;
- Freedom of idea and initiative, execution and implementation of your own ideas and initiatives;
- You can make use of the company benefits, like food and fruit in the office, sports classes, such as yoga, boot camp, and boxing class;
- A discount on the HelloFresh box;
- A competitive salary.

**Which steps do I need to take to get this job?**

We take a look at your resume and cover letter. If we see a match, we will invite you within 5 working days for a video call to get to know each other. If this goes well you will be asked to take an assessment in Python after which we will schedule a face-to-face interview at our headquarters in Amsterdam. If both sides would like to proceed we will schedule a chat with our Process Excellence lead as the second step in the interview process. This will be followed up with a third chat with a global engineering manager and your final interview will be with our Head of Business Development and CEO.  

The interviews will be scheduled one after the other quickly, in order to let you know as soon as possible if you can start at HelloFresh! 

**Interested or questions?**

Feel free to contact  **Ard-Jan**  by [email](mailto:ard-jan@hellofresh.nl) if you have any questions. Do you want to apply? Please click on the ‘apply’ button below and make sure to add your resume and cover letter in English. Incomplete applications and applications via email are not taken into consideration. 

*Before applying please make sure you are eligible to work in the Netherlands, unfortunately, we do not sponsor any work visa or permits for this position. *

*We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.*

**Proactive talent acquisition from third parties is not appreciated.**

jobs.title: Data Science - Intern
jobs.description:
## About HelloFresh

At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 7 years we've seen this mission spread beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market.

So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of inspired, energised home cooks that expands across the globe. We are one of the fastest growing meal kit businesses and are active and growing in 13 different countries across 3 continents.

If you would like to join an energetic and highly motivated team and work in a dynamic, high-energy, high-growth field where you can really have an impact and make a difference every single day then join us and become part of developing a global fresh food champion.

## Job description

This role is a fantastic opportunity for a recent graduate with a computer science background. You must be eligible to work full-time (Monday to Friday) for a duration of 7 months. We are looking for a driven, communicative person with strong analytical and problem solving skills. Furthermore we are looking for a tech savvy person with experience using Python for machine learning, and must be able to start in June 2020.

On a daily basis, you will be at the centre of our internal tech activity, responsible for creating tools that enable our marketing team to grow our user base and increase their retention.

**You will...  **

- Build your own machine learning models using the latest techniques to improve marketing decision making
- Oversee the full data science process, including meeting with stakeholders, gathering requirements, design, development, testing, deployment, user training.
- Maintain, debug and improve existing models.
- Analyse large amounts of data and present insights to support decision science

## **Mandatory requirements**

**You have...  **

- A Degree in Mathematics or Computer Science
- An outstanding level of numerical and analytical thinking with a very logical approach
- Extensive hands-on experience working with SQL and Python at an advanced level, with the aspiration to expand your skills to other development tools
- The ability to manage a project from start to finish and deliver on time
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills with both technical and non-technical individuals

**You are ...**

- Obsessed with food!
- Passionate about our business
- Proactive, ambitious and assertive
- Motivated by being part of an extremely fast-paced business

**Duration:** 7 months paid internship. You must be able to commit full-time (Monday to Friday 9 am - 6 pm). You must have the right to work full-time in Australia for the duration of the contract.

**Start date:** June 2020

jobs.title: Director Marketing Communication (m/f/x)
jobs.description:
At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week.

We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 12 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London, Amsterdam and Copenhagen and shipped out more than 250 Million meals in 2019. 

Our more than 5,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged.

We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. 

We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us.

## **About the job**

- Lead the Global Content and Consumer PR at HelloFresh 
- Drive the development of the integrated communications strategy across all international  markets. 
- Responsible for the setup of content in Social Media, video content, onsite and across PR Channels, including high level brand influencer campaigns. 
- Definition of messaging communication including Sustainability.
- Align and integrate communication planning for all international markets
- Manage the country organisations and guide and support them in their initiatives, 
- Manage the global Marketing Communications team as well as the local teams in 6 different country offices
- **Close collaboration with Performance Marketing**
- Close collaboration with Product Marketing for communication rollouts
- Close collaboration with CXP & UX for communication
- Tracking of integrated comms performance

## **Who we are looking for**

- Senior professional with min. 10 years' experience in **DIGITAL** Marketing & Communications
- Part of the experience should ideally come from PR and/or communication agencies
- Strong knowledge of all channels (social media, PR, copywriting)
- Strong understanding of how content, channel usage and performance tracking go hand in hand
- Performance-oriented mindset
- Collaborative yet decisive personality
- Ability to manage and coordinate a large team that is not always visible to you
- Ability to cope with a constant level of ambiguity
- Ability to find pragmatic yet smart solutions and  adapt to the fast pace.
- Ability to set and maintain structures

## **What we offer**

- Work for a love-brand
- Be at the fore-front of creative development
- Work with top players in the market
- The chance to have a serious impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase
- A vibrant, international environment
- A guaranteed steep learning curve
- Competitive compensation incl. participation in HelloFresh’s VSOP and RSU program 2018
- Sabbatical policy
- Benefit from our selection of employee perks (significant reduction on your HelloFresh boxes, discount on the HelloFresh GO vending machines, free German classes, Geek Friday, discounts for our neighboring Fitness Studio & Urban Sports Club, annual budget for training and development initiatives, weekly Yoga Classes, Summer & Winter Party)

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date.

jobs.title: Director, Operations
jobs.description:
***Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh! ***

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  

We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people.

The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

We are looking for an experienced, strategy-driven operations leader who has a track record of building high functioning teams, is customer obsessed, has a passion for flawless execution, data driven, hands-on, & is interested in being part of a team building a “best in class” food fulfillment operations.

The Director, Operations drives the culture & leads the daily activities for a high-volume pick, pack, & ship Fulfillment Center. You will work directly with our regional Vice President to be in charge of building out & leading the operational road map for our largest facility. Your time will be spent between managing the daily operational logistics of the fulfillment center, creating a positive workplace culture for over 450 employees, mentoring the leadership team, and driving continuous improvement. This person will have a seat at the table and be given the opportunity to make decisions that will impact the company as a whole.

**You will...**

- Build & establish a strong team with a leadership pipeline; coach and develop talent within each functional area of fulfillment (Fulfillment, Quality, Warehouse, and Shipping)
- Develop trust, credibility, effective and collaborative relationships with Hellofresh peers and direct reports
- Be the liaison between the site operations and other functions within Headquarters, helping your team to identify the key priorities for the site
- Develop high standards for execution to meet all KPI’s & financial metrics while supporting your team in achieving daily, weekly, monthly and annual goals
- Ensure adequate communication of company goals and priorities to full Fulfillment Center team, including leading monthly meetings to engage and inspire a diverse, growing workforce
- Drive continuous improvement when it comes to Safety, Quality, Cost, and Delivery.
- Create a positive team dynamic that encourages all employees in the fulfillment center to:
  - Provide timely feedback to direct/indirect reports.
  - Drive positive change within the facility
  - Adapt to the ever-changing business needs and ensure that the team does the same
  - Actively listen and accept feedback; convey ideas and/or concerns; communicate and hold operators accountable to the HF brand, KPI’s, and culture.

**You are...**

- Bold: you’re adventurous, outgoing and optimistic; you’re confident making decisions and taking calculated risk
- Entrepreneurial Spirit: you have the vision, passion, and imagination; you are not afraid to ask, ‘what if’ and constantly challenge the status quo
- Versatile: you roll with the punches and don’t get overwhelmed easily; you enjoy grinding away at issues and have a knack for delivering results in hyper-growth, constantly changing environments
- Analytical: data is your friend; you're able to translate numbers into action and pave the way for efficiency
- Team-oriented: you have a track record of leading cross-functional teams and cultivating collaborative partnerships at all levels and departments of an organization
- Strategic: you recognize and resolve situations that are ambiguous or challenging and use logic to identify alternatives, evaluate, and present approaches to solving complex problems while thinking in terms of contingency plans
- Customer-focused: slightly obsessive-compulsive when it comes to customer experience and strive to deliver a product that is second to none

**You have...**

- 10+ years of management experience leading a fulfillment operations center; preferably in food service, food production or kitting
- Bachelor's Degree required - Master's preferred
- Ability to think strategically and communicate at the executive level, coupled with top-notch organizational skills and an attention to detail
- Familiarity with FSMA, HACCP, SQF
- APICS CPIM or CSCP certification (preferred)
- Demonstrated ability to effectively motivate, develop and manage 700 employees a day - our culture is a critical part of our success, and you are directly responsible for driving it
- Deep knowledge of Lean and Agile Production
- Comprehensive background in Fulfillment, Shipping, Receiving, and Warehousing
- Inventory control management with a background in building/improving warehouse management or inventory tracking systems (WMS implementation a plus)
- Excitement for working in an environment with a high level of ambiguity and change
- Interest in spending most of your time on the shop floor and working directly with all levels of staff
- Demonstrated success at delivering new product initiatives in both a large company and start-up environments
- Strong continuous improvement skills
- A customer service obsession and a willingness to do whatever it takes to satisfy customer needs
- Effective communication and are a leader for employees, direct reports, cross-functional teams and executive leadership
- Proven ability to quickly adapt to business needs
- Willing to work weekends and/or night shifts when needed
- High level of integrity and ethics

**You’ll get…**

- Competitive Salary & 401k company match that vests immediately upon participation
- Generous parental leave of 16 weeks & PTO policy, as well as paid holidays off
- $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans
- Amazing discounts, including up to 75% off HelloFresh subscription
- Flexible shift scheduling & advancement opportunities 
- Emergency child and adult care services
- Snacks & monthly catered lunches
- Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company

It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because he or she is a protected veteran.

jobs.title: Finance Executive
jobs.description:
HelloFresh is on a mission to transform the way the world thinks about home cooking. Forget the hassle of supermarkets, or the tiresome process of planning your weekly meals - we deliver to your door all the ingredients, instructions and inspiration needed to make delicious meals at home, from scratch.

Not only have we been named Europe’s fastest growing start-up in the past, but at just 8 years in, we’re the industry leader. Along the way, we’ve delivered hundreds of millions of meals to millions of households worldwide and are passionate about disrupting one of the last industries to go online - food and grocery.

So, if you’re keen to join a dynamic and energetic team, look no further!

About the job:

This is the perfect opportunity for someone with attention to detail, to join our Finance Team and help us improve reporting efficiencies and processes.

What you will be doing:

- Preparation and updating templates for management reporting and budget submissions. 
- Ownership of key business models ensuring accuracy for quarterly budgeting process 
- Analyse and stress test underlying assumptions for financial modelling.
- Analysis of dashboards and reporting on key business metrics to stakeholders. 
- Preparation of cash flow forecasts, working closely with the Accounting Manager on managing cashflow and assessing capital implications of business decisions. 
- Providing analytical insights and Ad-hoc process improvements on existing systems and models.
- Supporting Business Partners on strategic project initiatives with in-depth analysis, ensuring information is being reported accurately. 
- Other finance duties as required.

 

Who you are:

- Understands double entry and the structure of the P&L and Balance sheet – is numerate and can make and understand adjusting journals.
- A focused self-starter with good attention to detail. Able to handle multiple tasks and priorities.
- Organised and efficient. Able to work in a busy and fast-moving office and under pressure.
- Process driven, analytical mindset with an eagerness to learn and develop. 
- Proficiency in SQL a bonus. 
- Drive to continuously improve and build processes.
- Excellent Microsoft Excel skills. 

 

What you will get in return:

- 70% discount on HelloFresh boxes
- Free local gym access or private health care
- Breakfast everyday
- Weekly after work drinks and socials
- Pension scheme contribution
- Fantastic social activities (we once transformed our office into a multilevel, mini golf course!)

Start date: ASAP

Location: The HelloFresh Farm, 60 Worship Street, EC2A 2EZ, London

Recruitment process: first, you will have a phone interview with a member of our Talent Acquisition team. Should you be successful, we will invite you for two interviews: one competency interview and one culture fit interview.

jobs.title: Financial Accountant
jobs.description:
**Join our HelloFresh family**

At HelloFresh we love food and our mission is to change the way people eat forever. That change comes conveniently packaged in a box - a HelloFresh Box, filled with the best fresh ingredients. With our meal boxes with easy to cook recipes and fresh ingredients, we are driving change in the quickly evolving food industry. From developing our recipes to delivering the boxes - the customer is at the center of everything we do. Our aim is to make every meal a moment to look forward to, for everyone at the table. No surprise then that data is our friend and for us, learning never stops. We make quick but informed decisions and as a fast-growing company, we value flexibility and speed.

**HelloFresh needs you****!**

For our young and passionate team, we are looking for an Accountant. Working in the Finance team, you will assist in multiple accounting tasks that ensure HelloFresh can continue to perform as well as possible. You will report directly to the Financial Controller and be based in the Amsterdam Head Office.

You’ll be responsible for, but not limited to the following: 

- Maintaining accounting records for up to 4 entities, across all countries
- Month-end close support
- Management of accruals for Operational and Marketing teams
- Weekly Cash Reconciliations
- Booking of intercompany transactions
- Support of yearly financial statements and tax calculations
- Support during internal and external audits
- Plenty of opportunities to further your career and learn new tasks

**Are you the perfect Financial Accountant?**

You have 0-2 years of Accounting experience in a Head Office environment, are eager to learn and progress your career in Accountancy. You don’t shy away from a challenge and are able to perform in a fast-paced and challenging work environment. You have experience with Oracle and are fluent in English. Fluancy in Dutch is a plus. Finally, you have a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree and are keen on pursuing the RA qualification.

**What do we offer you?**

- An opportunity to have a serious impact on our financial processes in the Benelux and France;
- A lot of learning- and development opportunities within a young and dynamic e-commerce company;
- Freedom of idea and initiative, execution and implementation of your own ideas and initiatives;
- You can make use of the company benefits, like food and fruit in the office, sports classes, such as yoga, boot camp, and boxing class. 
- An amazing team and office in Amsterdam, check it out [here](http://media.licdn.com/embeds/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2F1ZKrhiVypkw%3Ffeature%3Doembed&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3D1ZKrhiVypkw&type=text%2Fhtml&schema=youtube)!
- Next, to that, you also get a discount on the HelloFresh box. 
- And of course, you’ll earn a competitive salary.

**What is next?**

We take a look at your resume and cover letter. If we see a match, we will invite you within 5 working days for a video call to get to know each other. Are we still positive? We will schedule a face-to-face interview at our headquarters in Amsterdam. If both sides would like to proceed, we will schedule a chat with our CEO as the last step in the interview process. We will schedule the interviews one after the other quickly, in order to let you know as fast as possible if you can start at HelloFresh! 

*We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.*

**Are you interested or do you have questions?**

Feel free to send a message to [Ard-Jan](mailto:%20ard-jan@hellofresh.nl). Do you want to send us your application? Nice! Please do as following; click on the 'apply' button below and fill out the mandatory fields. Upload your resume and cover letter and that's it. Applications send by email will not be processed. 

*Before applying please make sure you are eligible to work in the Netherlands, unfortunately, we do not sponsor any work visa or permits for this position. *

**Proactive talent acquisition from third parties is not appreciated.**

From developing our recipes to delivering the boxes - the customer is at the center of everything we do. Our aim is to make every meal a moment to look forward to, for everyone at the table. No surprise then that data is our friend and for us, learning never stops. We make quick but informed decisions and as a fast-growing company, we value flexibility and speed.

HelloFresh needs you!

For our young and passionate team, we are looking for an Accountant. Working in the Finance team, you will assist in multiple accounting tasks that ensure HelloFresh can continue to perform as well as possible. You will report directly to the Financial Controller and be based in the Amsterdam Head Office.

You’ll be responsible for, but not limited to the following:

  • Maintaining accounting records for up to 4 entities, across all countries
  • Month-end close support
  • Management of accruals for Operational and Marketing teams
  • Weekly Cash Reconciliations
  • Booking of intercompany transactions
  • Support of yearly financial statements and tax calculations
  • Support during internal and external audits
  • Plenty of opportunities to further your career and learn new tasks

Are you the perfect Financial Accountant?

You have 0-2 years of Accounting experience in a Head Office environment, are eager to learn and progress your career in Accountancy. You don’t shy away from a challenge and are able to perform in a fast-paced and challenging work environment. You have experience with Oracle and are fluent in English. Fluancy in Dutch is a plus. Finally, you have a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree and are keen on pursuing the RA qualification.

What do we offer you?

  • An opportunity to have a serious impact on our financial processes in the Benelux and France;
  • A lot of learning- and development opportunities within a young and dynamic e-commerce company;
  • Freedom of idea and initiative, execution and implementation of your own ideas and initiatives;
  • You can make use of the company benefits, like food and fruit in the office, sports classes, such as yoga, boot camp, and boxing class.
  • An amazing team and office in Amsterdam, check it out here!
  • Next, to that, you also get a discount on the HelloFresh box.
  • And of course, you’ll earn a competitive salary.

What is next?

We take a look at your resume and cover letter. If we see a match, we will invite you within 5 working days for a video call to get to know each other. Are we still positive? We will schedule a face-to-face interview at our headquarters in Amsterdam. If both sides would like to proceed, we will schedule a chat with our CEO as the last step in the interview process. We will schedule the interviews one after the other quickly, in order to let you know as fast as possible if you can start at HelloFresh!

We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.

Are you interested or do you have questions?

Feel free to send a message to Ard-Jan. Do you want to send us your application? Nice! Please do as following; click on the 'apply' button below and fill out the mandatory fields. Upload your resume and cover letter and that's it. Applications send by email will not be processed.

*Before applying please make sure you are eligible to work in the Netherlands, unfortunately, we do not sponsor any work visa or permits for this position. *

Proactive talent acquisition from third parties is not appreciated.

jobs.title: Financial Accountant - HelloFreshGO (m/w/x)
jobs.description:
[HelloFreshGO](https://www.hellofreshgo.de/en/) hat die Mission, das Mittagessen im Büro zu revolutionieren. Der smarte HelloFreshGO Essensautomat ermöglicht es Mitarbeitern sich preisgünstig jederzeit mit gesundem und leckerem Essen direkt im Büro zu verpflegen.

Bei uns hast Du das Beste aus zwei Welten - echtes Start-up Feeling in unserem HelloFreshGO Team sowie Zugang zu HelloFresh’s Netzwerk und professioneller Erfahrung. ## **Deine Aufgabe**

- Du unterstützt bei der Erstellung von Monats-, Quartals- und Jahresabschlüssen nach IFRS und HGB
- Du führst eigenständig in der Debitorenbuchhaltung anfallende Aufgaben, prüfst und buchst Rechnungen und Zahlungseingänge von Kunden und betreibst die Pflege der offenen Posten-Konten und Saldenabstimmungen sowie Abklärungen mit Kunden
- Du buchst Geschäftsvorfälle und führst Abstimmungen von Konten und Bearbeitung von bilanziellen Fragestellungen durch
- Du kommunizierst mit Steuerberatern, Wirtschaftsprüfern und Behörden bei Bedarf
- Du unterstützt das Controlling-Team mit ad-hoc Analysen und entsprechenden Empfehlungen
- Du bringst Deine eigenen Ideen mit und strebst nach der ständiger Optimierung von Arbeitsabläufen und Prozessen

## **Dein Profil**

- Du hast eine erfolgreich abgeschlossene kaufmännische Berufsausbildung und Weiterbildung zum Finanzbuchhalter/Bilanzbuchhalter oder ein Bachelorstudium in Accounting (m/w/d)
- Du hast 1 bis 3 Jahre Berufserfahrung in den Bereichen Finanzbuchhaltung und hast aktuelle Buchhaltungs- und Steuerkenntnisse
- Du bist sicher im Umgang mit Excel und hast schon Erfahrungen mit Finanz­buchhaltungs­systemen
- Du verfügst über ausgezeichnete Kommunikations- und Präsentationsfähigkeiten und findest schnell den Draht zu anderen Leuten in einem Business-Setting
- Du überzeugst mit Deiner analytischen Denkweise und gibst Dich nicht mit dem Status Quo zufrieden
- Die Fähigkeit, in einem schnelllebigen Umfeld zu arbeiten sowie die Überzeugung, dass großartige Dinge geschafft werden können, wenn man sich dafür einsetzt, zeichnen Dich aus
- Du bist mit der Unternehmenskultur von Start-ups vertraut
- Fließende Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse setzen wir voraus 

## **Das bieten wir Dir**

- Du hast die Möglichkeit ein Teil eines schnell wachsenden Technologieunternehmens zu werden und wesentlich in der Entwicklung unseres neuen und innovativen Geschäftsmodells mitzuwirken
- Ein motiviertes Team, das sich gegenseitig unterstützt und antreibt
- Arbeiten in einem pulsierenden und internationalen Umfeld
- Eine steile Lernkurve und einen Karrierebooster
- Ein wettbewerbsfähiges Gehalt

## **Bist Du bereit für eine neue Herausforderung? Wir freuen uns darauf Dich kennenzulernen!**

Bewirb Dich online mit Deinem nächstmöglichen Starttermin und Deiner Gehaltsvorstellung.

jobs.title: Food Quality Assurance Tech AM/PM
jobs.description:
Green Chef is the leading and first certified organic meal kit company in the US. We are passionate about making it easier to eat healthfully at home. Founded in September of 2014, Green Chef is already a national force with hundreds of employees and tens of thousands of customers relying on us to help them eat well.

In 2018, HelloFresh Inc. saw something special in Green Chef and brought it into the Hello Fresh family. Green Chef is now part of one of the fastest growing startups in the US, and part of the world’s largest meal kit family as we tirelessly work to disrupt the food industry.  

We remain focused on delivering healthy, organic meals, designed for busy people. At Green Chef, we believe in creating thoughtful food experiences from planting to plating. We strive to create greater interaction and meaningful connections with the food that nourishes us, the people who provide it, and the ones we share it with. Green Chef offers a variety of specialty lifestyle plans including Keto, Paleo, Vegan, Vegetarian, Gluten-Free, Omnivore, and Carnivore.

 

### Essential Functions:

    - Be competent to implement and maintain HACCP based food safety plans and documents
    - Training of production employees (Food Safety, HACCP, etc.)
    - Ensuring sanitation standards are met, overseeing cleanup procedures for compliance
    - Participate in “outside” audits or regulatory visits, such as HACCP, COOF, FDA, and State health inspections
    - Report problems or inconsistencies with any procedure to supervisors or management
    - Follow up with employees regarding HACCP paperwork completeness and accuracy
    - Proactively look for ways to improve and in all areas of production
    - Assist in any and all areas of the facility
 
### Responsibilities:

    - In the event of a product nonconformance, responsibilities include:
    - Identify affected inventory in production to ensure it is physically located and accounted for
    - Quarantine affected product
    - Inform production team and keep them updated as necessary
    - Completion of HACCP paperwork – Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Quarterly; verify that it is completed and turned in.
    - Verifies HACCP forms and checks for accuracy and completeness
    - Completes daily sanitation, facility, and quality check documents
    - Works with managers to make claims on damaged or nonconforming product received at facility
    - Meets with team leaders during shift to determine needs; to answer questions regarding production or quality troubleshooting
    - Weekly Thermometer calibration state checks against NIST thermometer
    - Monitors temperature of cooler routinely throughout week
    - Routine swabbing and good sampling practices to send to 3rd party laboratory
    - Perform monthly internal audits with QA manager to ensure all Food Safety procedures are being completed correctly
    - Lot tracking and cooler/freezer organization
 
### Required Experience/Education:

    - High school diploma or equivalent
    - College degree preferred
    - Prior HACCP Training preferred
    - Some produce/food knowledge for quality assessments
    - Quality Control or quality assurance experience preferred
 
### Physical Demands:

    - Ability to lift up 50 pounds regularly  
    - Ability to stand for prolonged periods of time (10+ hours)
    - Regular stooping, squatting, bending, twisting, and walking

### Working Conditions:

    - Temperature controlled warehouse environment
    - Must be able to withstand temperatures ranging from under 40 degrees Fahrenheit to ambient room temperature

### Perks:

    - PTO
    - Medical
    - Dental 
    - Vision
    - Voluntary Life and AD&D
    - Short Term Disability
    - Pet Insurance 
    - Daily meal and snacks

Our team is diverse, high-performing and international, helping us to create a truly inspiring work environment in which you will thrive!

*It is the policy of Green Chef and HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because he or she is a protected veteran.*

jobs.title: Food Safety & Quality Assurance Technologist
jobs.description:
At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week.

We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 12 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London and Amsterdam. Our more than 4,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged.

We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us.

## **The Job **

This role is a fantastic opportunity for you to be part of a true start up and part of the journey in launching and growing HelloFresh in the Nordics. You will work hand in hand with our procurement, production and culinary teams to ensure legal compliance of the HelloFresh system from the warehouse to the consumer communication on our recipe cards, website and packing. You will be based in our office in Copenhagen. Some travel to our warehouse in Helsingborg is expected.

Your main tasks will be:

- Work closely with the product team in managing food safety and quality from inbounding to despatch, including ensure conformance to HelloFresh standards, Food Safety Regulations, GMP, GHP, including equipment and environmental sanitation
- Work with the procurement team and our suppliers to proactively manage suppliers’ compliance with legal & HelloFresh requirements, review and approve supplier specifications and onboard new suppliers
- Support in creating and reviewing product labels and packaging as well as ensure that websites and recipes cards are accurate and consistent
- Implement corrective / preventative actions arising from internal audits, customer complaints, regulatory visits, Root Cause Analysis or other internal / external processes
- Collaborate with the International FSQA teams on strategic projects successfully adopting and implementing these locally

## **Who we are looking for**

- Master's degree in Food Science or similar discipline in Sweden or Denmark with top performance
- Ideally minimum 12 months experience in a food safety / quality role within manufacturing, pharmaceutical, retail, food industries
- Understanding of Food Safety & Quality Management System, HACCP, GMP
- Good analytical skills – strong command of Excel/Google Sheets and Word is a must
- Great organisational and time management skills
- Energy, enthusiasm, commitment and a can-do flexible attitude
- Embraces change, challenge and working in an autonomous way
- Professional fluency in Swedish and/or Danish is a requirement

## **What we offer **

- The chance to have a serious, direct impact on the food safety and quality setup in one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase
- A vibrant, international environment
- A steep learning curve
- Competitive compensation
- Significant reduction on your HelloFresh boxes

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date.

jobs.title: Food Safety and Quality Assurance Technician - 3 Months Contract
jobs.description:
## About HelloFresh...

At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 7 years we've seen this mission spread around the world and beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market.

So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of encouraged, energised home cooks that expands across the globe. We are one of the fastest growing meal kit businesses and are active and growing in 10+ different countries across 3 continents. Our growth trajectory and expansion has been phenomenal and we have launched facilities across Canada and have recently added Chef’s Plate to our team!

If you would like to join an energetic and highly motivated team and work in a dynamic, high-energy, high-growth field where you can really have an impact and make a difference every single day then join us and become part of developing a global fresh food champion.

As a Food Safety and Quality Assurance Technician at our BC locations, you will support the practice of maintaining the highest level of food safety and quality in our products and help define the direction of the industry. We are looking for two FSQA techs to join us during this period with each working from our Abbotsford or Langley Distribution Centres.

This is a 3 month full time opportunity with the possibility of extension

## The Opportunity:

- An FSQA Technician is the first checkpoint in an effective food safety and quality assurance system. They are responsible for monitoring a variety of processes to ensure our customers have an amazing experience when opening a HelloFresh box. You will report to the site FSQA Manager and will work closely with the Production and Receiving teams to uphold our FSQA standards at the distribution center. This will involve quantitative measurements, environmental and product sampling, inspection of incoming raw materials and observation of the production process.

## What you'll do:

- Be involved in quality control activities in all aspects of the HelloFresh operation which include but are not limited to inbounding, on-line packing, portioning and outbound
- Communicate with the FSQA Team, Procurement and Production in case of product quality non-conformance
- Perform root cause analyses surrounding non-conformances and process deviations to determine what corrective action should be taken within the limits of standard practices
- Responsible for compilation and maintenance of inspection reports and records (ex. GMP records, temp logs)
- Perform pre and post-operational sanitation reviews of the food processing environment and equipment, including swabbing
- Conduct environmental sampling and facility audits
- Maintain clear and concise communication with the Operations, Procurement and Logistics teams
- Deliver FSQA training to new and existing associates
- Support the FSQA Manager during third party and/or internal audits
- Uphold HelloFresh’s protocol for achieving the highest level of food safety and quality assurance

## Who you are:

- Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Biological or Food Sciences
- 0-2 years experience in a food production and/or warehouse environment
- Experience working in GMP environment with a strong understanding of FSQA principles
- Working knowledge of applicable federal, provincial and local food safety regulations is an asset
- Entrepreneurial with the attitude of being hands-on and getting things done
- Comfortable working in a deadline-driven and fast-paced environment
- Team player who is comfortable collaborating with other departments but also working independently
- Proactive, ambitious, and assertive: you take ownership of your work and should think beyond the scope of a given assignment
- Comfortable working in a cold environment, standing and walking for duration of shift and able to lift up to 15 kgs
- Familiar with MS Office, Google Apps and comfortable learning new technology
- Strong written and verbal communication skills
- Flexible with working hours for business requirements, including early morning and late night shifts. 
- Strong passion for food is a must!

The above list of job duties is not exclusive or exhaustive and the candidate will be required to undertake such tasks as may reasonably be expected within the scope of the role.

## **What you’ll get in return:**

- Competitive salary and company benefits
- 75% discount on HelloFresh boxes
- High level of responsibility from day one
- The opportunity to rapidly advance your career
- Working with a fun, ambitious and supportive team

If this sounds like you, please click the "Apply Now" button. If this role doesn't quite match what you're looking for, but you'd like to know more about joining the HelloFresh team, please visit our Jobs page to view our other vacancies. We'd love to hear from you!

jobs.title: French Content Internship
jobs.description:
**Join our HelloFresh family**

At HelloFresh we love food and our mission is to change the way people eat forever. That change comes conveniently packaged in a box - a HelloFresh Box, filled with the best fresh ingredients. With our meal boxes with easy to cook recipes and fresh ingredients, we are driving change in the quickly evolving food industry. From developing our recipes to delivering the boxes - the customer is at the center of everything we do. Our aim is to make every meal a moment to look forward to, for everyone at the table. No surprise then that data is our friend and for us, learning never stops. We make quick but informed decisions and as a fast-growing company, we value flexibility and speed.

**HelloFresh needs you**

For our young and passionate team in Amsterdam, we are looking for a French Content Intern to join our Community Team **starting in August/September**. In a bigger picture, you are part of the Brand & Communication Team. You will be supporting the Community Team in creating content in French. You will be creating content for different touch points like Social Media, Newsletters and our in-box Magazine. Your role is also about supporting the team in analyzing the performance of the copy you created. Besides this, you will be also collaborating with the PR team, design team, product marketing team and recipe developers. 

You’ll be working on:

- Creating, planning and analyzing all the content for social media pages: Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest, YouTube (for France, Belgium, Luxembourg)
- Writing blog articles and print magazine to put in the box
- Write content for the newsletter
- Work closely with the design team to brief and get visuals ready for different campaigns
- Other projects: influencers content, Sustainability, customer care training, paid social campaigns etc.

**Are you the perfect Content Intern?**

We are looking for someone who is in the last phase of their marketing, media or communication bachelor or master’s degree. You have strong organizational skills and can manage multiple tasks without stressing out. Never a dull moment at HelloFresh! You think before you  
act, have a can-do mentality, pay attention to details and are keen to achieve great results. You will be working with different teams, so you need to be collaborative and have strong communication skills. Your writing skills will be essential but also your creative mind. You are always seeking for new ideas and aware of new trends on social media. To apply to this job, you need to speak French (language of work) and English (language of the company), be available for 5-6 months, starting in August - September 2020. 

**What do we offer you?**

- Make a serious impact on consumer perception of the brand;
- A lot of learning- and development opportunities within a young and dynamic e-commerce company;
- Freedom of idea and initiative, execution and implementation of your own ideas and initiatives;
- You can make use of the company benefits, like food and fruit in the office, sports classes, such as yoga, boot camp, and boxing class.
- An amazing team and office in Amsterdam, check it out [here](http://media.licdn.com/embeds/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2F1ZKrhiVypkw%3Ffeature%3Doembed&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3D1ZKrhiVypkw&type=text%2Fhtml&schema=youtube)!
- Next, to that, you also get a discount on the HelloFresh Box.
- And of course, you’ll earn a compensation of 500 EUR gross per month, based on a 40-hour work week.

**Which steps do I need to take to get this job?**

We take a look at your resume and cover letter. If we see a match, we will invite you for a video interview. Are we still positive? We will invite you to make a case to show your writing skills. We will schedule a face-to-face interview / video call at our headquarters in Amsterdam. We will schedule the interviews one after the other quickly, in order to let you know as fast as possible if you can start at HelloFresh!

 

We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.

**Are you interested or do you have questions?**

Feel free to send a message to [Hedwig](mailto:hedwigschaap@hellofresh.nl). Do you want to send us your application? Nice! Please click on the 'apply' button below and fill out the mandatory fields. Upload your resume and cover letter and that's it. Applications send by email will not be processed.

*Before applying please make sure you are eligible to work in the Netherlands, unfortunately, we do not sponsor any work visa or permits for this position.*

**Proactive talent acquisition from third parties is not appreciated.**

jobs.description:
## About HelloFresh

At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 7 years we've seen this mission spread beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market.

So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of inspired, energised home cooks that expands across the globe. We are one of the fastest growing meal kit businesses and are active and growing in 13 different countries across 3 continents.

If you would like to join an energetic and highly motivated team and work in a dynamic, high-energy, high-growth field where you can really have an impact and make a difference every single day then join us and become part of developing a global fresh food champion.

## Job description

This role is a fantastic opportunity for a recent graduate with a computer science background. You must be eligible to work full-time (Monday to Friday) for a duration of 6 months. We are looking for a driven, communicative person with strong analytical and problem solving skills. Furthermore we are looking for a tech savvy person with experience using Python for developing online tools, and must be able to start in May or June 2020.

On a daily basis, you will be at the centre of our internal tech activity, responsible for creating tools that enable our marketing team to grow our user base and increase their retention.

**You will...  **

- Build your own tools within our existing infrastructure to make the marketing team more efficient and effective
- Oversee the full software development lifecycle, including meeting with stakeholders, gathering requirements, design, development, testing, deployment, user training.
- Be involved in full-stack web development, including front-end, back-end, designing databases, deployment, APIs, UI and UX.
- Debug and add features to existing tools.

## **Mandatory requirements**

**You have...  **

- A Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
- An outstanding level of analytical thinking with a very logical approach, and a willingness to become an expert in all aspects of front-end and back-end.
- Extensive hands-on experience working with Python, HTML and CSS at an advanced level, with the aspiration to expand your skills to other development tools such as AWS
- The ability to manage a project from start to finish and deliver on time
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills with both technical and non-technical individuals.

**You are ...**

- Obsessed with food!
- Passionate about our business
- Proactive, ambitious and assertive
- Motivated by being part of an extremely fast-paced business

**Duration:** 6 months paid internship. You must be able to commit Full-Time (Monday to Friday 9 am - 6 pm). You must have the right to work full-time in Australia for the duration of the contract.

**Start date:** May / June 2020

jobs.title: Growth Manager (m/f/x)
jobs.description:
## **HelloFresh: Join one of the World’s fastest growing startups**

At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week.

We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 12 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London, Amsterdam and Copenhagen. Our more than 4,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged.

We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us.

## **About the Job**

We are looking for an enthusiastic and highly motivated problem solver who is committed to driving growth across online and offline channels. 

As a Growth Manager for HelloFresh Nordics you will be responsible for driving overall customer growth through new channel innovation and current channel optimisation, focusing on online and offline opportunities. You will be using our customer data and insights to drive a targeted approach to acquisition and to help improve overall ROI of all HelloFresh campaigns.

## **The Job**

- Work with the Marketing team to launch new offline channels and manage existing channels, which could include direct mail, gift cards, partnerships, podcasts, radio, and TV
- Take a strategic approach to managing and optimizing channels to meet CPA, ROI, and budget goals
- Actively investigate and identify high potential opportunities to test and incorporate into channel strategy (e.g., audience / creative / discounts / landing page - optimization)
- Take ownership of all new channel innovation by using customer data and key industry trends to steer the teams’ focus and prioritise new channels to test.

jobs.title: HR Associate (Swing/Night)
jobs.description:
***Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh!***

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  

We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people.

The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

**You will...**

- Provide generalist support to the facility in all areas of Human Resources.
- Recruit, source and select internal and external candidates.
- Assist HR Manager in administering procedures and policies through the Distribution Center
- Provide training support to all levels of associates
- Ensure Open Door, diversity and other values related issues are resolved effectively
- Work alongside the HR Manager to conduct interventions, fact-findings and resolves conflicts as they arise.
- Conduct new hire orientations as needed.
- Deliver, monitor, coach and guides technical and nontechnical training for Distribution Center Supervisors and non-exempt associates.
- Provide coaching, facilitate discussions and makes recommendations for non-exempt associates’ and Supervisors’ development needs.
- Participate in special projects as assigned. 

**You have/are...**

- Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in Human Resources, preferably within food manufacturing/production, CPG, e-Commerce or start-up environment
- Knowledge of recruitment strategies and techniques, employment agency methods and operations, developed skill in interviewing techniques
- Working knowledge of employee relations, diversity, performance management, and employment laws with proven ability to handle confidential information with professionalism and tact
- Solid verbal and nonverbal communications skills, good interpersonal skills, coaching and counseling skills
- Bachelor’s degree or equivalent job experience with SHRM / PHR
- **Must be flexible to work weekends** ; schedule will include 1 weekend day or rotating weekends

 

 It  is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because he or she is a protected veteran.

jobs.title: Health & Safety Specialist - 3 month Contract with possibility for extension
jobs.description:
At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 7 years we've seen this mission spread around the world and beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market. So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of encouraged, energized home cooks that expands across the globe. We are the dominant world leader in the meal-kit market and have grown to operate in 12 different countries across 3 continents.  
If you would like to join an energetic and highly motivated team and work in a dynamic, high-energy, high-growth field where you can really have an impact and make a difference every single day then join us and become part of developing a global fresh food champion.

**The Opportunity**  
Reporting to the FSAQ Manager or HR Generalist, you will be based out of our Edmonton Distribution Centre. The Health and Safety Specialist will support a positive safety culture while complying with safety standards and maintaining a safe work environment. The position will be a 3 month temporary contract. Ability to work flexible shifts including days, nights, and or weekends. 

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Manage the employee check-in process (e.g. check in, temperature testing, online questionnaire answers) 
- Conduct health and safety training, site tours, ensure safety standards are being followed, etc.
- Always maintain social distance measures (e.g. social distance police) 
- Manage attendance – check in, absences, flagged employees, etc. 
- Ensure and track health and safety compliance and take part in the Joint Health and Safety Committee (JHSC), including conduct spot checks and participate in incident investigations
- Manage inventory of safety supplies, ordering as needed and ensuring that costs are appropriately managed (e.g. masks, plastic bags, face shields, plastic gloves) 
- Maintain office, lunchroom area, and outdoor facilities by assisting sanitation with routine maintenance and cleaning. (e.g. ensure areas are being cleaned, regular sanitization schedules are being followed, etc.) 
- Participate in special projects and initiatives as assigned

   
**Required Experience/Education**

- Completed post-secondary in (EHS) Environmental Health and Safety, or related field or equivalent work experience in an OSHA background. 
- 1 year of Health & Safety management and/or executive level support experience (preferred but not required)
- Demonstrated experience in providing high quality customer service and in working with diverse audiences.
- Detail oriented with proven ability to prioritize and work efficiently with minimum direction or supervision
- Excellent organizational skills with ability to perform administrative tasks with high degree of accuracy
- Excellent communication skills (written and verbal), including active listening and proofreading
- Ability to perform at a high level in a fast paced and dynamic work environment
- Ability to demonstrate good, sound judgment
- Experience with Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), Google Suite (Calendar, Gmail, Docs, Sheets), and video conferencing (Hangouts Meet)

Please note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties, or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Duties, responsibilities, and activities may change at any time with or without notice.

**What you’ll get in return:**

- Competitive salary and company benefits
- 75% discount on HelloFresh boxes
- High level of responsibility and autonomy
- Opportunities for professional learning
- Working with a fun, ambitious and supportive team

 

If this sounds like you, please click the "Apply Now" button. If this role doesn't quite match what you're looking for, but you'd like to know more about joining the HelloFresh team, please visit our Jobs page to view our other vacancies. We'd love to hear from you!

jobs.title: Influencer Marketing Internship (Nederlandstalig)
jobs.description:
**Join our HelloFresh family**

At HelloFresh we love food and our mission is to change the way people eat forever. That change comes conveniently packaged in a box - a HelloFresh Box, filled with the best fresh ingredients. With our meal boxes with easy to cook recipes and fresh ingredients, we are driving change in the quickly evolving food industry. From developing our recipes to delivering the boxes - the customer is at the center of everything we do. Our aim is to make every meal a moment to look forward to, for everyone at the table. No surprise then that data is our friend and for us, learning never stops. We make quick but informed decisions and as a fast-growing company, we value flexibility and speed.

**HelloFresh needs you**

For our young and passionate team, we are looking for an influencer marketing intern. Working in the growth team for the Benelux market, you will be working on a variety of growth projects that cover the entire suit of the influencer marketing activities.

You’ll be working on:

- Manage the full execution of unpaid collaborations with influencers who are in line with our brand values from A to Z.
- Support in different influencer campaigns for the Netherlands and Belgium
- Support on influencer marketing projects, like campaigns and influencer briefings
- Keep an eye on social media/marketing trends and developments to give input on our influencer marketing/strategy/improvements

**Are you the perfect Influencer Marketing?**

We are looking for someone who is in the last phases of their marketing, media or communication bachelor or master’s degree, or has already completed it. You have strong organizational skills and can manage multiple tasks in a short period of time without stressing out. Never a dull moment at HelloFresh! You think before you act, have a can-do mentality, pay attention to details and are keen to achieve great results. You will be working with many influencers and with our agencies in Belgium and the Netherlands, so we are looking for someone who is collaborative and has strong communication skills. Do you speak Dutch and English? Great! Do you also speak French? Perfect!

**What do we offer you?**

- Make a serious impact on our marketing initiatives in the Benelux;
- A lot of learning- and development opportunities within a young and dynamic e-commerce company;
- Freedom of idea and initiative, execution and implementation of your own ideas and initiatives;
- You can make use of the company benefits, like food and fruit in the office, sports classes, such as yoga, boot camp, and boxing class.
- An amazing team and office in Amsterdam, check it out [here](http://media.licdn.com/embeds/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2F1ZKrhiVypkw%3Ffeature%3Doembed&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3D1ZKrhiVypkw&type=text%2Fhtml&schema=youtube)!
- Next, to that, you also get a discount on the HelloFresh Box.
- An internship fee of €500 euros per month

**Which steps do I need to take to get this job?**

We take a look at your resume and cover letter. If we see a match, we will invite you within 5 working days for a video interview to get to know each other. Are we still positive? Then we schedule the final video interview with our Influencer Marketing Manager and with the Head of Growth. We will schedule the interviews one after the other quickly, in order to let you know as fast as possible if you can start at HelloFresh!

*We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.*

**Are you interested or do you have questions?**

Feel free to send a message to [Ismail](mailto:ismail@hellofresh.nl). Do you want to send us your application? Nice! Please click on the 'apply' button below and fill out the mandatory fields. Upload your resume and cover letter and that's it. Applications send by email will not be processed.

jobs.title: Inventory Lead
jobs.description:
HelloFresh is on a mission to transform the way the world thinks about home cooking. Forget the hassle of supermarkets, or the tiresome process of planning your weekly meals - we deliver to your door all the ingredients, instructions and inspiration needed to make delicious meals at home, from scratch.

Not only have we been named Europe’s fastest growing start-up in the past, but at just 8 years in, we’re the industry leader. Along the way, we’ve delivered hundreds of millions of meals to millions of households worldwide and are passionate about disrupting one of the last industries to go online - food and grocery.

So, if you’re keen to join a dynamic and energetic team, look no further!

 

**About the role:**

A role that will challenge you but also allow you the freedom to make decisions in the management of a product range that changes weekly and the challenges that come with this. 

 

**What you’ll be doing:**

- To be the point of escalation for the Inventory Coordinators and wider Inventory Team.
- Support with the Goods In and Goods out planning daily with a view to improve this.
- Support with Supplier management to ensure product arrival aligns with Production.
- Support in the generation of Operational critical documents that allow movement of stock around the site.
- Understand, document and improve the operational logic in how stock is received, processed and picked into customer boxes.
- To be a Warehouse Management System Superuser.
- Reacting to changes and problem solving quickly and effectively to minimise disruption.
- Reviewing current ways of working to improve and keep up with the ever-changing operation at Hellofresh.

 

**Who you are:**

- Degree educated or equivalent work experience  
- Good use of Excel. Minimum intermediate level
- Ability to effectively problem solve in a time pressured environment
- Is a natural self starter, who is able to manage their own time
- Someone who is driven to go above and beyond
- Someone who can breakdown a problem, understand the root cause and implement a solution that addresses these root causes
- Strong communication skills
- Energy, enthusiasm, commitment and a can-do flexible attitude
- Embraces change and challenge

 

 

**What you'll get in return:**

- 70% discount on HelloFresh subscription
- 33 days holiday
- Gym membership or Private health insurance
- Access to our employee assistance programme
- Access to our many employee perks including; weekly breakfast, celebrations and on and off site social activities 
- Access to our on site facilities including table tennis and pool table and free hot drinks
- High level of responsibility from day one
- Working with a fun, energetic and supportive team

 

**Start date:** ASAP

**Location:** Banbury, UK

**Working hours:** this role might require working on weekends

**Recruitment process:** first, you will have a phone interview with one member of the Talent Acquisition team. Should you be successful, you will have two video interviews, one competency and one culture-fit. During the competency interview, you will be asked to present a case study.

Not only have we been named Europe’s fastest growing start-up in the past, but at just 8 years in, we’re the industry leader. Along the way, we’ve delivered hundreds of millions of meals to millions of households worldwide and are passionate about disrupting one of the last industries to go online - food and grocery.

So, if you’re keen to join a dynamic and energetic team, look no further!

About the role:

A role that will challenge you but also allow you the freedom to make decisions in the management of a product range that changes weekly and the challenges that come with this.

What you’ll be doing:

  • To be the point of escalation for the Inventory Coordinators and wider Inventory Team.
  • Support with the Goods In and Goods out planning daily with a view to improve this.
  • Support with Supplier management to ensure product arrival aligns with Production.
  • Support in the generation of Operational critical documents that allow movement of stock around the site.
  • Understand, document and improve the operational logic in how stock is received, processed and picked into customer boxes.
  • To be a Warehouse Management System Superuser.
  • Reacting to changes and problem solving quickly and effectively to minimise disruption.
  • Reviewing current ways of working to improve and keep up with the ever-changing operation at Hellofresh.

Who you are:

  • Degree educated or equivalent work experience
  • Good use of Excel. Minimum intermediate level
  • Ability to effectively problem solve in a time pressured environment
  • Is a natural self starter, who is able to manage their own time
  • Someone who is driven to go above and beyond
  • Someone who can breakdown a problem, understand the root cause and implement a solution that addresses these root causes
  • Strong communication skills
  • Energy, enthusiasm, commitment and a can-do flexible attitude
  • Embraces change and challenge

What you'll get in return:

  • 70% discount on HelloFresh subscription
  • 33 days holiday
  • Gym membership or Private health insurance
  • Access to our employee assistance programme
  • Access to our many employee perks including; weekly breakfast, celebrations and on and off site social activities
  • Access to our on site facilities including table tennis and pool table and free hot drinks
  • High level of responsibility from day one
  • Working with a fun, energetic and supportive team

Start date: ASAP

Location: Banbury, UK

Working hours: this role might require working on weekends

Recruitment process: first, you will have a phone interview with one member of the Talent Acquisition team. Should you be successful, you will have two video interviews, one competency and one culture-fit. During the competency interview, you will be asked to present a case study.

jobs.title: Inventory Manager
jobs.description:
The Inventory Manager will be responsible for daily inventory processes, reporting, and control at the Swedesboro, New Jersey Green Chef fulfillment site, as well as being responsible for managing the inventory and produce supervisors assigned to the division. Green Chef is looking for someone who will build, improve, and tightly manage all daily inventory processes. This is a critical role which will work closely with the Financial Controller, Finance Team, Supply Chain and Procurement, and Warehouse Operations to ensure inventory completeness and accuracy. 

** Responsibilities **

- Manage inventory integrity.
- Measure inventory transaction integrity accuracy while providing feedback to the operations and fulfillment teams.
- Develop and execute daily, weekly and monthly action plans that increase inventory accuracy and reduce inventory discrepancies.
- Own the compliance and consistency for policies and procedures surrounding Inventory Control.
- Plan and execute cycle counts as described in each area of the facility.
- Establish and maintain inventory handling procedures within the facility.
- Collaborate with operations on procedures and processes surrounding warehouse management system inventory locations.
- Identify root causes of inventory discrepancies through cause and effect analysis
- Lead and supervise inventory teams at the facilities.
- Carry out supervisory responsibilities in accordance with the organization's policies and procedures.
- Measure and evaluate all inventory work processes.
- Manage and update metrics daily.
- Participate in cross-functional projects impacting inventory.
- Evaluate team productivity and accomplishments.
- Establish and maintain effective relationships with other management staff, employees, and the general public.

### **Requirements**

- Bachelor's degree 
- Supervisory experience in a Distribution or Manufacturing environment
- Experience in Inventory Management, with the proven ability to show improvement in a continually developing environment
- Experience with Warehouse Management Systems (WMS)
- Strong leadership skills and ability to thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced, high-energy, and highly team-oriented environment
- Ability to positively motivate and coach staff to achieve high-quality results
- Excellent problem-solving skills
- Strong interpersonal communication (verbal and written) and collaboration skills
- Demonstrated success working in a team environment on multiple projects with changing priorities with the ability to work both on a team (as member and/or leader) and independently to deliver results
- Experience implementing a wide range of change management and process improvement activities, based on broader organizational goals
- Ability to travel (Up to 10%) to other distribution centers and company headquarters, as needed
- Ability to build and manage a cohesive team that can work together under short timelines and sometimes ambiguous circumstances

jobs.title: Jr Logistics Coordinator - Intern
jobs.description:
## About HelloFresh

At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 7 years we've seen this mission spread beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market.

So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of inspired, energised home cooks that expands across the globe. We are one of the fastest growing meal kit businesses and are active and growing in 13 different countries across 3 continents.

If you would like to join an energetic and highly motivated team and work in a dynamic, high-energy, high-growth field where you can really have an impact and make a difference every single day then join us and become part of developing a global fresh food champion.

## Job description
This is a fantastic opportunity to be part of a true startup and grow HelloFresh in NZ. We are looking for a self motivated and an analytical person with a strong background working with Excel/VBA/Python.In this logistics internship you will be given a lot of responsibilities from day one and be part of a dynamic and multicultural team. 

**You will…**

- Managing of 3PL relations and organizing weekly meetings
- Manage and ensure performance on core logistics KPI's
- Reporting of cost, quality and other performance metrics
- Initiate and own any improvement projects, liaising with internal and external stakeholders
- Drive weekly operational duties

### **Mandatory requirements** 

**You have…**

- Bachelor degree/Masters within business/engineering
- Desirable Previous experience & knowledge in logistics
- A good knowledge of food and ingredients (desirable)
- A proactive problem-solving mindset
- Excitement for working in a start-up environment with high level of ambiguity and change
- Metrics driven mindset
- Strong knowledge in Excel/VBA/Python
- Strong attention to detail skills, proven ability to multi-task, work under pressure, and meet time sensitive deadlines
- Quantitative and analytical experience (either through education or professional experience), including solid comfort with databases, such as MS Excel

**You are ...**

- Obsessed with food!
- Autonomous and self motivated
- Passionate about our business

**What we offer...**

- Heavily discounted HelloFresh boxes
- You work in a passionate and dynamic environment
- Flat hierarchies, constant learning with plenty of room for personal growth

**Duration:**  6 Months paid internship. You must be able to commit Full-Time (Monday to Friday 9 am - 6 pm). You must have the right to work in New Zealand for the duration of the contract.

**Important:** Please be aware of the current travel restrictions. New Zealand has now officially closed its borders for anyone not holding a NZ passport or Residency. This is a drastic measure installed by the government to reduce the chance of a COVID-19

**Start date: May 2020**
