jobs.title: Junior Accountant (m/w/x)
jobs.description:
HelloFresh ist ein weltweit führendes E-Commerce Unternehmen im Bereich Online-Lebensmittel. Wir gestalten mit unseren Kochboxen einen enorm wachsenden Markt wegweisend mit. Mit leckeren und raffinierten Rezepten liefern wir die passenden frischen Zutaten – in bester Qualität und direkt vor die Haustür. Unser dynamisches, hoch motiviertes Team ist die Grundlage unserer extrem schnellen Expansion in neue Märkte. Besonders die internationale Zusammensetzung macht uns zu einem spannenden Arbeitsplatz, an dem jeder Ideen einbringen und umsetzen kann.

Mit deinem buchhalterischen Sachverstand, gepaart mit analytischem Verständnis und finanziellem Sachverstand bist du als Teil des Finance Teams mitverantwortlich für Monats- und Jahresabschlüsse, erstellst Kontenabstimmungen und unterstützt bei der Umsetzung neuer Prozesse. Darüber Hinaus bringst du dich gerne in ein wachsendes Team ein und leistest deinen Teil um zum Erfolg des Unternehmens beizutragen.

## **Deine Aufgabe**

- Mitarbeit bei der Erstellung des monatlichen Abschlüsse und Reportings 
- Unterstützung bei Jahresabschlüssen nach HGB und IFRS 
- Mitarbeit bei der Erstellung des Budgets
- Erstellung von Kontenabstimmungen, betriebswirtschaftlichen Auswertungen und Abweichungsanalysen 
- Unterstützung bei ad-hoc Anfragen
- Kommunikation mit Fachabteilungen, Banken und Wirtschaftsprüfer
- Unterstützung bei Projekten mit buchhalterischem Fokus

## **Dein Profil**

- Abgeschlossenes Hochschulstudium in den Bereichen Accounting, Finance, BWL oder ähnliches.
- Erste Berufserfahrung in einer Buchhaltungs- bzw. Finanzabteilung.
- Du hast ausgezeichnete deutsche und/oder englische Sprachkenntnisse und kannst sowohl im geschäftlichen Umfeld in beiden Sprachen kommunizieren  
- Du arbeitest genau, organisiert und hast mögliche Prozessverbesserungen immer im Blick
- Sehr gute Excel-Kenntnisse und ein ausgeprägtes analytisches Verständnis
- Durch deine Flexibilität lässt du dich auch von kurzfristigen Herausforderungen nicht abschrecken
- Erfahrungen mit Oracle Cloud Financials ist von Vorteil

## **Das bieten wir dir**

- Eine sehr anspruchsvolle Position in einem der Top-3 europäischen Start-ups
- Aktive Beteiligung an vielen wichtigen Projekten von HelloFresh
- Wettbewerbsfähige Vergütung und viel Platz für die persönliche Entwicklung
- Große internationale Präsenz und offene Atmosphäre im Team

## **Ist das deine Challenge?**

Bitte sende uns deine vollständigen Bewerbungsunterlagen inklusive aller relevanten Zeugnisse, deiner Gehaltsvorstellung sowie deines frühestmöglichen Eintrittstermins.

jobs.title: Junior Data & Automation Engineer
jobs.description:
**Join our HelloFresh family**

At HelloFresh we love food and our mission is to change the way people eat forever. That change comes conveniently packaged in a box - a HelloFresh Box, filled with the best fresh ingredients.

With our meal boxes with easy to cook recipes and fresh ingredients, we are driving change in the quickly evolving food industry. From developing our recipes to delivering the boxes - the customer is at the center of everything we do. Our aim is to make every meal a moment to look forward to, for everyone at the table. No surprise then that data is our friend and for us, learning never stops. We make quick but informed decisions and as a fast-growing company, we value flexibility and speed.

**HelloFresh needs you**

For our young and passionate team, we are looking for a Junior Data & Automation Engineer. As a Junior Data & Automation Engineer at HelloFresh, you will be part of a completely new team which will focus on improving and/or building new workflow tools for all the different teams. For example building a data pipeline for the marketing department or build a mapping tool in python for the procurement team.

You’ll be working on: 

- designing, creating and managing ETL pipelines;
- Building completely new and scalable workflow tools from scratch and collaborating closely with the different stakeholders;
- Developing and supporting in the creation of a centralized server-based workflow hub;
- Taking ownership and maintaining, adjusting or improving  existing workflow tools;
- Collaborating closely with our global Tech team, which is based in Berlin.

**Are you the perfect Junior Data & Automation Engineer?**

You have a master’s degree (such as Informatics, Information Sciences or Technical Business Administration) and 0 to 2 years of relevant work or internship experience. We are looking for a candidate who is able to extract, process and load data in Python and who has some experience in SQL (you are able to load a table from our data warehouse). You know how to translate business questions to data solutions. Also, you are a team player, but also perfectly able to work independently and you are fluent in English (both verbal and written). 

You have a keen interest in learning more about the following subjects: :

- working with job orchestration tools like Airflow
- Deploying automation tools e.g. Docker, Kubernetes
- working with Amazon AWS
- Google apps script

**What do we offer you?**

- Make a serious impact on creating more efficient processes within the HelloFresh BENELUX office
- A lot of learning- and development opportunities within a young and dynamic e-commerce company;
- The opportunity to get to know the whole business and work with a lot of different teams locally and internationally;
- Freedom of idea and initiative, execution and implementation of your own ideas and initiatives;
- You can make use of the company benefits, like food and fruit in the office, sports classes, such as yoga, boot camp, and boxing class;
- A discount on the HelloFresh box;
- A competitive salary.

**Which steps do I need to take to get this job?**

We take a look at your resume and cover letter. If we see a match, we will invite you within 5 working days for a video call to get to know each other. If this goes well you will be asked to take an assessment in Python and SQL after which we will schedule another video call with the BI manager. If both sides would like to proceed we will schedule a chat with our Data and automation lead as the last step in the interview process. 

The interviews will be scheduled one after the other quickly, in order to let you know as soon as possible if you can start at HelloFresh! 

*We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.*

**Interested or questions?**

Feel free to contact **Hedwig** by [email](mailto:hedwigschaap@hellofresh.nl) if you have any questions. Do you want to apply? Please click on the ‘apply’ button below and make sure to add your resume and cover letter in English. Incomplete applications and applications via email are not taken into consideration. 

*Before applying please make sure you are eligible to work in the Netherlands, unfortunately, we do not sponsor any work visa or permits for this position. *

**Proactive talent acquisition from third parties is not appreciated.**

jobs.title: Junior Programmatic Marketing Manager (m/f/x)
jobs.description:
At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week.

We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 12 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London, Amsterdam and Copenhagen and shipped out more than 250 Million meals in 2019. 

Our more than 5,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged. We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us. **About the job**

As Junior Programmatic Marketing Manager (m/f/x) you will

- Manage and optimize multiple campaigns at the same time in one or two countries with fast turnaround times
- Identify untapped platforms and expand the reach and scope of each platform
- Be responsible for continuous creative, bidding and segmentation testing
- Work together with our design, landing page, BI teams as well as country teams to make sure that we have the best access for the programmatic campaigns across all campaign funnel steps

## **Who we're looking for**

- 1+ years professional experience in any part of marketing, digital media, online advertising or Had worked with DSP vendors, programmatic trading desk, digital marketing agency, ad network, 3rd party data company or other related digital companies.
- Excellent knowledge and skills of Microsoft suites: Excel and Powerpoint - can create reports and presentations for internal and external teams
- Understanding of digital marketing disciplines from digital display, OTV, SEO, PPC, Ecommerce, social media or affiliate marketing
- Excellent communication skills. You will be the go-to-person for multiple marketing and communication teams. Interpersonal skills are a prerequisite for success.
- Passionate about digital industry and highly digital savvy 
- A Master Degree in Digital/Marketing Will be a plus

## **What we offer**

- The chance to have a serious impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase
- A vibrant, international environment
- A guaranteed steep learning curve & boost for your career
- Competitive compensation
- Sabbatical policy
- Benefit from our selection of employee perks (significant reduction on your HelloFresh boxes, discount on the HelloFreshGO vending machines, free German classes, Geek Friday, discounts for our neighboring Fitness Studio & Urban Sports Club, annual budget for training and development initiatives, weekly Yoga Classes, Summer & Winter Party)

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date.

  • Excellent knowledge and skills of Microsoft suites: Excel and Powerpoint - can create reports and presentations for internal and external teams
  • Understanding of digital marketing disciplines from digital display, OTV, SEO, PPC, Ecommerce, social media or affiliate marketing
  • Excellent communication skills. You will be the go-to-person for multiple marketing and communication teams. Interpersonal skills are a prerequisite for success.
  • Passionate about digital industry and highly digital savvy
  • A Master Degree in Digital/Marketing Will be a plus

What we offer

  • The chance to have a serious impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase
  • A vibrant, international environment
  • A guaranteed steep learning curve & boost for your career
  • Competitive compensation

  • Benefit from our selection of employee perks (significant reduction on your HelloFresh boxes, discount on the HelloFreshGO vending machines, free German classes, Geek Friday, discounts for our neighboring Fitness Studio & Urban Sports Club, annual budget for training and development initiatives, weekly Yoga Classes, Summer & Winter Party)

Are you up for a challenge?

Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date.

jobs.title: Lead Hand
jobs.description:
**About HelloFresh:**

At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 7 years we've seen this mission spread around the world and beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market. So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of encouraged, energized home cooks that expands across the globe. We are one of the fastest growing meal kit businesses and are active and growing in 10 different countries across 3 continents. If you would like to join an energetic and highly motivated team and work in a dynamic, high-energy, high-growth field where you can really have an impact and make a difference every single day then join us and become part of developing a global fresh food champion.

**About the role…**

The *Lead Hand,* supports the vision for the plant on a high level - building the team and crafting its culture. You’ll be accountable for executing Managements processes and procedures ensuring the team follows all procedures consistently and driving measurable, quantitative improvements in performance.

The ideal candidate will lead small groups of associates in Labeling of Packaging Material, Portioning of ingredients, Kitting & Casing. Act as a support for associates to ensure successful task completion (on time and in full) so they are engaged, productive and have a clear focus on problem solving, team work and working to standards. He/she will build trust through effective leadership and skill application of people management processes. ** **

**This Role is Permanent, Full Time. **

**Position Overview**

- Monitor day to day production tasks and enforce speed of work
- Maintain productivity/Efficiency 
- Communicate supervisor of vital errors or issues with production
- Maintain and enforce food safety and workplace safety 

**Role Requirements:**

- Knowledge of a professional discipline, technical specialties, related processes and/or people issues requirements; capable of implementing practical procedures of systems which are moderately complex.  Leadership and organizing skills may be required.
- Can Lead a small group of people, higher level of communication
- 1-2 years work and management experience is required
- Has the authority to direct the colleague’s daily work activities whether within their own department or through cross-functional teams (example: regularly leading project teams with members from across different functions)
- Awareness of Health & Safety in the workplace 
- Great attention to detail and the ability to prioritize a busy workload 
- Ability to challenge and make effective decisions 
- The job requires periods of heavy lifting and standing for most of the day 
- Must be willing and able to work in a refrigerated environment (0° to 5°)
- Legally entitled to work in Canada
- You must be willing to work am or pm shifts & must be available weekdays, weekends and holidays. 

**What we offer:**

- Competitive compensation plan
- A company culture that promotes out of the box thinking
- Large opportunity for increased responsibility and growth in the company
- Opportunity to work with a highly engaged team
- On-going opportunities for you to grow and develop as a leader within our thriving organisation

jobs.title: Logistics Internship (Nederlandstalig)
jobs.description:
**Passie voor goed eten**

Bij HelloFresh zijn we gek op lekker eten en met een box vol verse ingrediënten is het onze missie om de manier waarop Nederland kookt te veranderen. Samen maken we van elke maaltijd een moment om naar uit te kijken. Met onze maaltijdboxen vol verse ingrediënten en makkelijk te volgen recepten zijn we een revolutie gestart in de voedingsindustrie. Van het ontwikkelen van de recepten tot de vlekkeloze bezorging van onze boxen - data is een belangrijke leidraad en daarbij staat onze klant centraal. Zo leren we elke dag iets nieuws. Ons jonge en flexibele team neemt snelle beslissingen en is daardoor niet te stoppen.

**HelloFresh is op zoek naar jou**

Voor ons transport team in Nieuwegein zijn we op zoek naar een Intern Logistics. Ons team is verantwoordelijk voor de *last mile* van HelloFresh en staat wekelijks logistieke uitdagingen te wachten. Dit biedt jou als stagiair veel interessante verbeterprojecten waar je aan mee kunt werken. Een uitdagende stage waarbij je alles leert over onze logistieke processen en projectmanagement.

Je houdt je onder andere bezig met:

- het optimaliseren van de routeplanning en de operationele processen op de verschillende distributiecentra in Nederland en België.
- Uitrol van projecten gelinkt aan innovatie en duurzaamheid, bijvoorbeeld rond elektrisch vervoer of stadslogistiek;
- Projecten op het gebied van wagenparkbeheer om de downtime van de bussen zo minimaal mogelijk te houden;
- en daarnaast staan we altijd open voor eigen initiatieven en ideeën.

**Ben jij de perfecte Intern Logistics?**

Je volgt een opleiding Logistiek of Supply Chain aan een hogeschool of universiteit. Omdat je tijdens deze stage meerdere ballen omhoog moet houden, is het vereist dat je in staat bent om snel te kunnen schakelen en stressbestendig bent. Nauwkeurig werken en letten op de details zit in jouw systeem. Daarnaast kun je kunt werken met Microsoft Excel en heb je een analytische kijk op de gang van zaken. Tot slot ben je in staat om vloeiend te communiceren in het **Nederlands** en **Engels**.

**What’s next?**

We beginnen met het bekijken van jouw CV en motivatiebrief. Zien we overeenkomsten? Dan maken we kennis met elkaar via een video-call. Zien we een potentiële match? Dan gaan we graag nogmaals met je in gesprek via een video call. Dit zal voornamelijk een inhoudelijk gesprek worden met je stagebegeleider en een teamlid. We plannen de afspraken graag snel achter elkaar, zo weet je binnen no-time of je bij ons aan de slag kan gaan!

*Diversiteit en inclusiviteit is erg belangrijk voor HelloFresh. Daarom proberen wij onze teams zo samen te stellen, dat deze bestaan uit mensen met verschillende achtergronden, visies en skills. Alle keuzes binnen de sollicitatieprocedure zijn gebaseerd op kwalificaties, werkervaring en wat HelloFresh op dit moment nodig heeft*

**Vragen of interesse om te solliciteren?**

Stuur gerust een berichtje naar [Hedwig](mailto:hedwigschaap@hellofresh.nl). Wil je solliciteren? Leuk! Doe dat op de volgende manier: Klik op de 'apply' knop hieronder en vul alle verplichte velden in. Zorg ervoor dat je CV en motivatiebrief zijn bijgevoegd en that's it! Sollicitaties via email worden niet in behandeling genomen. 

**We recruiten graag voor onze eigen vacatures, daarom stellen we proactieve benadering van derde partijen niet op prijs.**

jobs.title: Logistics Manager DACH - Last Mile Carrier Management (m/f/d)
jobs.description:
Wir bei HelloFresh sind hungrig nach mehr. Denn: “*We want to change the way people eat, forever”*. Mit unseren Kochboxen machen wir den Alltag unserer Kunden bereits in 12 Ländern auf 3 Kontinenten leichter. Und das jede Woche aufs Neue. Unser Erfolgsrezept? Ein Team voller smarter Team Player, unternehmerischer Mut und natürlich… guter Geschmack. Als einer der Top 10 Arbeitgeber im Glassdoor Ranking wachsen wir immer weiter. Und dazu braucht unser HelloFresh DACH Team Top-Talente wie Dich, die Fortschritt und gutes Essen genauso lieben wie wir. 

## **Deine Rolle**

**[Beispiel Brand & Comms]** Kochbox, was?! Und genau da kommst Du ins Spiel. Auch wenn die Kochbox und HelloFresh seit Anfang der Gründung wächst und wächst und wächst, sind wir der Meinung “Da geht doch noch etwas mehr!”. Damit die Kochbox Kategorie und HelloFresh noch bekannter, noch mehr verstanden und noch beliebter wird, suchen wir eine/n Sr. Communication Manager, die/der genau weiß, was potenzielle und Bestandskunden auch 2020 hinter dem Ofen hervorlockt und was sie auf unseren eigenen On- & Offline Content Channels aber auf externen Channels/Platformen sehen wollen. Jemand, der schon Vieles gesehen hat, aber dennoch noch offen für Neues und Experimente ist. Jemand der die Rolle des Communication Teams in den Businesskontext setzen kann und weiß, wie wir Awareness, Consideration und Loyalty durch Maßnahmen treiben. Jemand, der Erfahrung hat ein Team zu führen, weiter auszubauen und weiterzuentwickeln. Jemand, der auch gerne mal den Status Quo hinterfragt. Jemand, der uns hilft, HelloFresh als Consumer Brand zu etablieren in Deutschland, Österreich und Schweiz.  

## **Dein Verantwortungsbereich**

- Hauptansprechpartner für alle KEP Dienstleister (letzte-Meile) im deutschsprachigen Raum
- Verantwortung für das Carrier Performance Management
- Erstellung und Auswertung von Kosten und Qualitätsreports
- Identifikation und Durchführung von Projekten zur Verbesserung der Zustellquote und
- Kundenkommunikation in enger Zusammenarbeit mit unseren Partnern und internen Stakeholders (z.B. Customer Service, CRM und Techteams)
- Prüfung und Freigabe von Rechnungen
- Bearbeitung von Reklamationen und Durchführung von Schadensregulierungen
- Vorbereitung und Teilnahme an Preis- und Vertragsverhandlungen
- Koordination von Tests zur Ausweitung unserer Zustelloptionen 

## **Dein Profil **

- Du hast mindestens 2 Jahre Berufserfahrung im Umgang mit KEP Dienstleistern (DPD, DHL, UPS etc.) in einer ähnlichen Rolle gesammelt
- Du kennst Dich sehr gut mit Carrier Performance Management aus 
- Kenntnisse in SQL und Tableau sind von Vorteil
- Du hast sehr gute MS Office Kenntnisse, insbesondere Excel und PowerPoint
- Du sprichst Deutsch auf muttersprachlichem Niveau und sehr gutes Englisch
- Du hast ein großes Interesse an operativen Abläufen und Freude daran, bestehende Prozesse und Strukturen immer wieder zu hinterfragen und zu verbessern
- Du arbeitest selbstständig, strukturiert und gewissenhaft 
- Du kannst Dich sehr gut organisieren und hast Deadlines stets im Blick 
- Du arbeitest daten- sowie prozessgetrieben
- Du bist zahlengetrieben und hast ein sehr gutes analytisches Verständnis
- Du überzeugst mit Professionalität und Gewissenhaftigkeit im Umgang mit Deinen Stakeholdern 
- Du lernst schnell und findest zu jedem Problem die passende Lösung
- Du bist bereit ab Tag 1 Verantwortung in einem dynamischen Arbeitsumfeld zu übernehmen

## **Das bieten wir Dir außerdem **

- Die Möglichkeit, die Kochbox-Kategorie entscheidend mit zu definieren 
- Du lernst im direkten Austausch mit Logistik Experten und bist somit in der Lage, Dich stetig weiterzuentwickeln
- Eine attraktive und wettbewerbsfähige Vergütung und viel Raum für persönliches Wachstum
- Ein Wohlfühlarbeitsplatz in Berlin-Mitte mit tollen Kollegen 
- Jährliches Budget für individuelle Weiterbildungen und Team Coachings
- Stark vergünstigte HelloFresh Kochbox und HelloFreshGO-Produkte sowie kostenloses Essen
- Fitness-Angebote wie Office Yoga und ermäßigte Urban Sports Club Mitgliedschaft 
- Altersvorsorge-Programm, flexible Arbeitszeiten und Sabbatical Policy
- Regelmäßige Team Events, Firmen Parties sowie Friday Beers
- Windows oder Apple Ausstattung (je Präferenz)
- Relocation-Service nach Berlin

## **Du bist auch hungrig nach mehr? **

Bewirb Dich jetzt mit Deinen vollständigen Bewerbungsunterlagen inkl. frühestmögliches Startdatum sowie Gehaltsvorstellungen.

Wir freuen uns auf Dich!

*HelloFresh lebt Vielfalt. Wir sind stolz auf die unterschiedlichen Hintergründe, Fähigkeiten und Perspektiven jedes einzelnen Teammitglieds und unterstützen die persönliche Entfaltung am Arbeitsplatz. Jede Personalentscheidung basiert auf Chancengleichheit und wird auf Grundlage von Qualifikationen, Leistungen und Anforderungen des Unternehmens getroffen. *

jobs.title: Manager, Employee Relations - Field
jobs.description:
***Get cooking with HelloFresh!***

At HelloFresh, our mission is to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch, at home. With offices all over the world, we deliver delicious meals to millions of customers, worldwide. HelloFresh is one of the top three largest companies to come out of Europe over the past four years-- we are now active in nine markets, and on three continents around the world.

**Job Description:**

As the Employee Relations Manager (ERM), you will play an integral role in the enhancement and scaling of Employee Relations (ER) capability and will work to execute and manage a streamlined ER function across field DC locations. In this newly created role, you will partner with HR leaders to oversee key ER initiatives aligned to the broader organizational strategy, and work as a trusted adviser providing support and guidance to leaders of all levels. You will serve as the ER subject matter expert for a team of over 4,000 associates while working closely with the Director of People to implement a long term strategy for elevating the ER function and capabilities across the organization. 

  **What You'll Do...**

- Leverage resources and actively collaborate with HR Leadership and Legal partners to ensure the applicable policies, trainings and risk mitigation strategies are in place to support our company mission and values
- Conduct thorough in person and phone interviews into complex, high risk investigations including but not limited to allegations of harassment, workplace violence, discrimination, retaliation, employee misconduct and provide recommended actions based on findings
- Manage and conduct investigations involving field Senior leadership including HR Business Partners and Director level Operations leadership
- Oversee development of an internal employee hotline & workflow in partnership with HR leadership and support the implementation and oversight of ER incident management platform
- In partnership with Legal, lead an adjudication committee and the deliberative review process to help make employment decisions related to pre-employment assessments 
- Conduct ER risk & trend analysis for all field locations, and implement proactive network and site specific risk mitigation strategies in partnership with field HR Business Partners
- Identify field leadership opportunities and skill gaps through trend analysis and onsite visits and address through onsite and virtual workplace ER capability training for field HR and Operations leadership 
- Partner with HR Business Partners to oversee implementation of action plans stemming from investigation trends, compliance opportunities and employee engagement surveys in support of enhancing our overall employee engagement and value proposition 
- Proactively identify opportunities for elevation of the ER function and take appropriate partners to implement  

**What You'll Bring**  

- Bachelor's degree required; Master’s and/or HR Certifications preferred
- Minimum 5+ years' experience in ER role preferably with experience in an operations/distribution environment
- Experience managing an ER function across multiple locations strongly preferred
- Strong knowledge and experience with federal, state and local employment laws including, but not limited to Title VII, ADEA, FLSA
- Proven ability to develop processes and manage multiple projects simultaneously
- Demonstrated ability to influence leaders of all levels
- High level of comfort working autonomously and recommending strategic changes
- Ability to develop and execute a proactive employee and labor relations strategy focused on building leadership skills to promote employee engagement
- Attention to detail and excellent interpersonal, problem-solving, listening, verbal and written communication skills

**You’ll get…**

- Competitive Salary & 401K company match that vests immediately upon participation
- Generous parental leave of 16 weeks & PTO policy
- $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans effective first day of employment
- 75% discount on your subscription to HelloFresh (as well as other product initiatives)
- Snacks, coffee & catered meals
- Company sponsored outings & Employee Resource Groups
- Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company

Our team is diverse, high-performing and international, helping us to create a truly inspiring work environment in which you will thrive!

Get cooking with HelloFresh!

At HelloFresh, our mission is to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch, at home. With offices all over the world, we deliver delicious meals to millions of customers, worldwide. HelloFresh is one of the top three largest companies to come out of Europe over the past four years-- we are now active in nine markets, and on three continents around the world.

Job Description:

As the Employee Relations Manager (ERM), you will play an integral role in the enhancement and scaling of Employee Relations (ER) capability and will work to execute and manage a streamlined ER function across field DC locations. In this newly created role, you will partner with HR leaders to oversee key ER initiatives aligned to the broader organizational strategy, and work as a trusted adviser providing support and guidance to leaders of all levels. You will serve as the ER subject matter expert for a team of over 4,000 associates while working closely with the Director of People to implement a long term strategy for elevating the ER function and capabilities across the organization.

What You'll Do...

  • Leverage resources and actively collaborate with HR Leadership and Legal partners to ensure the applicable policies, trainings and risk mitigation strategies are in place to support our company mission and values
  • Conduct thorough in person and phone interviews into complex, high risk investigations including but not limited to allegations of harassment, workplace violence, discrimination, retaliation, employee misconduct and provide recommended actions based on findings
  • Manage and conduct investigations involving field Senior leadership including HR Business Partners and Director level Operations leadership
  • Oversee development of an internal employee hotline & workflow in partnership with HR leadership and support the implementation and oversight of ER incident management platform
  • In partnership with Legal, lead an adjudication committee and the deliberative review process to help make employment decisions related to pre-employment assessments
  • Conduct ER risk & trend analysis for all field locations, and implement proactive network and site specific risk mitigation strategies in partnership with field HR Business Partners
  • Identify field leadership opportunities and skill gaps through trend analysis and onsite visits and address through onsite and virtual workplace ER capability training for field HR and Operations leadership
  • Partner with HR Business Partners to oversee implementation of action plans stemming from investigation trends, compliance opportunities and employee engagement surveys in support of enhancing our overall employee engagement and value proposition
  • Proactively identify opportunities for elevation of the ER function and take appropriate partners to implement

What You'll Bring

  • Bachelor's degree required; Master’s and/or HR Certifications preferred
  • Minimum 5+ years' experience in ER role preferably with experience in an operations/distribution environment
  • Experience managing an ER function across multiple locations strongly preferred
  • Strong knowledge and experience with federal, state and local employment laws including, but not limited to Title VII, ADEA, FLSA
  • Proven ability to develop processes and manage multiple projects simultaneously
  • Demonstrated ability to influence leaders of all levels
  • High level of comfort working autonomously and recommending strategic changes
  • Ability to develop and execute a proactive employee and labor relations strategy focused on building leadership skills to promote employee engagement
  • Attention to detail and excellent interpersonal, problem-solving, listening, verbal and written communication skills

You’ll get…

  • Competitive Salary & 401K company match that vests immediately upon participation
  • Generous parental leave of 16 weeks & PTO policy
  • $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans effective first day of employment
  • 75% discount on your subscription to HelloFresh (as well as other product initiatives)
  • Snacks, coffee & catered meals
  • Company sponsored outings & Employee Resource Groups
  • Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company

Our team is diverse, high-performing and international, helping us to create a truly inspiring work environment in which you will thrive!

jobs.title: Marketing Business Intelligence Analyst (m/f/x)
jobs.description:
At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week.

We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 12 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London, Amsterdam and Copenhagen and shipped out more than 250 Million meals in 2019. 

Our more than 5,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged.

We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. 

We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us.

## **About the job**

- As part of our Berlin-based Marketing Business Intelligence team, you will be providing detailed insights into our customer behaviour and business performance to enable data-driven strategic decision making across 10+ countries world-wide
- You will work closely with a wide range of stakeholders and translate their business questions into meaningful analytics - combining commercial and technical understanding
- Your work will span across creating ad-hoc insights, AB testing, streamlining analysis processes and setting up and maintaining the reporting landscape for Marketing teams
- You will be utilising various databases and querying/programming languages to access and manipulate the data needed
- You will present and discuss the results of your work to stakeholders of all seniority
- You will not only take responsibility of own projects, but also be a team player to collaborate and share knowledge with other collleagues

## **Who we're looking for?**

- 3+ years of experience in Business Intelligence/ Analytics/ Data Science. Experience in e-commerce and consulting background would be a plus
- A degree in Economics, Statistics, Mathematics, Business Analytics, or similar quantitative discipline
- A passion for numbers, an analytical mind and curiosity to proactively dig deeper into business-critical topics 
- You are advanced with SQL, have some experience with Python and are always keen on learning more on the technical side
- Experience with AB Testing and good statistical knowledge would be a big plus
- You shine while interacting with your stakeholders, you like an international atmosphere and are business fluent in English
- You enjoy searching for the best ways the visualize data and have first-hand experience with tools like Tableau
- Experience in the Customer Relationship Management (CRM) area would be a big plus

## **What we offer**

- The chance to have a serious impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase
- A guaranteed steep learning curve & a boost for your career
- Competitive compensation with annual budget for training and development
- A vibrant international environment
- Work in our office located in the heart of Berlin
- Windows or Apple equipment (depending on preference)
- Sabbatical policy
- A range of additional perks (significant reduction on your HelloFresh boxes, weekly allowance for HelloFresh GO vending machines, budget for German classes, discounts for our neighboring Fitness Studio & Urban Sports Club, weekly Yoga Classes, Friday Beers, Summer & Winter parties, daily fruits in the office)

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date and salary expectation.

jobs.title: Office Coordinator
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Get cooking with HelloFresh!

HelloFresh delivers “cook from scratch” meal plans straight to your door, with easy to follow recipe cards and high quality, pre-portioned fresh ingredients—saving time and money that you can instead spend with your loved ones!

HelloFresh is the world's leading meal kit company and is expanding rapidly. Founded in November 2011, HelloFresh now operates in the U.S., the United Kingdom, Germany, the Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, Australia, Austria, Switzerland, and Canada. HelloFresh delivers millions of meals to millions of customers across the globe. and listed in November 2017 at the German Stock Exchange in Frankfurt.

Job Description:

We’re hiring an Office Coordinator to support our Distribution center office in Grand Prairie, TX. In this role, you will organize/coordinate office procedures and support the office with high levels of customer service in administration. Your role is to create and maintain an environment where our employees can do the best work of their lives-- in an effective, professional, and safe environment. Ultimately, the Office Coordinator should be able to ensure the smooth running of the office and help to improve company procedures and day-to-day operations.

You will...

  • Develop processes to improve overall office operations
  • Assist HR & Staffing teams with onboarding new hires
  • Coordinate promotional materials to promote HelloFresh activities
  • Provide administrative support to on-site leadership team
  • Act as a gatekeeper while receiving guests, courteously providing and receiving information
  • Execute site indirect spend purchasing e.g office supplies, snacks, general supplies & ensure accurate and timely reporting
  • Address employees queries regarding office management issues (e.g. stationery, Hardware and travel arrangements);
  • Plan in-house or off-site activities, such as parties, celebrations and conferences
  • Liaise between Global offices when it comes onboarding, employee exits, training sessions and company-wide events.

Your qualities...

  • Strong organizational skills and a goal-oriented approach to work;
  • An ability to work independently while also contributing to a high-performing, global team;
  • Ability to creatively and efficiently execute against several competing tasks and projects;

  • Focused on effective teamwork with the capability to thrive in an autonomous environment;

  • Customer focus and hospitality attitude is key;

  • Experience using and trouble-shooting a variety of office equipment.

At a minimum, you have...

  • Exceptional communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills

  • 2+ years of work experience in a related office coordinator, customer service, and/or assistant position;

  • Proficiency with Google Apps (i.e., Gmail, Docs, Sheets), Microsoft Suite and video conferencing;

  • Experience supporting general HR function strongly preferred;

  • GED/HS diploma required. Bachelor’s degree preferred.

Our team is diverse, high-performing and international, helping us to create a truly inspiring work environment in which you will thrive!

It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because he or she is a protected veteran.

jobs.title: Online Marketing Internship
jobs.description:
**Join our HelloFresh family**

At HelloFresh we love food and our mission is to change the way people eat forever. That change comes conveniently packaged in a box - a HelloFresh Box, filled with the best fresh ingredients. With our meal boxes with easy to cook recipes and fresh ingredients, we are driving change in the quickly evolving food industry. From developing our recipes to delivering the boxes - the customer is at the center of everything we do. Our aim is to make every meal a moment to look forward to, for everyone at the table. No surprise then that data is our friend and for us, learning never stops. We make quick but informed decisions and as a fast-growing company, we value flexibility and speed.

**HelloFresh needs you**

For our young and passionate team, we are looking for an Online Marketing intern. Working in the Online Marketing team, you would be involved in all our channels (Affiliates, Influencers, SEA, SEO, Paid Social, Video, Display & Referrals) for the Benelux markets.

You’ll be working on:

- Affiliates/Influencers: Help identifying our next key partners, set up campaigns and ensure account management daily tasks (agenda, tracking, cost reporting, briefings...)
- SEO: Participate in our on-going quality checks
- SEA, Facebook, Pinterest, Youtube: Briefings and specific projects (Monitor competition, propose new ideas for tests)
- Referrals: Submit ideas for new tests in terms of creative & content for our existing customers
- You would be involved with several team members in both our Local (Amsterdam) and Global offices (Berlin)

You have a good understanding of Digital marketing and a real desire to expand your knowledge of the online marketing channels. You are not afraid of multi-tasking, working on several different tasks and projects every day. Your native language is Dutch, but you also speak English fluently, and you are always looking to learn more. You have a curious and hands-on mentality, not afraid to use multiple platforms and working in teams. Most importantly you are highly motivated and usually described as an enthusiastic person.

**What do we offer you?**

- Make a serious impact on the Digital Marketing channels at HelloFresh.
- A lot of learning- and development opportunities within a young and dynamic e-commerce company;
- Freedom of idea and initiative, execution and implementation of your own ideas and initiatives;
- You can make use of the company benefits, like food and fruit in the office, sports classes, such as yoga, boot camp, and boxing class.
- An amazing team and office in Amsterdam, check it out [here](http://media.licdn.com/embeds/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2F1ZKrhiVypkw%3Ffeature%3Doembed&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3D1ZKrhiVypkw&type=text%2Fhtml&schema=youtube)!
- Next, to that, you also get a discount on the HelloFresh box.
- An internship fee of 500 euros per month

**Which steps do I need to take to get this job?**

We take a look at your resume and cover letter. If we see a match, we will invite you within 5 working days for a video call to get to know each other. Are we still positive? We will schedule a face-to-face interview at our headquarters in Amsterdam. If both sides would like to proceed we will schedule a chat with our CMO as the last step in the interview process. We will schedule the interviews one after the other quickly, in order to let you know as fast as possible  
if you can start at HelloFresh!

**Are you interested or do you have questions?**

Feel free to send a message to [Ismail](mailto:ismail@hellofresh.nl). Do you want to send us your application? Nice! Please do as following; click on the 'apply' button below and fill out the mandatory fields. Upload your resume and cover letter and that's it. Applications send by email will not be processed.

*Before applying please make sure you are eligible to work in the Netherlands, unfortunately, we do not sponsor any work visa or permits for this position.*

**Proactive talent acquisition from third parties is not appreciated.**

jobs.title: Online Marketing Manager - HelloFreshGO (m/f/x)
jobs.description:
### **Your role : **

You are an experienced Marketing Automation expert with sound knowledge of Digital Marketing? If yes, you are just the person we are looking for to join our B2B Performance Marketing team!

Your role will be key to the delivery of buyer journeys in HelloFreshGo in order to drive conversions. We imagine you are truly passionate about marketing and providing a first-class customer experience that can engage customers, drive revenue and build brand loyalty. You will be responsible for creating and maintaining customer journeys as part of our marketing automation programs. This includes journey design, configuration, audience segmentation and data interrogation.

As a mostly technical role, you will be working a lot with our automated marketing platform – HubSpot.

### **Your tasks :**

-       Plan, build and execute cross-channel communications, campaigns and nurture programs in a flexible and timely manner.
-       Manage set-up and configuration of data-driven campaigns ensuring deliverability.
-       Provide a problem solving and ‘point of escalation’ technical support function.
-       Working with stakeholders to create and implement test strategies, including A/B multivariant testing that maximizes conversions.
-       Oversee campaigns from creation to analysis and reporting.
-       Keen eye and aptitude for trouble-shooting with solutions led approach. 
-       Provide training and documentation for new and existing users. 

### **Your profile : **

- You graduated with a Bachelor’s or Master's Degree in Business Management, Marketing or Communication or Computer Science. Any additional training with Web Design and Development, Computer Science, Informatics, or similar preferred. 
- Ideally,you have 8-10 years minimum work experience with 5+ years in a similar role. Experience in a start-up, consulting, regulated industry is a plus.
- You have a minimum of 5 years of experience working with ESPs, i.e.HubSpot, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, ExactTarget or Silverpop or  Marketo. 
- You possess a solid understanding of workflow processes and systems within a marketing/sales cycle.
- You have demonstrated experience in building and developing eDM/ drip campaigns and mobile responsive emails.
- You understand strongly how email marketing principles, triggered campaigns, email testing and optimizing performance work and know the email best practices and compliance.
- You have excellent communication skills, written, verbal and presentation, both in German and in English.
- Nice to have: you possess technical skills and expertise with HTML and CSS optimized for email deployment and creative experience with Graphics.
- You are structured, detail and result oriented and a professional in MS Excel or Google spreadsheets.
- You are proactive and organized; you can not only manage the results of your work, but also measure them. Fantastic time management skills with the ability to multitask.
- You are used to thriving in a fast paced, iterative, deadline driven environment. 
- You are a positive, empathic, and passionate human being.

### **Who we are:**

At HelloFreshGO, our mission is to revolutionize the way people eat at work. We were founded in 2017 in the vibrant HelloFresh tech hub Berlin, and since 2018, we are flying on our own! We are inspiring thousands of energized employees every day to have easy access to well-balanced, healthy affordable and delicious food. Our highlight: a smart fridge and catering boxes, full of tasty, healthy and fresh meals, snacks and drinks for fair prices across the whole country.

With us you have the best of two worlds - a real start-up feeling with our HelloFreshGO team as well as access to HelloFresh's network and professional experience. In order to reach our ambitious goals we are looking for smart and motivated people to join us in taking HelloFreshGO to the next level. Every day is different and brings new ideas. We are in an exciting development phase - the best time to become part of our team. Grow beyond yourself and leave your footprints in the HelloFreshGO history! 

### **In a nutshell - why should you work for us ?**

- A dynamic and fast-paced environment where you have an impact from day one.
- The opportunity to grow and develop your professional strengths.
- A chance to step into the exciting food-tech sector - and of course easy access to our fridge with weekly discounts as well as regular free food tastings.
- International, passionate and amazing colleagues to welcome you.
- Regular team events - we work hard but also want to have fun and spread happiness – for our customers and our colleagues likewise!
- A nice view on the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church from our sunny balcony in the heart of Berlin.

### **Are you ready for a new challenge?** 

We are looking forward to getting to know you!

Our highlight: a smart fridge and catering boxes, full of tasty, healthy and fresh meals, snacks and drinks for fair prices across the whole country.

In order to reach our ambitious goals we are looking for smart and motivated people to join us in taking HelloFreshGO to the next level. Every day is different and brings new ideas.   • The opportunity to grow and develop your professional strengths.
  • A chance to step into the exciting food-tech sector - and of course easy access to our fridge with weekly discounts as well as regular free food tastings.

  • Regular team events - we work hard but also want to have fun and spread happiness – for our customers and our colleagues likewise!
  • A nice view on the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church from our sunny balcony in the heart of Berlin.

Are you ready for a new challenge?

We are looking forward to getting to know you!

We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 12 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London, Amsterdam and Copenhagen and shipped out more than 250 Million meals in 2019. 

Our more than 5,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged.

We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. 

We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us.

 

## About the job

As Online Marketing Manager - Video Acquisition (m/f/x) you will 

- Build and optimize YouTube campaigns across our international markets,
- Lead strategic projects for several countries,
- Be responsible for 6-digit spend on a monthly basis,
- Analyze ongoing performance, identify opportunities, and define structured plans and reporting to improve advertising efficiency,
- Work on cross-functional projects with numerous teams from global brand to local country teams, in order to ensure the best performance of your campaigns,
- Set up A/B tests for new strategies such as the increase of customer lifetime value or discount strategy,
- Be part of a best-in-class and dynamic team of online marketing professionals

## **What we're looking for**

- 1-2 years of professional experience in Online Marketing ideally managing large budgets,
- Video enthusiast who knows what works in the world of moving images and is able to communicate best practices towards multiple stakeholders
- Highly analytical & data-driven mindset with an ability to understand trends while looking at data,
- You are an Excel and Google Ads Ninja,
- Willingness to learn on the job, be dynamic, a self starter thinking outside the box,
- Able to prioritize ruthlessly and use all the resources at your disposal to achieve your KPIs,
- A team player with strong communication skills and the ability to work successfully in flexible team structures across markets 

## **What we offer**

- The chance to have a serious impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase,
- A vibrant, international environment,
- A guaranteed steep learning curve & boost for your career,
- Competitive compensation,
- Sabbatical Policy,
- Benefit from our selection of employee perks (significant reduction on your HelloFresh boxes, discount on the HelloFresh GO vending machines, free German classes, Geek Friday, discounts for our neighboring Fitness Studio & Urban Sports Club, annual budget for training and development initiatives, weekly Yoga Classes, Summer & Winter Party)

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date.

jobs.title: Operations Manager
jobs.description:
***Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh!***

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  

We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people.

The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

**Job Description: **

We are looking to add a Operations Manager to our team in New York! As an Operations Manager, you will take a hands-on approach and deliver strategic operational leadership across all aspects of production and fulfillment that is processed through our external vendor network. We're searching for a visionary leader who is excited to build something meaningful and share it with the world! 

**You will...**

- Provide cross-functional leadership to our vendor fulfillment network and immerse yourself in daily operations to optimize productivity, promote growth, encourage innovation ideas, and add to an excellent culture
- Map out, drive and continuously improve the day-to-day operations in a hyper-growth environment, effectively engaging, motivating and directing the team to ensure on-time and accurate delivery of customer orders
- Manage dynamic and cross functional teams to better assess the daily operations of Production, Planning and Fulfillment teams while continuously driving and delivering results against established company criteria and key performance indicators
- Ensure continuous improvement to safety, quality, cost, and delivery while growing and expanding capabilities within the vendor network
- Drive a customer-focused environment committed to delivering the highest quality product to our customers
- Analyze vendor performance to identify operational opportunities, trends, and potential cost-saving improvements

**You are...**

- Bold: you’re adventurous, outgoing and optimistic; you’re confident making decisions and taking calculated risks  
Entrepreneurial in Spirit: you have vision, passion and imagination; you are not afraid to ask ‘what if’ and constantly challenge the status quo
- Versatile: you roll with the punches and don’t get overwhelmed easily; you enjoy grinding away at issues and have a knack for delivering results in hyper-growth, constantly changing environments
- Analytical: data is your friend; you're able to translate numbers into action and pave the way for efficiency
- Team-oriented: you have a track record of leading cross-functional teams and cultivating collaborative partnerships at all levels and departments of an organization
- Strategic: you recognize and resolve situations that are ambiguous or challenging and use logic to identify alternatives, evaluate, and present approaches to solve complex problems while thinking in terms of contingency plans
- Customer-focused: slightly obsessive-compulsive when it comes to customer experience and strive to deliver a product that is second to none

**At a minimum, you have...**

- Bachelor’s degree or  3+ years managing fulfillment & production operations in food, beverage, or perishables, manufacturing or distribution
- A comprehensive background in Operations and Vendor Management
- Effective project management skills
- Efficient Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, Power Point) and Google app (Gmail, drive, sheets, etc.), some experience with SQL is preferred 
- A collaborative, team oriented working style
- Ability to travel 30%

**You’ll get…**

- Competitive Salary & 401k company match that vests immediately upon participation
- Generous parental leave of 16 weeks & PTO policy, as well as paid holidays off
- $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans
- Amazing discounts, including up to 75% off HelloFresh subscription
- Emergency child and adult care services
- Snacks & monthly catered lunches
- Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company

jobs.title: Operations Transformation Manager
jobs.description:
HelloFresh is on a mission to transform the way the world thinks about home cooking. Forget the hassle of supermarkets, or the tiresome process of planning your weekly meals - we deliver to your door all the ingredients, instructions and inspiration needed to make delicious meals at home, from scratch.

Not only have we been named Europe’s fastest growing start-up in the past, but at just 9 years in, we’re the industry leader. Along the way, we’ve delivered hundreds of millions of meals to millions of households worldwide and are passionate about disrupting one of the last industries to go online - food and grocery.

So, if you’re keen to join a dynamic and energetic team, look no further!

**About the job**

- We’re looking for a practical problem solver with experience in Operations to join our UK team and improve things for ourselves and our customers
- This person will work on key strategic operational projects to develop our operations as well as projects to improve operational processes and procedures, setting HelloFresh up to better serve our customers 
- This role sits within the UK Transformation team, a cross-functional team responsible for key topics such as customer retention and sustainability, whilst also leading on strategic projects which have a large impact across the business

**What you will be doing:**

- Use analytics and business data to perform data-driven decisions
- Ideating, scoping and leading projects that expand our operations or improve our way of operating, from inbound supply chain all the way through production to logistics
- Interacting with multiple senior stakeholders across the business, acting as a change champion to drive specific priorities
- Gathering best practice from International HelloFresh geographies and external organisations and developing project plans to implement in the UK operation
- Assisting the broader Transformation team with certain high-priority projects, touching all aspects of the business from Product design through to strategic planning

**Who you are:**

- High level of professional experience in a high performance and culture environment (consulting would be ideal)
- Strong experience of working in an operational role in a retail / consumer goods / logistics business – ideally in Supply chain, Production / Manufacturing or Logistics
- Excellent project management competencies including a proven track record of successful operational transformation projects
- Excellent ability to influence key stakeholders, work cross-functionally and autonomously
- Strong analytical skills including the ability to summarize quantitative concepts into a digestible format
- Ability to manage priorities simultaneously and meet time-sensitive deadlines in a fast-paced environment
- Excellent communication skills – both written and verbal

**What you will get in return:**

- The unique opportunity to get into one of the most intellectually demanding roles at one of the largest technology companies to come out of Europe
- Direct, high impact on our future operating model from day 1
- High exposure to UK and global top-management
- A young, energetic and extremely dynamic environment
- Competitive compensation and plenty of room for personal growth
- Great international exposure and team atmosphere
- Work in a modern, spacious office in the heart of London
- 70% discount on HelloFresh boxes
- Access to our many employee perks including breakfast daily, weekly team lunches and fantastic social activities

Start date: July 2020

Location: The HelloFresh Farm, 60 Worship Street, EC2A 2EZ, London

jobs.title: Paid Social Marketing Manager (m/f/x)
jobs.description:
At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week.

We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 12 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London, Amsterdam and Copenhagen and shipped out more than 250 Million meals in 2019. Our more than 5,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged.

We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us.

## **About the job**

- As Paid Social Manager, you will lead and develop best-in-class paid social marketing strategies in a few markets and manage a considerable advertising budget to help us reach our growth and ROI targets.
- You will own the Paid Social P&L for your markets (including reporting on results, budgeting, and forecasting) and identify new opportunities to increase scale and deliver on performance targets.
- You will be hands on implementing and optimizing direct response campaigns from inception through post-launch/sustain on key social media platforms (mainly Facebook, Instagram and Pinterest) and actively support a rigorous testing and optimization culture.
- You will support major strategic and creative projects with a broad Paid Social scope and a big strategic business impact (Pinterest scaling, continuous creative testing and automation, ad personalization...)
- You will work cross-functionally with our design/brand team, to support creative conceptualization and briefing, align on the testing pipeline, ensure the quality of creatives received, report on creative performance and generate best practices across all markets
- Our job descriptions evolve with our business needs and priorities. In addition to the description above, your role may include additional projects and team support as needed.

## **Who we’re looking for**

- You have at least a Bachelor’s degree from a top-ranked university or business school, ideally in Marketing, Business, Management, Economics or related fields with a strong academic record.
- At least 2 years of hands-on work experience in Paid Social Marketing 
- You know Facebook Business Manager inside out. First experience managing Pinterest Sponsored Pins would be a strong benefit.
- You combine creative and analytical skills with the ability to develop new skill sets, synthesizing coherent and actionable findings and take on new challenges.
- You are a team player with excellent communication skills. You are organised, detailed-oriented and able to manage multiple projects at one time 
- You are able to learn quickly and enjoy working in a fast-paced environment. You are comfortable with pivoting quickly and delivering against moving targets and goals.
- You are passionate about the social media ecosystem, highly motivated and with a constant willingness to learn
- Strong capabilities with MS Excel and general knowledge of Google Apps products (incl. Gsheet)
- An excellent level of English is required

## **What we offer**

- The chance to have a serious impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase
- A comprehensive onboarding within the Paid Social team and a guaranteed steep learning curve & boost for your career
- A vibrant, international environment
- Competitive compensation
- Sabbatical policy
- Benefit from our selection of employee perks (significant reduction on your HelloFresh boxes, discount on the HelloFresh GO vending machines, free German classes, Geek Friday, discounts for our neighboring Fitness Studio & Urban Sports Club, annual budget for training and development initiatives, weekly Yoga Classes, Summer & Winter Party)

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date.

jobs.title: Procurement Buyer
jobs.description:
***Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh!***

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  

We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people. 

The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

**Job Description:**

#### **You will ...**

- Assist procurement team in identifying their individual buying needs of a variety of different produce Stock Keeping Units (SKUs)
- Partner with distribution centers and suppliers to ensure timely deliveries and inventories match demand requirements
- Research, identify and develop relationships with new sources of suppliers for the company that meet criteria including (but not limited to) price, quantity, quality and timeliness 
- Negotiate and manage relationships with existing network of suppliers and vendors
- Analyze produce purchasing data to ensure accuracy of information, purchasing procedures and identify any discrepancies, etc 
- Resolve any unforeseen problems with suppliers relating to operations, purchasing or quality/performance quickly and professionally

**You are...**

- Customer-centric and willing to do whatever it takes to satisfy customer needs
- Detail-oriented with proven ability to multitask, work under pressure, and meet time sensitive deadlines
- Data driven- curious about what insights can be derived from numbers
- Highly adaptable- you thrive in a fast-paced, high-change and dynamic work environment  

#### **At a minimum, you have...**

- A Bachelor’s degree in business, purchasing or other related field
- 1-3 years of procurement and/or sourcing experience
- Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office Suite, specifically MS Excel
- Must be flexible to work weekends (on occasion)

**You’ll get…**

- Competitive Salary & 401k company match that vests immediately upon participation 
- Generous parental leave of 16 weeks & PTO policy 
- $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans 
- 75% discount on your subscription to HelloFresh (as well as other product initiatives)   
- Snacks, cold brew on tap & monthly catered lunches 
- Company sponsored outings & Employee Resource Groups 
- Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company  

 

It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because they are a protected veteran.

jobs.title: Procurement Lead
jobs.description:
**About HelloFresh**

We are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market. Not only have we been named Europe’s fastest-growing start-up in the past, but at just 7 years in, we’re the industry leader. Along the way, we’ve delivered hundreds of millions of meals to millions of households worldwide and are passionate about disrupting one of the last industries to go online - food and grocery.

If you would like to join an energetic and highly motivated team and work in a dynamic, hands-on, high-growth field where you can really have an impact every single day then join us and become part of developing a global fresh food champion!

 

**About the job:**

Based in our office in Shoreditch, London, you will join our talented, driven Procurement team. We are looking for an experienced, strategy focused and ambitious procurement professional to tackle tough challenges and work closely with suppliers in our procurement process.

You will be responsible for the development and successful execution of the procurement strategy for the dairy, bakery and packaging categories. You will have the freedom to realise your own ideas, create effective solutions and make a difference from day one.

 

**What you will be doing:**

- Take full ownership of multiple categories and manage projects from beginning to end.
- Focus on cost price improvements to drive profit performance, negotiating improved and sustainable commercial terms.
- Develop and enhance sourcing strategies that reduce supply chain risk and select the right suppliers.
- Work closely with the Supply Chain team and Technical team to assist in driving operational and quality improvements.
- Work cross-functionally with Marketing, NPD, Operations, Finance, Commercial teams.
- You will be an expert in your field, monitoring your market to ensure you make intelligent purchasing decisions around seasonal availability, price variations and new product innovation.
- Build strong relationships with internal stakeholders locally and in international teams.
- You will have excellent commercial awareness and be well organised, with first rate communication and influencing skills.

 

**Who you are:**

- 2+ years’ experience within the FMCG sector.
- Bachelor’s degree in Business/Procurement/Supply Chain or equivalent related work experience.
- Proactive, ambitious, and assertive: you take ownership of your work and think beyond the scope of a given assignment.
- Confident and professional negotiator with strong commercial acumen.
- Experience creating and project managing a pipeline of innovation and value-optimisation projects.
- Ability to lead, contribute and work effectively within a team
- Strong analytical skills, including advanced Excel
- Able to adhere to the values and mission of the company
- Ability to manage, change and comply with internal and external business processes
- Competence in Microsoft Office products and ability to adapt to technology-based ways of working  
- Ability to travel on a regular basis

 

**What you'll get in return:**

- A career at one of the world's fastest-growing food businesses
- Great international exposure and team atmosphere
- Competitive salary and company benefits
- 70% discount on HelloFresh boxes
- High level of responsibility from day one
- Access to our many employee perks including; daily breakfast, weekly team lunches, fantastic social activities and discounted gym membership
- The opportunity to rapidly advance your career
- Working with a fun, energetic and supportive team

**Location:** The HelloFresh Farm, 60 Worship Street, EC2A 2EZ, London

**Start date:** ASAP

**Recruitment process:** first, you will have a phone interview with a member of our Talent Acquisition team. Should you be successful, we will invite you for two interviews: one competency interview and one culture fit interview. You will then have a last conversation with the director of the department.

 

Do you think you can be our next Procurement Lead? Apply and tell us why!

jobs.title: Product Design Manager / UX Design Lead
jobs.description:
# Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh!

At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 8 years we've seen this mission spread around the world and beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market. 

So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of encouraged, energized home cooks that expands across the globe. We are the dominant world leader in the meal-kit market and have grown to operate in 12 different countries across 3 continents. Our growth trajectory and expansion has been phenomenal and we have launched facilities across Canada and have recently added Chef’s Plate to our team!

We are searching for a Product Design Manager to demonstrate craft excellence and to manage our growing team of Product Design professionals across North America. You'll have ownership over individual design projects, establish processes that aid in the success of the team as a whole, and mentor and grow your team. How might we make the HelloFresh brand and service more lovable? How could we use new methodologies and ways of thinking to expand and grow our business while keeping the focus on what makes us great? Are you up for these audacious challenges?

You love ...

- Driving craft excellence within the North American Product Design team.
- Working with our designers all over the world to advocate and adopt new ideas and better ways of working.
- Being a model of communication and collaboration within the design team and with peers in engineering and product.
- Exploring with Product Management and Engineering to find the intersection of customer desirability, business viability, and technical feasibility in your work.
- Researching tasks, flows, and ways of working for the customers you serve
- Using data to discover, ideate, and refine your designs.
- Designing flows and experiences that are incredibly simple and elegant.
- Leading designers through servant leadership across our New York, Toronto, and Boulder offices.
- Working with our UX Research team to identify and fill in the organization’s knowledge gaps
- Thinking holistically about problems, not just considering the HelloFresh digital product but instead the entire HelloFresh service experience.
- Working with our UX Writers to embody the content strategy and brand through the HelloFresh service.

You bring ...

- Skills and expertise in executing, critiquing, and mentoring in visual design, interaction design, UX writing, UI design and animation.
- Deep knowledge of design with influential communication skills to make organizational change happen.
- The heart of a teacher and the bravery to give direct but kind feedback.
- Full personal and team accountability for quality and delivery.
- Audaciously high goals for yourself and the teams you serve.
- The drive to push past these goals and achieve even more.

At a minimum, you have...

- 5 years of product design or equivalent experience
- 2+ years in a team lead role
- Demonstrated ability to lead teams across several offices
- A bachelor's degree in design or a design-related field, or has equivalent work experience
- Experience with e-commerce. Working within subscriptions is a plus.
- Knowledge of rapid business or service innovation skills, such as Google Sprint methodology
- Mastery of Sketch, knowledge of Abstract, and an understanding of other digital design tools
- A willingness to travel 10-20%, including traveling outside of North America to our Berlin office

What you'll love about this job:

- Competitive salary and company benefits
- 75% discount on HelloFresh boxes
- High level of responsibility from day one
- Working with a fun, energetic and supportive team
- Awesome environment at our downtown Toronto office! We take our work seriously, but we don't take ourselves too seriously

It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because he or she is a protected veteran.
