jobs.title: Senior Manager, PMO - Operations
jobs.description:
**About HelloFresh:**

At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 8 years we've seen this mission spread around the world and beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market. So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of encouraged, energized home cooks that expands across the globe. We are one of the fastest growing meal kit businesses and are active and growing in 10+ different countries across 3 continents. Our growth trajectory and expansion has been phenomenal and we have launched facilities across Canada and have recently added Chefs Plate to our team!

**About the Role: **

HelloFresh Canada is looking for an experienced Senior Manager, PMO to lead our project management team and manage critical projects involving any area of our supply chain. Projects can include: developing new capabilities within our operations to support a new product line; revamping processes to drive efficiencies; or finding ways to deliver boxes to our customers in a safer, faster, and higher quality way. You will spearhead projects focused on effectively scaling our business for short-term and long-term growth.

**You will: **

- Manage the overall project pipeline, including creating and overseeing the project delegation to your team (and yourself), and prioritizing projects that deliver the largest business impact
- Accountable for the overall success of all projects in the pipeline, specifically on-time and on-budget results, in addition to key metrics associated with each project  
- Organize and get buy-in from key cross-functional stakeholders to drive org-wide level projects
- Develop a team of motivated project managers and analysts, helping them to grow into effective leaders within our organization 
- Gain a comprehensive understanding of how our business operates in order to identify gaps and opportunities in how we consistently deliver an outstanding customer experience 
- Analyze our current business strategies and identify new opportunities for growth, efficiency, or cost savings
- Prioritize, organize, plan, and execute upon critical business initiatives to scale our supply chain and expand our customer offering

**You have or are:**

- Undergraduate degree in Business or Engineering (MBA is a bonus)
- 3-5 years of hands-on, structured project management experience, with proven experience in successfully managing large-scale and complex projects
- Deep knowledge of project management practices, disciplines, tools, and methodologies, including Lean Six Sigma (certification is a bonus) and preferably have experience in lean manufacturing 
- Demonstrated experience in leading and developing a team of project managers and coordinators
- Excellent organizational and time management skills   
*ie.* Y*ou are obsessively organized. You are the person whose spice cabinet is perfectly labeled and in alphabetical order. You manage your pantry using FIFO. You are the person who plans every trip for your friend group, including a colour coded, itemized itinerary with meeting invite confirmations automatically sent to all attendees. A professional herder of cats, if you will. *
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with operational modeling capability
- Exceptional relationship and stakeholder management, with the ability to influence, communicate, and present ideas in a structured and persuasive manner
- Able to thrive in an unstructured, fast-paced, and constantly evolving high growth environment
- Able and willing to travel up to 25% 

**Why you'll love this job:**

- You’ll have the chance to push your ideas from inception to execution without being held back by bureaucracy.
- We’re a start-up within a start-up. We’re nimble but we have the institutional knowledge and the global resources
- Competitive salary and company benefits
- 75% discount on HelloFresh boxes
- Working with a fun, energetic and supportive team
- Awesome environment at our downtown Toronto office! We take our work seriously, but we don't take ourselves too seriously

jobs.description:

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.

The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

**Job Description:**

****This role has a modified schedule and will work Wednesday to Sunday****

We are looking to add a Senior Operations Manager to our team in New York! As a Senior Operations Manager, you will take a hands-on approach and deliver strategic operational leadership across all aspects of production and fulfillment that is processed through our external vendor network. We're searching for a visionary leader who is excited to build something meaningful and share it with the world! 

**You will...**

- Provide cross-functional leadership to our vendor fulfillment network and immerse yourself in daily operations to optimize productivity, promote growth, encourage innovation ideas, and add to an excellent culture
- Map out, drive and continuously improve the day-to-day operations in a hyper-growth environment, effectively engaging, motivating and directing the team to ensure on-time and accurate delivery of customer orders
- Manage dynamic and cross functional teams to better assess the daily operations of Production, Planning and Fulfillment teams while continuously driving and delivering results against established company criteria and key performance indicators
- Ensure continuous improvement to safety, quality, cost, and delivery while growing and expanding capabilities within the vendor network
- Drive a customer-focused environment committed to delivering the highest quality product to our customers
- Analyze vendor performance to identify operational opportunities, trends, and potential cost-saving improvements

**You are...**

- Bold: you’re adventurous, outgoing and optimistic; you’re confident making decisions and taking calculated risks  
Entrepreneurial in Spirit: you have vision, passion and imagination; you are not afraid to ask ‘what if’ and constantly challenge the status quo
- Versatile: you roll with the punches and don’t get overwhelmed easily; you enjoy grinding away at issues and have a knack for delivering results in hyper-growth, constantly changing environments
- Analytical: data is your friend; you're able to translate numbers into action and pave the way for efficiency
- Team-oriented: you have a track record of leading cross-functional teams and cultivating collaborative partnerships at all levels and departments of an organization
- Strategic: you recognize and resolve situations that are ambiguous or challenging and use logic to identify alternatives, evaluate, and present approaches to solve complex problems while thinking in terms of contingency plans
- Customer-focused: slightly obsessive-compulsive when it comes to customer experience and strive to deliver a product that is second to none

**You have...**

- Bachelor’s degree or  5+ years managing fulfillment & production operations in food, beverage, or perishables, manufacturing or distribution
- A comprehensive background in Operations and Vendor Management
- Effective project management skills
- Efficient Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, Power Point) and Google app (Gmail, drive, sheets, etc.)
- A collaborative, team oriented working style
- Ability to work **Wednesday to Sunday,**  ability to travel 25%

**You’ll get…**

- Competitive Salary & 401k company match that vests immediately upon participation
- Generous parental leave of 16 weeks & PTO policy, as well as paid holidays off
- $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans
- Amazing discounts, including up to 75% off HelloFresh subscription
- Emergency child and adult care services
- Snacks & monthly catered lunches
- Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company

jobs.title: Senior Paid Social Marketing Manager (m/f/x)
jobs.description:
At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week.

We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 12 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London, Amsterdam and Copenhagen and shipped out more than 250 Million meals in 2019. Our more than 5,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged. 

We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us

## **About the job**

- As Senior Paid Social Manager, you will lead and develop best-in-class paid social marketing strategies in a few markets and manage a considerable advertising budget to help us reach our growth and ROI targets.
- You will own the Paid Social P&L for your markets (including reporting on results, budgeting, and forecasting) and identify new opportunities to increase scale and deliver on performance targets.
- You will be hands-on implementing and optimizing direct response campaigns from inception through post-launch/sustain on key social media platforms (mainly Facebook, Instagram and Pinterest) and actively support a rigorous testing and optimization culture.
- You will lead multiple major technical and strategic projects with a broad Paid Social scope and a big strategic business impact (such as audience management, incrementality testing, overlap analysis, ROAS bidding…)
- You will work cross-functionally with our AdTech / BI teams to foster automation into the channel, carry and build key performance analysis/dashboards and support various improvements on our internal reporting/measurement infrastructure.
- Our job descriptions evolve with our business needs and priorities. In addition to the description above, your role may include additional projects and team support as needed.

## **Who we’re looking for**

- You have a Bachelor’s degree from a top-ranked university, business or engineering school, ideally in Marketing, Business, Management, Economics, Data Analysis, Computer Science or related fields with a strong academic record
- At least 3 years of work experience in online advertising with a strong focus on performance marketing. 2+ years of hands-on work experience in Paid Social Marketing is strongly preferred
- You know Facebook Business Manager inside out and are comfortable using analytics tools such as Google Analytics. Experience with Smartly and Tableau is a strong advantage
- You are highly analytical and data-driven. You have a proven track record of high performance and impact, are capable of diving into data and synthesizing coherent and actionable recommendations to elevate performance against our KPIs.
- High proficiency in Excel is necessary. Intermediate to advanced proficiency with SQL, Python or JavaScript is a strong plus
- You are a team player with excellent communication skills. You are organised, detailed-oriented and able to manage multiple projects at one time 
- You are able to learn quickly and enjoy working in a fast-paced environment. You are comfortable with pivoting quickly and delivering against moving targets and goals
- You are passionate about the social media ecosystem, highly motivated and with a constant willingness to learn
- An excellent level of English is required

## **What we offer**

- The chance to have a serious impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase
- A comprehensive onboarding within the Paid Social team and a guaranteed steep learning curve & boost for your career
- A vibrant, international environment
- Competitive compensation
- Sabbatical Policy
- Benefit from our selection of employee perks (significant reduction on your HelloFresh boxes, discount on the HelloFresh GO vending machines, free German classes, Geek Friday, discounts for our neighboring Fitness Studio & Urban Sports Club, annual budget for training and development initiatives, weekly Yoga Classes, Summer & Winter Party)

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date.

jobs.title: Senior Platform Engineer (DevOps) (m/f/x)
jobs.description:
At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week.

We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 12 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London, Amsterdam and Copenhagen and shipped out more than 250 Million meals in 2019. 

Our more than 5,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged.

We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. 

Our Engineering, Data, Product and Security teams are located in Berlin and New York and are critical to what we do. From procurement tools, to conversion rate optimization, live pricing tools, payment services and add-on upselling features, we work on challenging problems and have a high output of building and releasing features and engines that make our business thrive and deliver real financial impact.

You can get a taste of what we've been working on by checking out our [tech blog](https://engineering.hellofresh.com/).

## **About the job**

You will be joining the Platform Tribe at HelloTech. Platform forms a stable and fresh environment for our talented teams of developers to thrive. As well as building a great foundation, Platform is also responsible for spreading their knowledge throughout the other tribes, they make sure everyone is taking advantage of the easy to use infrastructure, and applying the best practices when it comes to Continuous Delivery, Containerisation, Performance, Security etc.

- Deliver solid Infrastructure as a Code by using automation tools such as Terraform and Ansible
- Build and maintain container clusters with Kubernetes
- Optimize and improve our CI/CD workflow
- Develop and support tools for infrastructure to be used by other engineers
- Design blueprints and support engineers to implement them
- Mentoring/supporting engineers regarding tools, concepts and best practices

Check out some of the amazing open-source tools that we're building here at Platform:

[Janus](https://github.com/hellofresh/janus) - An API Gateway written in Go  
 [Klepto](https://github.com/hellofresh/klepto) - Tool for copying and anonymising data  
 [Kandalf](https://github.com/hellofresh/kandalf) - RabbitMQ to Kafka bridge

## **Who we are looking for**

- You have back-end experience using Golang or Python 
- Experience with system administration or infrastructure maintenance 
- Good knowledge of design patterns, system architecture, and best practices
- You have strong experience working with cloud (AWS), Docker and containerisation technologies such as Kubernetes, and Terraform
- Enthusiasm for open source contribution
- You are passionate about mentoring and sharing knowledge
- You love to automate things

It would be beneficial if you also have the following:

- Experience with immutable infrastructure
- Previous experience working in an environment with microservices
- Knowledge of different deployment patterns (canary, zero-downtime)

## **What we offer**

- Relocation assistance to move to Berlin and visa application support
- Competitive compensation
- Significant reduction on our meal kits
- Annual learning and development budget to attend conferences or purchase educational resources
- Sabbatical policy
- Work in our office located in the heart of Berlin
- A diverse and vibrant international environment
- A range of perks (Free in-house crash course in German, compensation for advanced German classes, in-house lecture series and knowledge sharing programme, discounts for our neighbouring gym & Urban Sports Club, free weekly yoga classes, summer & winter parties, discount on our HelloFresh GO vending machines)
- The chance to have a significant impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

Please submit your complete application below including your salary expectations and earliest starting date.

jobs.title: Social media & Content Marketing Internship (Nederlandstalig)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Passie voor goed eten

Bij HelloFresh zijn we gek op lekker eten en met een box vol verse ingrediënten is het onze missie om de manier waarop Nederland kookt te veranderen. Samen maken we van elke maaltijd een moment om naar uit te kijken. Met onze maaltijdboxen vol verse ingrediënten en makkelijk te volgen recepten zijn we een revolutie gestart in de voedingsindustrie. Van het ontwikkelen van de recepten tot de vlekkeloze bezorging van onze boxen - data is een belangrijke leidraad en daarbij staat onze klant centraal. Zo leren we elke dag iets nieuws. Ons jonge en flexibele team neemt snelle beslissingen en is daardoor niet te stoppen.

HelloFresh is op zoek naar jou

Voor ons jonge en gepassioneerde team zijn we op zoek naar een Social Media & Content Marketing stagiair per september 2020 (eerder of later in overleg). Je bent onderdeel van het Brand & Communication team en zal betrokken zijn bij alle verschillende communicatiekanalen. Je leert hoe we onze verschillende platforms inzetten om klanten te enthousiasmeren en om de klantbetrokkenheid te verhogen. Ook zal je tijdens deze stage jouw copywriting skills flink verbeteren. Je houdt je onder andere bezig met:

Community Management

  • Het team ondersteunen bij de planning van diverse social media campagnes;
  • Bedenken, inplannen en analyseren van dagelijkse social media posts op oa. Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest en YouTube;
  • Het creëren van persuasieve content i.s.m. de community managers;
  • Het bedenken van relevante invalshoeken voor onze blog en het schrijven van blogartikelen;
  • Bijdragen aan de creatie van visuals, foto’s en video’s.

Content Marketing

  • Het schrijven van commerciële content voor verschillende marketing kanalen, zoals nieuwsbrieven, app notificaties, flyers en print;
  • Ondersteunen bij de creatie van ons eigen magazine Fresh Times (elk kwartaal);
  • Brainstormen over creatieve marketingcampagnes en hierin ondersteunen van concept tot executie.

Ben jij de perfecte Social Media & Content marketing intern?

Je werkt samen met de content specialisten en community managers uit het Brand & Communication team. Het is een dynamisch team dat met diverse afdelingen nauw samenwerkt, zoals Partnership & Online Marketing, CRM, Product Development en Customer Care. Dit is een unieke kans om een kijkje in de keuken te krijgen bij veel verschillende afdelingen in een snelgroeiende organisatie. Je krijgt de kans om zelfstandig te werken en er is genoeg ruimte voor eigen inbreng. Het betreft een meewerkstage van minimaal 5 maanden. Moet je vanuit je opleiding een stage-opdracht vervullen? Geef dit dan duidelijk aan in je brief en hoeveel tijd dit waarschijnlijk in beslag zal nemen.

Wat hebben wij jou te bieden?

  • Een kans om serieuze impact te hebben op het verspreiden van de HelloFresh boodschap over onze verschillende kanale;
  • Veel ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden binnen een jonge en dynamische organisatie;
  • De vrijheid en ruimte voor eigen ideeën en initiatieven & de kans deze zelf te ontwikkelen en te implementeren;
  • Heerlijke verse lunches, sportactiviteiten als bootcamp en boksles, maandelijkse borrels en andere leuke teamactiviteiten;
  • Een tof kantoor in Amsterdam met een fantastisch team, check it out here!
  • Korting op de HelloFresh Box;
  • Een stagevergoeding van 500 euro per maand bruto, op basis van een 40-urige werkweek.

What’s next?

We beginnen met het bekijken van jouw CV en motivatiebrief. Zien we overeenkomsten? Dan maken we kennis met elkaar via een video-call. Zien we een potentiële match? Dan nodigen we je uit voor het maken van een case waarin je schrijfvaardigheid getest zal worden. Zijn we allebei nog steeds positief? Dan word je uitgenodigd voor een video call met het team. We plannen de afspraken graag snel achter elkaar, zo weet je binnen no-time of je bij ons aan de slag kan gaan!

Diversiteit en inclusiviteit is erg belangrijk voor HelloFresh. Daarom proberen wij onze teams zo samen te stellen, dat deze bestaan uit mensen met verschillende achtergronden, visies en skills. Alle keuzes binnen de sollicitatieprocedure zijn gebaseerd op kwalificaties, werkervaring en wat HelloFresh op dit moment nodig heeft.

Vragen of interesse om te solliciteren?

Stuur gerust een berichtje naar Hedwig. Wil je solliciteren? Leuk! Doe dat op de volgende manier: Klik op de 'apply' knop hieronder en vul alle verplichte velden in. Zorg ervoor dat je CV en motivatiebrief zijn bijgevoegd en that's it! Sollicitaties via e-mail worden niet in behandeling genomen.

*We recruiten graag voor onze eigen vacatures, daarom stellen we proactieve benadering van derde partijen niet op prijs. *

jobs.title: Sr. Manager, In-Source Manufacturing
jobs.description:
**About HelloFresh**

At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 8 years we've seen this mission spread around the world and beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market. 

So, how did we do it? Our weekly boxes full of exciting recipes and fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of encouraged and empowered home cooks that expands across the globe. We are one of the fastest growing meal kit businesses and are active in 12 different countries across 3 continents. 

In Canada, our growth trajectory and expansion has been phenomenal. We have launched facilities across the country and have recently added Chefs Plate to our team!

**About the Role**

We are looking for a Sr Manager, In-Source Manufacturing who will partner with DC Operations Managers in building and overseeing HelloFresh’s in-house manufacturing capabilities. Reporting to the Director of Production, you will drive profitability of in-house manufacturing operations, build and standardize nationally (process, equipment, data, reporting), and develop/implement business cases to improve our cost structure and capability.

As part of the Production team, you will play a key role in continuously building HelloFresh’s operational capability to better serve customers with high levels of service and product choice. 

If you would like to join a dynamic and highly motivated team and work in a high-growth industry where you can have an impact and make a difference every single day, then join us!

**You will:**

- Partner with DC Operations Managers to build and streamline in-house manufacturing processes
- Develop, implement, and monitor performance metrics for all national portioning operations; with focus on Safety, Quality, Cost, and Fill Rate
- Implement standard costing and new product introduction process across all portioned-product segments
- Collaborate with procurement in make vs buy analysis; Develop business cases to improve our cost structure and capability
- Identify, manage, and implement CAPEX requirements
- Oversee production planning and scheduling by collaborating with planners, buyers, and portioning operations
- Drive continuous improvement (CI) by leading site-level teams in identifying, scoping, prioritizing, and implementing CI initiatives 
- Define process performance benchmarks and "best-in-class" across all sites
- Design, develop, and standardize portioning processes across sites, e.g. change-overs, setup, sanitation, production
- Collaborate with Suppliers, Ops Tech, and CA & Global resources to deliver system, data, and process requirements 
- Sustain process adoption by conducting process audits and resolving barriers to implementation
- Oversee equipment maintenance and spares inventory to reduce unplanned downtime

**You have: **

- 5 - 10 years of manufacturing & supply chain experience with Bachelor’s and/or Master’s degree in Engineering, Business or a related field.
- Have the desire to make a meaningful difference
- Must be self-motivated with the ability to work independently. We need someone who competes to win!
- Authentic leader: direct communicator, able to build strong relationships across the company, with all levels
- Must have great collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively work closely with cross-functional team
- Understanding of manufacturing process and control systems;
- Ability to work independently with minimal supervision and successfully leverage internal and external resources;
- Ability to handle multiple projects and assignments able to prioritize and meet budgets deadlines and achieve objectives;
- Ability to lead cross-functional improvement teams;
- Effective communication and problem solving skills;
- Ability to maintain sensitive and confidential information;
- Professional certifications and/or licenses with Lean Six Sigma preferred; 
- Availability to travel within Canada, and occasionally Berlin, up to 50%

**What you'll love about this job:**

- Competitive salary 
- Perks and benefits including 75% discount on HelloFresh boxes, healthy snacks and fruit, social events, and free food from our on-site test kitchen!
- Friendly and inclusive environment at our downtown Toronto office - we take our work seriously, but we don't take ourselves too seriously.

If this sounds like you, please click the "Apply Now" button. If this role doesn't quite match what you're looking for, but you'd like to know more about joining the HelloFresh team, please visit our Jobs page to view our other vacancies. We'd love to hear from you!

jobs.title: Sr. Manager, Procurement Operations
jobs.description:
About HelloFresh... 

At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 8 years we've seen this mission spread around the world and beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market. 

So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of encouraged, energized home cooks that expands across the globe. We are the dominant world leader in the meal-kit market and have grown to operate in 12 different countries across 3 continents. Our growth trajectory and expansion has been phenomenal and we have launched facilities across Canada and have recently added Chef’s Plate to our team!

We are looking for an experienced, strategy-driven supply chain expert who is interested in revolutionizing our inbound supply chain. Reporting to the Sr. Director, Procurement, you will develop and implement a strategic roadmap for cross-team supply chain projects, lead continuous improvement efforts on inbound supply chain processes, and ensure seamless week-to-week operations. We are looking for a hands-on, numbers-driven leader with a focus on impact and action. This person will have a seat at the table and the opportunity to make decisions that will impact the entire company.

You will...

- Partner with our Category Managers, Production, and Warehouse teams to identify operational efficiencies across our national supply chain 
- Leverage internal and external networks and industry benchmarks to understand, recommend, and implement best practices that optimize processes, reduce risk, and increase profitability
- Develop a culture of continuous improvement within the Procurement team through your effective project management, use of retrospectives, and identification of new capabilities and processes that drive efficiency and improve our cost structure. Key focus areas will include: inbound freight network optimization & scheduling, materials planning, inventory management, procurement process optimization, waste reduction/supplier claims management, supplier standards/performance reporting, team structure, etc.
- Build strong cross-functional relationships and partner with our distribution centres across Canada and our project delivery teams to drive both immediate and sustained benefits to the company and our customers 
- Develop and mentor a team of direct and indirect reports across the procurement function (including indirect management of our buyers to coordinate weekly ordering); coach and mentor peer managers and procurement leads
- Be the subject matter expert in all things related to inbound supply chain of ingredients and packaging
- Identify standard processes ripe for automation; scope new tools and improvements to existing tools that will streamline and scale our operation; ensure on-time and in-scope implementation
- Take full ownership of inbound logistics and weekly procurement activities, ensuring the on time, in full delivery of all ingredients and packaging materials
- Be accountable for weekly operational cost reporting and variance analysis/explanation

You are...

- Obsessed with food!
- An innovative and strategic thought leader
- Analytical and a problem-solving expert who uses data to drive decisions
- Proactive, ambitious, and assertive: you take ownership of your work and think beyond the scope of a given assignment
- Entrepreneurial and can make things happen
- Excited to work in a fast-paced environment with constant change and limited direction
- Comfortable making quick decisions with far-reaching consequences
- A supply chain expert with a comprehensive understanding of industry best practices 
- Passionate about our business and committed to its growth

At a minimum, you have...

- BA/BS degree in business, supply chain or related discipline; Lean Six Sigma (or equivalent) certification a plus; MBA a plus
- Total of 7+ years of experience in management consulting and/or supply chain
- Vast knowledge and interest in supply chain management and continuous improvement processes
- Experience managing and leading a team of direct and indirect reports
- The ability to build and effectively communicate a strategic plan to employees at all levels from buyers to the CEO
- Quantitative and analytical experience (either through education or professional experience), including expertise with G-Suite, Excel, Tableau, and procurement systems

What you'll love about this job:

- Competitive salary and company benefits
- 75% discount on HelloFresh boxes
- High level of responsibility from day one
- Working with a fun, energetic and supportive team
- Awesome environment at our downtown Toronto office! We take our work seriously, but we don't take ourselves too seriously

If this sounds like you, please click the "Apply Now" button. If this role doesn't quite match what you're looking for, but you'd like to know more about joining the HelloFresh team, please visit our Jobs page to view our other vacancies. We'd love to hear from you!

From procurement tools, to conversion rate optimization, live pricing tools, payment services and add-on upselling features, we work on challenging problems and have a high output of building and releasing features and engines that make our business thrive and deliver real financial impact.

You can get a taste of what we've been working on by checking out our tech blog.

About the job

  • Our Staff Engineers are responsible for the end-to-end product development processes, across the entire tech organization and for the HelloFresh platform, serving millions globally to deliver the best experience for our customers and internal users
  • They take ownership of the best practices in architecture, design, development, deployment, and operations (DevOps Practices, Pair Programming, TDD, BDD, etc.)
  • They are leaders in ensuring our teams are adopting state-of-the-art technologies
  • They are actively involved in large and strategic tech initiatives, such as distributed data, streaming data, microservice architecture, refactoring, test-driven development practices, API definitions, automation and more.
  • They have an in-depth knowledge of technology trends and are active in sharing knowledge, mentoring and coaching.
  • They collaborate closely with our leadership in Tech, Product, Data and Business to improve our process, methodologies, communication flows, etc.
  • They are ambassadors for HelloTech brand and partners in hiring to our Talent Acquisition Team.

Who we are looking for

  • You have solid back-end experience within Microservice architecture using Golang or Python, (knowledge of PHP is a nice to have)
  • You have experience working with Docker and container orchestration technologies such as Kubernetes
  • You are experienced in CI/CD methods and practices
  • You have practical experience of TDD, BDD, DDD and distributed architectural patterns
  • You have a background working with event-driven architectures using RabbitMQ and/or Kafka
  • You are experienced in end-to-end development processes, including unit, integration & functional testing, distributed architecture, application tuning/profiling, and continuous integration
  • You have experience working with relational and document databases, including PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB
  • You thrive in the opportunity to collaborate and mentor team members, while also sharing practical knowledge and trends

What we offer

  • Relocation assistance to move to Berlin and visa application support
  • Competitive compensation
  • Significant reduction on our meal kits
  • Annual learning and development budget to attend conferences or purchase educational resources
  • Sabbatical policy
  • Work in our office located in the heart of Berlin
  • A diverse and vibrant international environment
  • A range of perks (Free in-house crash course in German, compensation for advanced German classes, in-house lecture series and knowledge sharing programme, discounts for our neighboring gym & Urban Sports Club, free weekly yoga classes, summer & winter parties, discount on our HelloFresh GO vending machines)
  • The chance to have a significant impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase

Are you up for a challenge?

Please submit your complete application below including your salary expectations and earliest starting date.

jobs.title: Strategic Product & Business Development Internship
jobs.description:
**Passie voor goed eten**

Bij HelloFresh zijn we gek op lekker eten en met een box vol verse ingrediënten is het onze missie om de manier waarop Nederland kookt te veranderen. Samen maken we van elke maaltijd een moment om naar uit te kijken. Met onze maaltijdboxen vol verse ingrediënten en makkelijk te volgen recepten zijn we een revolutie gestart in de voedingsindustrie. Van het ontwikkelen van de recepten tot de vlekkeloze bezorging van onze boxen - data is een belangrijke leidraad en daarbij staat onze klant centraal. Zo leren we elke dag iets nieuws. Ons jonge en flexibele team neemt snelle beslissingen en is daardoor niet te stoppen.

**HelloFresh is op zoek naar jou**

Voor ons hoofdkantoor in Amsterdam zijn we op zoek naar een enthousiaste stagiair die wil leren hoe je projecten m.b.t. product en business development managet van begin tot eind. Bij HelloFresh zetten we onze klanten op één en willen we er voor blijven zorgen dat we inspelen op de wensen van onze klanten. Binnen dit team werk je aan verschillende projecten die te maken hebben met de introductie van nieuwe producten en verbeteringen aan onze huidige producten. Je werkt hiervoor nauw samen met de projectmanager product development & innovation en andere teams binnen HelloFresh. Je zult processen van begint tot eind meemaken; conceptuele fase, van de logistieke operatie, tot contact met developers en de IT -technische kant die daarbij komt kijken. Je krijgt daarom energie het managen van projecten, bent analytisch en weet met jouw organisatietalent meerdere ballen in de lucht te houden.

**Ben jij de perfecte Strategic Product & Business Development Intern?**

Je volgt een opleiding aan de hogeschool of universiteit, zoals bedrijfskunde of een andere economische richting. Je bent uiteraard opzoek naar een stage en 5 tot 6 maanden fulltime beschikbaar. Het is belangrijk dat je nauwkeurig kan werken en oog hebt voor detail. Microsoft Excel klinkt je niet onbekend in de oren en je weet je weg te vinden binnen dit programma. Je hebt een passie voor eten, maar daarnaast ben je enthousiast over het product wat we aanbieden bij HelloFresh. Proactiviteit en ondernemerschap staan boven aan jouw lijst van persoonlijke eigenschappen en je bent een ster in duidelijke communicatie. Communiceren doen we binnen HelloFresh voornamelijk in het Engels, maar Nederlands moet je ook goed kunnen beheersen. 

**Wat hebben wij jou te bieden?**

- Een kans om serieuze impact te hebben op de professionalisering van facility management in een snel groeiend tech-bedrijf;
- Veel ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden binnen een jong en dynamisch bedrijf;
- De vrijheid en ruimte voor eigen ideeën en initiatieven en de kans deze zelf te ontwikkelen en implementeren;
- Lekkere lunches en sportactiviteiten zoals bootcamp en boksles, maandelijkse borrels en andere leuke teamactiviteiten;
- Een tof kantoor in Amsterdam met een fantastisch team, check it out [here](http://media.licdn.com/embeds/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2F1ZKrhiVypkw%3Ffeature%3Doembed&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3D1ZKrhiVypkw&type=text%2Fhtml&schema=youtube)!
- Korting op de HelloFresh Box;
- Een stagevergoeding van 500 euro per maand

**What’s next?**

We beginnen met het bekijken van jouw CV en motivatiebrief. Zien we overeenkomsten? Dan maken we kennis met elkaar via een video-call. Zien we een potentiële match? Dan praten we graag inhoudelijk met je verder over de rol en de taken die daarbij horen. We plannen de afspraken graag snel achter elkaar, zo weet je binnen no-time of je bij ons aan de slag kan gaan!

*Diversiteit en inclusiviteit is erg belangrijk voor HelloFresh. Daarom proberen wij onze teams zo samen te stellen, dat deze bestaan uit mensen met verschillende achtergronden, visies en skills. Alle keuzes binnen de sollicitatieprocedure zijn gebaseerd op kwalificaties, werkervaring en wat HelloFresh op dit moment nodig heeft.*

**Vragen of interesse om te solliciteren?**

Stuur gerust een berichtje naar [Ard-Jan](mailto:ard-jan@hellofresh.nl). Wil je solliciteren? Leuk! Doe dat op de volgende manier: Klik op de "apply"-knop hieronder en vul alle verplichte velden in. Zorg ervoor dat je CV en motivatiebrief zijn bijgevoegd en that's it! Sollicitaties via email worden niet in behandeling genomen.   
  
**We recruiten graag voor onze eigen vacatures, daarom stellen we proactieve benadering van **** derde partijen niet op prijs.**

jobs.title: Supply Chain Executive
jobs.description:
**_About HelloFresh_**

HelloFresh is on a mission to transform the way the world thinks about home cooking. Forget the hassle of supermarkets, or the tiresome process of planning your weekly meals - we deliver to your door all the ingredients, instructions and inspiration needed to make delicious meals at home, from scratch.

Not only have we been named Europe’s fastest growing start-up in the past, but at just 8 years in, we’re the industry leader. Along the way, we’ve delivered hundreds of millions of meals to millions of households worldwide and are passionate about disrupting one of the last industries to go online - food and grocery.

So, if you’re keen to join a dynamic and energetic team, look no further!

 

**_About the job:_**

You will join our talented and driven Operations team. You will be reporting into Maddie, our Supply Chain Manager. This is the perfect role for someone to develop their career in supply chain operations.

 

**_What you will be doing:_**

- Category ownership of our inbound supply chain operations to ensure our ingredients arrive in full and on time.
- Building and owning relationships with our external suppliers to ensure our high standards are consistently met.
- Identifying issues and thinking on your feet to reduce impact to our end to end operation and more importantly our customers.
- Measuring, analysing and reporting on supplier performance.
- Executing the weekly ordering and forecasting processes.
- Ensuring timely and accurate information is shared to internal stakeholders working closely with Procurement, Planning, Technical and Production teams to deliver the best customer experience.
- Project delivery of key initiatives to continually improve the performance and efficiency of our supply chain.

 

**_Who you are:_**

- You are incredibly resilient and operate well under pressure.
- You find solutions to resolve problems with minimal impact to internal and external stakeholders.
- You’re a self-starter.
- You’re not afraid to challenge the status-quo with new ideas.
- You’re hungry to learn new things every day! (Being always hungry in the literal sense also helps but not a must!)
- Your Excel skills are pretty strong, too.
- FMCG background is a plus.

However, most importantly you want to kick start you career at HelloFresh and are passionate about food and about what we do here!

Working hours: 4-week rota, occasional weekend days

Location: London, Shoreditch

Start date: ASAP

Recruitment process: first, you will have a phone interview with a member of our Talent Acquisition team. Should you be successful, you will be asked to complete a technical test from home and depending on the results, will be invited to two video interviews (one competency-based and one culture fit).

- Een echte meewerkstage voor minimaal 5 maanden;
- De vrijheid en ruimte voor eigen ideeën en initiatieven en de kans deze zelf te ontwikkelen en implementeren;

jobs.title: Supply Chain Strategy Analyst
jobs.description:
***Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh!***

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  

We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people.

The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result.

**Job Description:**

The Supply Chain Strategy Analyst will be responsible for data analysis within the Logistics team and assisting with logistics network planning and strategy. The analyst will be tasked with leveraging data and database tools to help inform high-level strategy and network allocation decisions. Responsibilities will include building and maintaining internal Logistics tools and databases, supporting the execution and change management of network shifts, and serving as a key team representative in cross-functional initiatives. Additional tasks will include supporting weekly reporting activities; providing regular and ad-hoc in-depth analysis on network strategy and carrier performance; and leveraging this analysis to provide the team with insight and recommendations on continued network optimization. 

#### **You will ...**

- Support the Logistics Strategy team on decision making through effectively analyzing and drawing conclusions from data and database tools
- Own & maintain critical network database files
- Become a subject matter expert in all aspects of HelloFresh’s distribution & shipping network
- Develop/improve/maintain tools to support Logistics processes, and own necessary database improvements
- Participate in Logistics order management and contingency processes
- Thrive in fast-paced environment with varying ad-hoc projects 

**You are...**

- Data-driven – you can organize, explore, and synthesize unstructured data into actionable insights to better inform operational decision-making.
- Collaborative - you enjoy working cross functionally with various teams to gather key inputs, and are able to work well with diverse opinions.
- Intellectually curious – you have an insatiable desire to understand how things work, why they work the way they do, and to consistently challenge the status quo.
- Detail-oriented – you possess strong organizational skills and consistently demonstrate a methodical approach to all your work.
- Agile – you thrive in fast-paced and dynamic environments and are comfortable working autonomously.
- A critical thinker – you use logic to identify opportunities, evaluate alternatives, and synthesize and present critical information to solve complex problems.
- An excellent communicator – able to communicate at all levels with clarity, poise, maturity and precision both written and verbal.
- Dedicated to providing the best possible experience for the HelloFresh customer.

#### **At a minimum, you have...**

- 0-2 years’ experience delivering analytical solutions to complex problems
- Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Economics, Data Science, Computer Science, Information Systems, Accounting, or other relevant area of study
- Ability to work with multiple database systems and provide intelligence-driven conclusions 
- Experience with Tableau, SQL, and/or Python a significant plus
- Skilled in MS Office (Excel) or Google Suite
- Excellent problem solving and critical thinking skills
- Robust project management skills

**You’ll get…**

- Competitive Salary & 401k company match that vests immediately upon participation
- Generous parental leave of 16 weeks & PTO policy
- $0 monthly premium and other flexible health plans effective first day of employment
- 75% discount on your subscription to HelloFresh (as well as other product initiatives)   
- Snacks, cold brew on tap & monthly catered lunches
- Company sponsored outings & Employee Resource Groups
- Collaborative, dynamic work environment within a fast-paced, mission-driven company  

 

It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because he or she is a protected veteran.

jobs.title: Supply Planner
jobs.description:
About HelloFresh... 

At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 7 years we've seen this mission spread around the world and beyond our wildest dreams. Now, we are the leading global company in the expanding online recipe kit delivery market. 

So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of encouraged, energized home cooks that expands across the globe. We are the dominant world leader in the meal-kit market and have grown to operate in 12 different countries across 3 continents. 

If you would like to join an energetic and highly motivated team and work in a dynamic, high-energy, high-growth field where you can really have an impact and make a difference every single day then join us and become part of developing a global fresh food champion.

You Will Be Doing:

- Working cross functionally with Procurement, Production (in all 4 DCs), and Logistics, you’ll build the 4 week out production plan for every site and operation (kitting, casing, portioning, ice making) to hit outbound slot requirements built by Logistics team (Supply Planning), based on Order Book (current week), and Box/Recipe forecast (next 3 weeks)
- Based on production plans, shift patterns and other inputs, build staffing schedule to execute production plan (Supply Planning)
- Build system to create and deploy pick lists to all sites in advance of production
- You’ll leverage your knowledge of the entire supply chain to drive incremental improvements in our performance every single week

About You:

- You are an engineering or business grad who is obsessed with details...when you book a flight, you’re the person checking seat guru for best spot on the plane, looking at the on-time rating of the flight, calculating the time airport to hotel, and leaving yourself a reasonable buffer before your first dinner reservation in whatever city you’re visiting, with all of that tracked in a multi-tab excel doc/google sheet (colour-coded of course!)
- You have experience (even as a co-op) in a production environment...you understand the importance of a great, detailed work plan in a large scale production/distribution centre environment
- Exceptional analytical ability: data should sing to you, and you can translate the big picture plan into a step by step to-do list for the rest of our operations team
- Incredible attention to detail: every data point matters
- Obsessively organized: everything on time, complete and accurate

Why You’ll Love This Job: 

- You’ll have the opportunity to take a huge amount of data, and distill it into a clear, actionable to-do list...bringing order to the chaos!
- You’ll develop a DEEP understanding of our procurement and production operations (you’ll need it to be effective!)
- You’ll be able to clearly measure your impact on the operation through super clear metrics (OTIFIQ, mins/box, on time shipping)
- Awesome environment at our downtown Toronto office! We take our work seriously, but we don't take ourselves too seriously
- Employee discounts on your weekly HelloFresh box!

If this sounds like you, please click the "Apply Now" button. If this role doesn't quite match what you're looking for, but you'd like to know more about joining the HelloFresh Team, please visit our job page to view our other vacancies. We'd love to hear from you!

jobs.title: Talent Acquisition Manager - Tech (m/f/x)
jobs.description:
At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week.

We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 12 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London, Amsterdam and Copenhagen and shipped out more than 250 Million meals in 2019. 

Our more than 5,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged.

We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. 

We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us.

Our Engineering, Data, Product and Security teams are located in Berlin and New York and are critical to what we do. From procurement tools, to conversion rate optimization, live pricing tools, payment services and add-on upselling features, we work on challenging problems and have a high output of building and releasing features and engines that make our business thrive and deliver real financial impact.

## **About the job**

We’re looking for a Tech Talent Acquisition Manager, to help foster the growth of HelloFresh.

In the Tech Talent Acquisition team we have a lean mindset, making data-driven decisions and encouraging autonomy to deliver high quality Data, Product and Engineering hires. We’re driven by hiring excellent people and work closely with all areas of the business to deliver this.  
  
Your responsibilities will include:

- Taking ownership of our end-to-end recruitment funnel: from sourcing to interviewing, and the best part, delivering offers!
- Creating strong and creative sourcing strategies, while engaging hiring teams to get the most of our referral program
- Developing solid working relationships with hiring teams up to senior managers, across the organisation, acting as a trusted advisor/partner in everything related to hiring
- Lead and execute strategic projects across candidate experience, NPS, process quality and other areas of Talent Acquisition
- Strengthening our employer brand and ensuring we provide an exceptional end-to-end candidate experience at all points of the recruitment lifecycle  

## **Who we're looking for**

- An experienced recruiter, with experience of managing all stages of the recruitment process, from advertisement to offer, communicating with a high volume of candidates on a daily basis
- Experienced working either in-house or agency hiring in Tech (Developers/Product/Design/Data/etc)
- A natural “people person” with great communication, interpersonal skills and emotional intelligence
- Self-starter with a hands-on attitude, and confident working with stakeholders of all levels
- Highly organised day to day, able to handle multiple tasks and projects at once
- Ability to use previous recruitment mistakes to anticipate future events (Think “How is this situation similar to ones I have been in before?”)
- A knowledge of the Tech landscape such as programming languages, frameworks, methodologies and trends
- Strong affinity to the HelloFresh brand and culture, and a love of good food

   
If you’ve also got any of the following it would be beneficial:

- Reporting experience and a data driven mindset, using data to continuously improve your recruitment processes
- Experience as a sourcer (X-ray searching, data mining, scripting, Boolean, etc)

 

## **What we offer**

- Relocation assistance to move to Berlin
- Competitive compensation
- Significant reduction on our meal kits
- Annual learning and development budget to attend conferences or purchase educational resources
- Sabbatical policy
- Work in our office located in the heart of Berlin
- A diverse and vibrant international environment
- A range of perks (Free in-house crash course in German, compensation for advanced German classes, in-house lecture series and knowledge sharing programme, discounts for our neighboring gym & Urban Sports Club, free weekly yoga classes, summer & winter parties, discount on our HelloFresh GO vending machines)
- The chance to have a significant impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase

 

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

Please submit your complete application below including your salary expectations and earliest starting date.

Hiring and engaging highly-sought-after talent is at the top of the agenda for HelloFresh. As our new Talent Acquisition Specialist (m/f/x) you will be hiring excellent people from junior to senior level and work closely with the hiring managers for all Non-Tech areas in the global Headquarters of HelloFresh to deliver on one of our most important objectives: attract and retain the best talent to HelloFresh.

You should be results-driven and solution-orientated, whilst tactical and sensitive when dealing with stakeholders. If you are passionate about talent acquisition and looking for a new opportunity in a fast-moving, very international environment that will challenge you, we would very much like to meet you.

Your responsibilities will include:

- Help current team with all recruitment-related efforts: manage data in our ATS, post jobs, maintain job boards, schedule and conduct interviews, communicate to line managers about hiring progress, create offers etc. 
- Source and attract the best candidates to join the Global HQ teams in Marketing, Operations, Business Development, Business Intelligence, People, Finance, Legal, Office Management etc.
- Take a creative and strategic approach to recruiting, developing and improving our sourcing strategies for both active and passive candidates
- Strengthen our employer brand and ensuring we provide an exceptional end-to-end candidate experience at all points of the recruitment lifecycle
- Help developing and managing our entry level offerings including all graduate, intern, and working student programmes
- Help executing a values-based employer branding & engagement strategy, exciting internal and external audiences together with our Employer Branding team

- A Talent Acquisition Manager / Specialist or Recruiter with min. 3 years’ experience in delivering all stages of the recruitment process, from advertisement to offer, communicating with a high volume of candidates on a daily basis
- Background from either internal talent acquisition or recruitment agency
- Experience managing relationships with a variety of internal stakeholders
- Strong and advanced sourcing skills
- Fluent in English verbally and in writing, German would be a plus
- A natural “people’s person” with great communication, interpersonal skills and good levels of emotional intelligence
- Self-starter with a can-do attitude, and confident working with stakeholders on all levels
- Highly organised day to day, able to handle multiple tasks and projects at once; self-organisation is key
- IT savvy, professional skills with the entire Microsoft Office Suite and experience with Applicant Tracking Systems
- Strong affinity to the HelloFresh brand and culture

## **What we offer**

- The chance to have a serious impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase
- A vibrant, international environment
- A guaranteed steep learning curve & boost for your career
- Competitive compensation
- Sabbatical policy
- Benefit from our selection of employee perks (significant reduction on your HelloFresh boxes, discount on the HelloFresh GO vending machines, free German classes, Geek Friday, discounts for our neighboring Fitness Studio & Urban Sports Club, annual budget for training and development initiatives, weekly Yoga Classes, Summer & Winter Party)

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

#### Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date.

jobs.title: Talent Scout, Sales
jobs.description:
**Role: Talent Scout, Sales **

**Location: Phoenix, AZ**

**Reports to: Manager, Recruiting**  

***Come see what’s cookin’ at HelloFresh!***  

At HelloFresh, we want to revolutionize the way we eat by making it more convenient and exciting to cook meals from scratch. We have offices all over the world and we deliver delicious meals to millions of people.  

We are the industry leader in meal-kit subscription services and we’re growing all the time. We have distinct meal-kit services that cater to everyone with the most menu variety in the market, which allows us to reach an incredibly wide population of people.

The HelloFresh team is diverse, high-performing, and international, and our work environment is an inspiring space where you can thrive as a result. 

**Talent Scouts, Sales Job Description:**

We are looking for an ambitious, self-motivated, results-driven and positive minded Talent Scout to add to our incredible team.  The Sales Talent Scout will work closely with the overall Recruiting and Regional Sales Teams to understand the staffing needs and develop a proactive, innovative sourcing/recruitment strategy to attract and recruit Brand Ambassadors - our field direct sales employees. The incumbent is responsible for performing advanced sourcing through various mediums including internal and external database mining, networking, associations, universities, community agencies, social media, and referrals. Using effective and professional communication skills, the Talent Scout will deliver and gather information to meet aggressive hiring goals, while projecting a positive company image to attract top talent.

This role is an hourly, non-exempt role (overtime eligible), with an incentive plan that correlates to your direct performance. Duties responsibilities and activities may change or new ones may be assigned at any time with or without notice

 0-10% travel required  

**You will ...**

- Be responsible for maintaining candidate pipeline information and tracking data and metrics
- Conducting cold calls to passive candidates to present opportunities for critical and difficult positions.
- Perform initial evaluation to ensure candidates meet both job and organization requirements
- Continually evaluates sourcing strategies, making necessary adjustments to ensure a strong pipeline of talent
- Collaborate with Recruitment, Regional and Sales Managers to understand roles, responsibilities and success factors of ideal candidates
- Enter and maintain accurate information in Sales Recruiting Tracking Systems and/or sourcing tracking systems.
- Proactively communicate the status of searches with hiring managers on a consistent and timely basis
- Manage timely responses to candidates including but not limited to: receipt of application, application status and specific information reconciling candidate qualifications relative to job requirements.
- Act as a key resource for a developed pool of candidates and ensure a positive transition to the hiring managers

**You are...**

- Someone who acts with a strong sense of urgency and are deadline-driven
- Able to set and achieve aggressive goals with a great attitude
- Highly competitive and have a winners mindset
- Enthusiastic and optimistic about your work and able to clearly articulate a company’s mission, vision and employee value proposition in a convincing, confident manner
- Able to handle confidential information and work with a high level of integrity
- A seeker of challenges with a strong work ethic who thrives under pressure
- Decisive, innovative and inquisitive 

**At a minimum, you have...**

- High School Diploma or GED required, graduate of an accredited 4-year program strongly preferred
- Ideally have 2 years’ recruiting exposure, preferably in the sales field

*It is the policy of HelloFresh not to discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability or because they are a protected veteran.** *

jobs.title: Team Lead Product Development Operations DACH (m/f/d)
jobs.description:
We at HelloFresh are hungry for more. Because: “We want to change the way people eat. Forever.” Our cooking boxes already make the everyday lives of our customers easier in 12 countries on 3 continents. Every week anew. Our recipe for success? A team full of smart team players, entrepreneurial courage and of course... good taste. We are one of the top 10 employers in the Glassdoor ranking and we are continuing to grow. And to do this, our HelloFresh DACH team needs top talents like you, who love progress and good food just as much as we do.

As Team Lead of the Product Development Operations DACH team, you will be responsible for the Recipe & Ingredient Development teams, supporting the team members increasing efficiency and effectiveness of the operations in their units. You will work closely with the teams of Product Management, Product Planning and Procurement both locally and internationally, making sure that operations, processes and initiatives are running smoothly.

## Your area of responsibility 

- Structure & lead a consistently high performing & data-driven Product Development Operations Team to deliver the product strategy & operations
- Responsible for coaching & developing the team members, including data literacy developments
- Accountable for robust and complete product data and resultant KPIs reporting 
- Accountable for leading best practice, quality of execution, and continuous improvement of the product development process and responsibilities within the wider DACH operational fulfilment landscape 
- Responsible for building relationships & identifying continuous improvement opportunities and resources available throughout DACH & INT 
- Accountable for defining and setting quality standards across all team units which are relevant for our consumers and meet their expectations
- Accountable for recipe planning, a suitable recipe database and ensuring operations are delivered
- Responsible for achieving the recipe score cards targets
- Accountable for the validation of single ingredients in recipe
- Responsible for recommending cost savings or investment initiatives that are in line with consumer expectations of quality 

## Your profile

- You have at least 4 - 5 years of professional experience in a management position in the product or operations area, preferably in the food industry
- Ideally you know a lot about food consumer products and nutrition
- You are numbers-driven and have a very good analytical understanding
- You have outstanding personnel management qualities, strong assertiveness as well as distinctive and systematic communication skills
- You bring a high degree of responsibility, commitment, initiative and social competence
- You think entrepreneurially, you are data and process-driven in your work approach
- You convince with professionalism and conscientiousness in your dealings with stakeholders
- You work independently, structured and conscientiously
- You are highly organized and always have an eye on deadlines
- You are a doer with a hands-on mentality and a zest for action
- You speak German with a native speaker's competence and also very good English
- You have (very) good MS Office skills, especially in Excel & PowerPoint

## What else we offer you

- The opportunity to make a decisive contribution to defining the new cooking box category
- You will be learning from a direct exchange with XY experts and therefore in a position to continuously develop yourself further
- An attractive and competitive remuneration package with plenty of room for personal growth
- A feel-good workplace in Berlin-Mitte with great colleagues
- An annual budget for individual further training and team coaching
- Greatly discounted HelloFresh cooking box and HelloFreshGO products plus free food
- Fitness programmes such as office yoga and discounted Urban Sports Club membership
- Company pension scheme, flexible working hours and sabbatical policy
- Regular team events, company parties and Friday beers
- Windows or Apple equipment (depending on preference)
- Relocation service to Berlin

## You're hungry for more?

Apply now with your complete application documents, including your earliest possible starting date and salary expectations.

We look forward to hearing from you!

*HelloFresh lives diversity. We are proud of the different backgrounds, skills and perspectives of each individual team member and support their personal development at the workplace. All personnel decisions are based on equal opportunities and are made on the basis of the qualifications, performance and the company’s requirements.*

A team full of smart team players, entrepreneurial courage and of course... good taste. We are one of the top 10 employers in the Glassdoor ranking and we are continuing to grow. And to do this, our HelloFresh DACH team needs top talents like you, who love progress and good food just as much as we do.

As Team Lead of the Product Development Operations DACH team, you will be responsible for the Recipe & Ingredient Development teams, supporting the team members increasing efficiency and effectiveness of the operations in their units. You will work closely with the teams of Product Management, Product Planning and Procurement both locally and internationally, making sure that operations, processes and initiatives are running smoothly.

Your area of responsibility

jobs.title: Team Lead Talent Acquisition Int./Glob. (m/f/x)
jobs.description:
At HelloFresh, our mission is to change the way people eat - forever. From our 2011 founding in Europe’s vibrant tech hub Berlin, we’ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week.

We offer our meal kit boxes full of exciting recipes and thoughtfully sourced, fresh ingredients in more than 13 countries, operating from offices in Berlin, New York City, Sydney, Toronto, London, Amsterdam and Copenhagen and shipped out more than 250 Million meals in 2019. 

Our more than 5,000 employees are the heart and soul of our highly international, fast-paced, and dynamic environment where innovation and smart, fast action is encouraged.

We want you to join us and help take HelloFresh to the next level - as a company in its growth phase this is a great time to join. Career and development opportunities are endless. 

We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us.

## **About the job**

- Reporting into the Global Director Talent Acquisition.
- Lead, and manage and mentor a team of recruiters who are responsible for high-volume, high-speed hiring goals.
- Personally carry a reduced requisition load, leading your team by example, demonstrating how all HelloFresh best practices can be applied to achieve successful results.
- Maintain standardized full-cycle recruiting processes and tools to ensure a seamless and positive candidate experience.
- Evaluate recruiting efforts to continually champion streamlined practices or identify opportunities to improve the process, speed, and quality of talent brought into the organization.
- Track team performance using data and analytics to ensure the success of the Talent Acquisition team against OKRs and KPIs.  
- Use data to provide meaningful insights for your team and stakeholders.
- Participate in the creation and implementation of hiring plans in accordance with the workforce plan and with the best efficiency for cost-per-hire.
- Collaborate with hiring managers to reinforce and improve the recruitment process; provide ongoing coaching and development.
- Collaborate with TA peers and Director to continue developing our Talent Acquisition strategy to support our business needs and contribute to the overall talent strategy
- Partner with the business and people team regarding talent assessment, development and succession planning.
- Managing our external partnerships with colleges, job boards and HR software vendors
- Assist with the preparation of our annual recruitment budget.
- Build talent pipelines for current and future TA job openings.
- Participate in special projects as assigned.

## **Who we’re looking for**

- 8+ years’ experience as Talent Acquisition professional recruiting for high-change, high-growth companies.
- 2+ years leading and coaching recruiters.
- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business or a related field. 
- Proven experience in working with different ATS, GreenHouse is a plus. 
- Strong interpersonal communication skills and collaborative work style with the ability to build relationships with leaders and stakeholders to drive organizational change.
- Ability to be both hands-on and strategic: willing to take on recruitment activities, while also being able to delegate to and provide direction to a small team.
- Proven track record in creating and executing volume recruitment strategies as well as targeted recruitment campaigns.
- Fluent English language skills are essential.

## **What we offer**

- Relocation assistance to move to Berlin and visa application support
- Competitive compensation
- Significant reduction on our meal kits
- Annual learning and development budget to attend conferences or purchase educational resources
- Sabbatical policy
- Work in our office located in the heart of Berlin
- A diverse and vibrant international environment
- A range of perks (Free in-house crash course in German, compensation for advanced German classes, in-house lecture series and knowledge sharing programme, discounts for our neighboring gym & Urban Sports Club, free weekly yoga classes, summer & winter parties, discount on our HelloFresh GO vending machines)
- The chance to have a significant impact on one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase

## **Are you up for a challenge?**

Please submit your complete application below including your earliest starting date.

jobs.title: Team Leiter Product Development Operations - Culinary DACH (m/f/d)
jobs.description:
Wir bei HelloFresh sind hungrig nach mehr. Denn: “*We want to change the way people eat, forever”*. Mit unseren Kochboxen machen wir den Alltag unserer Kunden bereits in 12 Ländern auf 3 Kontinenten leichter. Und das jede Woche aufs Neue. Unser Erfolgsrezept? Ein Team voller smarter Team Player, unternehmerischer Mut und natürlich… guter Geschmack. Als einer der Top 10 Arbeitgeber im Glassdoor Ranking wachsen wir immer weiter. Und dazu braucht unser HelloFresh DACH Team Top-Talente wie Dich, die Fortschritt und gutes Essen genauso lieben wie wir. 

Als **„Team Leiter Product Development Operations (m/w/d) DACH“** bist du für die Teams Rezept- und Zutaten Entwicklung verantwortlich und unterstützt die Teammitglieder dabei, sich stetig in ihrer Prozesseffizienz zu steigern. Du wirst sowohl lokal als auch international eng mit dem Produktmanagement, der Produktplanung und dem Einkauf Team zusammenarbeiten und stellst dabei sicher, dass die Prozesse reibungslos ablaufen.

## **Dein Verantwortungsbereich**

- Du strukturierst und führst ein leistungsstarkes und datengetriebenes Product Development Operations Team an, um Produktstrategien umzusetzen
- Du trägst Verantwortung für das Coaching & die Entwicklung der Teammitglieder, einschließlich der Entwicklung der Datenanalyse Kompetenz
- Du bist zuständig für das Vervollständigen der Produktdaten und die daraus resultierenden KPIs 
- Du führst Best-Practice-Beispiele an, führst diese hochqualitativ aus und bist für die kontinuierliche Verbesserung der Produktentwicklungsprozesse innerhalb des operativen DACH Bereiches zuständig
- Du identifizierst kontinuierlich Verbesserungsmöglichkeiten anhand verfügbarer Ressourcen und baust gute Beziehungen sowohl innerhalb des DACH Teams als auch im internationalen Team
- Du definierst und legst teamübergreifende Qualitätsstandards fest, die relevant für unsere Verbraucher sind und deren Erwartungen erfüllen
- Du verantwortest die Rezeptplanung als auch die Rezeptdatenbank und stellst sicher, dass alle Operations in diesem Bereich planmäßig und erwartungsgemäß laufen
- Du nimmst Verantwortung auf die Erreichung der Zielvorgaben unserer Recipe Scorecards 
- Du bist für die komplette Validierung einzelner Zutaten in Rezepten zuständig
- Du bist für die Empfehlung von Kosteneinsparungen oder Investitionsinitiativen verantwortlich, die mit den Qualitätserwartungen der Verbraucher im Einklang stehen 

##   **Dein Profil**

- Du verfügst über mindestens 4 - 5 Jahre Berufserfahrung in einer Führungsposition im Produktbereich, vorzugsweise in der Lebensmittelindustrie
- Du hast idealerweise einen hohen Wissensstand über Lebensmittel
- Du bist sehr zahlenaffin und hast ein sehr gutes analytisches Verständnis
- Du verfügst über hervorragende Personalführungskompetenzen, starkes Durchsetzungsvermögen sowie ausgeprägte Kommunikationsfähigkeiten
- Du bringst ein hohes Maß an Verantwortung, Engagement, Initiative und sozialer Kompetenz mit
- Du denkst unternehmerisch und arbeitest sehr daten- und prozessgetrieben 
- Du überzeugst durch Professionalität und Gewissenhaftigkeit im Umgang mit Stakeholdern
- Du arbeitest selbständig, strukturiert und gewissenhaft
- Du bist gut organisiert und hast immer ein Auge auf Fristen
- Du sprichst sehr gut Deutsch vergleichbar mit dem Niveau eines Muttersprachlers und als auch sehr gut Englisch
- Du verfügst über (sehr) gute MS-Office-Kenntnisse, insbesondere in Excel & PowerPoint

## **Das bieten wir Dir außerdem **

- Die Möglichkeit, die Kochbox-Kategorie entscheidend mit zu definieren 
- Du lernst im direkten Austausch mit Produkt Experten und bist somit in der Lage, Dich stetig weiterzuentwickeln
- Eine attraktive und wettbewerbsfähige Vergütung und viel Raum für persönliches Wachstum
- Ein Wohlfühlarbeitsplatz in Berlin-Mitte mit tollen Kollegen 
- Jährliches Budget für individuelle Weiterbildungen und Team Coachings
- Stark vergünstigte HelloFresh Kochbox und HelloFreshGO-Produkte sowie kostenloses Essen
- Fitness-Angebote wie Office Yoga und ermäßigte Urban Sports Club Mitgliedschaft 
- Altersvorsorge-Programm, flexible Arbeitszeiten und Sabbatical Policy
- Regelmäßige Team Events, Firmen Parties sowie Friday Beers
- Windows oder Apple Ausstattung (je Präferenz)
- Relocation-Service nach Berlin

## **Du bist auch hungrig nach mehr? **

Bewirb Dich jetzt mit Deinen vollständigen Bewerbungsunterlagen inkl. frühestmögliches Startdatum sowie Gehaltsvorstellungen.

Wir freuen uns auf Dich!

*HelloFresh lebt Vielfalt. Wir sind stolz auf die unterschiedlichen Hintergründe, Fähigkeiten und Perspektiven jedes einzelnen Teammitglieds und unterstützen die persönliche Entfaltung am Arbeitsplatz. Jede Personalentscheidung basiert auf Chancengleichheit und wird auf Grundlage von Qualifikationen, Leistungen und Anforderungen des Unternehmens getroffen. *
